T04bsa054_u:3446: na kevalaṃ dayā nāsti krodha utpadyate katham // Bca_6.38 //
T04bsa054_u:3447: piśācairiva grasteṣu eṣu apakārakāriṣu uktanayena pravṛtteṣu ātmaghātane parāpakāradvāreṇa vā na kevalaṃ na tāvat kṛpā nāsti, audāsīnyamapi sādhūnāṃ tatrāyuktam /
T04bsa054_u:3448: dveṣa utpadyate kathaṃ kṛpāsthāneṣviti viparyayo mahān //
T04bsa054_u:3451: teṣu kopo na yukto me yathāgnau dahanātmake // Bca_6.39 //
T04bsa054_u:3453: bālānāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ yadi etādṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ paropadravakāritā nāma, tadā na khalu svabhāvāḥ
T04bsa054_u:3454: paryanuyogamarhanti- kimiti parāpakāraṃ kurvanti te? iti paribhāvya teṣu
T04bsa054_u:3461: atha doṣo 'yamāgantuḥ anya eva na tatsvabhāvabhūtaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3463: doṣā hi duṣṭasvabhāvāḥ, na tatsvabhāvāḥ sattvāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3466: na hi kaṭutā nāma nirmalasyākāśasya svabhāvaḥ, api tu dhūmasya /
T04bsa054_u:3467: ataśca taddoṣeṇa dhūma eva doṣo yujyate, nākāśe prakṛtipariśuddhe /
T04bsa054_u:3470: yadeva hi pradhānaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam, tatra yukto bhavet
T04bsa054_u:3472: mukhyaṃ daṇḍādikaṃ hitvā prerake yadi kupyate /
T04bsa054_u:3473: dveṣeṇa preritaḥ so 'pi dveṣe dveṣo 'stu me varam // Bca_6.41 //
T04bsa054_u:3475: tato daṇḍa eva mukhyaṃ duḥkhakāraṇamiti tatraiva kopo yuktaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3476: atha parapreritasya daṇḍasya ko doṣaḥ? tena preraka eva dveṣyo bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:3478: 'pi daṇḍaprerakaḥ prerita iti dveṣe dveṣo mama yukto na prerake //
T04bsa054_u:3480: nādattaṃ kiṃcidupabhujyate sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:3481: iti vicintya parāpakāre 'pi na tatra cittaṃ pradūṣayedityāha-
T04bsa054_u:3484: pūrvaṃ janmāntare mayāpi sattvānāmevaṃvidhaiva pīḍā kṛtā yasmāt,
T04bsa054_u:3487: yadyasya kāraṇaṃ tasmādetadutpadyate nānyasmāditi parāmṛśya parāpakāraṃ
T04bsa054_u:3489: tacchasraṃ mama kāyaśca dvayaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:3490: tena śasraṃ mayā kāyo gṛhītaḥ kutra kupyate // Bca_6.43 //
T04bsa054_u:3493: tathāhi tasyāpakāriṇaḥ śastraṃ khaṅgādi mama kāyaśca, etaddvayaṃ sāmagrīrūpaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:3494: iti samarthakāraṇasadbhāve 'pi kāryaṃ kathaṃ notpadyeta? anyathā tattasya kāraṇameva na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:3496: 'nyadapi kāraṇaṃ syāt, tataḥ..........] tasmādyādi kāraṇopanāyake kupyate,
T04bsa054_u:3498: yataḥ svayamapi duḥkhakāraṇaṃ vahatyupanayati ca bhavān /
T04bsa054_u:3499: ātmanyakope paratrāpi na yukta iti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:3502: tṛṣṇāndhena mayā tatra vyathāyāṃ kutra kupyate // Bca_6.44 //
T04bsa054_u:3506: duḥkhaparihārāya sukhaprāptaye ca yā tṛṣṇā abhilāṣaḥ, tadandhena pihitaprajñālocanena tasyāṃ vyathāyāṃ satyāṃ kutra kupyate? na hi gaṇḍasya kuḍyādisaṃparkaje duḥkhe kvacidvivekataḥ kopo yuktaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:3514: tasya punaḥ kāraṇaṃ śarīraṃ pratyapakāriṇaṃ cecchāmi /
T04bsa054_u:3518: ātmavadhāya svayaṃ saṃskṛtaśastrasyaiva anyatra mama kopo na yukta ityāha-
T04bsa054_u:3520: matkarmajanitā eva tathedaṃ kutra kupyate // Bca_6.46 //
T04bsa054_u:3525: vane tasminnivāsino gṛdhrolūkavāyasādayaḥ pakṣiṇo yathā matkarmajanitā eva duḥkhahetavo bhavanti
T04bsa054_u:3527: tathā idamapi paraśastrādikaṃ duḥkhaheturmatkarmajanitameva, iti kutra kupyate?
T04bsa054_u:3530: yena yāsyanti narakānmayaivāmī hatā nanu // Bca_6.47 //
T04bsa054_u:3531: yena madīyena karmaṇā coditāḥ preritā eva mayi pūrvakṛtāpakāre apakāriṇo jātāḥ santo narakān yāsyanti, tena mayaivāmī apakāriṇo hatā nanu /
T04bsa054_u:3533: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yadi nākariṣyamahamīdṛśaṃ karma, tadā ete 'pi nāpakāriṇo 'bhaviṣyanniti
T04bsa054_u:3536: etānāśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
T04bsa054_u:3537: māmāśritya tu yāntyete narakān dīrghavedanān // Bca_6.48 //
T04bsa054_u:3540: etānapakāriṇa āśritya nimittīkṛtya mama pāpaṃ pūrvajanmakṛtaparāpakārajanitaṃ kṣīyate tadduḥkhānubhavanavipākena kṣayaṃ yāti /
T04bsa054_u:3543: māmāśritya matkarmacoditāḥ evamapyapakāraṃ kṛtvā punarete narakān tīvravedanān duḥsahaduḥkhānubhavān yānti /
T04bsa054_u:3544: ata uktakrameṇa ahameva apakārī eṣāmityādi subodham //
T04bsa054_u:3545: (Bcp 94) nanu yadyapakārī bhavān, tarhi bhavata eva narakagamanamucitam,
T04bsa054_u:3548: eṣāmatra kimāyātaṃ yadyātmā rakṣito mayā // Bca_6.50 //
T04bsa054_u:3551: na tu punareṣāṃ durāśayatayā narakeṣu mamāpatanamiti bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3554: samudāyārthaḥ- yadyahamapakārī sannapi kenacidupāyakauśalena narakān na yāmi, tadaiṣāmu[ma?]pakāriṇāṃ kimāyātam, kimapakṣīyate? kā kṣatirityarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3555: mayā tāvadekena rakṣitā na bhavantāmanye, rakṣita ātmā ca bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:3556: na caitāvatā kiṃcideṣāṃ nyūnādhikaṃ guṇadoṣeṣu syāt //
T04bsa054_u:3557: nanu yadi nāma evam, tathāpi bhavato 'pi na yuktamātmarakṣaṇamupakārikṛtajñatayā ityāśaṅkayāha-
T04bsa054_u:3558: atha pratyapakārī syāṃ tathāpyete na rakṣitāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3559: hīyate cāpi me caryā tasmānnaṣṭāstapasvinaḥ // Bca_6.51 //
T04bsa054_u:3560: yadi daṇḍādighātaṃ kurvatsu pratyapakārī bhaveyam, tathāpi ete rakṣitā na bhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:3561: na kaścideṣāṃ pratīkāro narakagamanādiṣu kṛtaḥ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:3563: tathā sarvasattveṣu na maitracittaṃ mayā niści[kṣepta?]tavyam /
T04bsa054_u:3566: tasmādetarhi pratīkāropāyābhāvāttapasvino varākā rakśitumaśakyatvānnaṣṭā durgatipatitā eva
T04bsa054_u:3568: paścāttadupāyamadhigamya tatkariṣyāmi yathaiṣāṃ duḥkhamaṇumātrakamapi na syāt //
T04bsa054_u:3573: dvividhaṃ duḥkhamavicārato bādhakamupajāyate kāyikaṃ mānasikaṃ ceti /
T04bsa054_u:3574: tatra manasi na kaściddaṇḍādikaṃ dātuṃ śaktaḥ, amūrtatvānmanasaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3575: iti tadudbhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ paramārthato na saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:3578: mamedaṃ śarīramiti vikalpābhyāsavāsanāvaśāt kāyaduḥkhena cittaṃ vihanyate //
T04bsa054_u:3581: kāyaṃ na bādhate tena cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi // Bca_6.53 //
T04bsa054_u:3583: na hi kāyasyāyaṃ kaṃcidupaghātaṃ karotīti yena, tena cetaḥ kasmāddhetoḥ
T04bsa054_u:3585: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma nyakkārādayaḥ kāyasya bādhakā na bhavanti, tathāpi tacchrutvā mayi lokānāmaprasannaṃ cittamutpadyate, iti mayā neṣyate
T04bsa054_u:3587: mayyaprasādo yo 'nyeṣāṃ sa māṃ kiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:3588: iha janmāntare vāpi yenāsau me 'nabhīpsitaḥ // Bca_6.54 //
T04bsa054_u:3591: 'yamaprasādo janānām, sa kiṃ māṃ bhakṣayiṣyati ihaloke paraloka vā,
T04bsa054_u:3592: yenāsau lokāprasādo mamāpriyaḥ, iti vicārya na kartavyo 'trābhiniveśaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:3595: naṅkṣyatīhaiva me lābhaḥ pāpaṃ tu sthāsyati dhruvam // Bca_6.55 //
T04bsa054_u:3602: tannimittaṃ nyakkārādikartṛṣu krudhyato yatpāpaṃ tadeva paraṃ sthāsyati paralokānubandhi bhaviṣyati
T04bsa054_u:3606: yasmācciramapi sthitvā mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ tadeva me // Bca_6.56 //
T04bsa054_u:3607: idameva varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yallābhābhāvādasminnevāhani me maraṇamastu, na tu punaḥ parāpakāradvāreṇa lābhapratilambhānmithyājīvitaṃ ciraṃ dīrghakālam /
T04bsa054_u:3608: kutaḥ? yasmādvahutarakālamapi jīvitvā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam ityavaśyaṃbhāvino mṛtyorduḥkhaṃ tadeva mama /
T04bsa054_u:3610: bhaviṣyati, tadevedānīṃ mama mriyamāṇasya iti cirajīviteṣvaviśeṣaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:3612: svapne varṣaśataṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yaśca vibudhyate /
T04bsa054_u:3613: muhūrtamaparo yaśca sukhī bhūtvā vibudhyate // Bca_6.57 //
T04bsa054_u:3619: anayordvayorapi svapnopalabdhopabhuktasukhayoḥ prativibuddhayoḥ satoḥ tadupalabdhaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ na nivartate, jāgradavasthāyāṃ
T04bsa054_u:3625: labdhvāpi ca bahūṃllābhān ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhānyapi /
T04bsa054_u:3626: riktahastaśca nagraśca yāsyāmi muṣito yathā // Bca_6.59 //
T04bsa054_u:3631: kaṭisūtrakamātramapi na pariśeṣitamiti nagnaśca cauraiḥ parimuṣita iva asmāllokātparaṃ lokaṃ yāsyāmi //
T04bsa054_u:3634: / tataśca pūrvakṛtapāpasya vidūṣaṇāsamudācārādinā parikṣayaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaraparirakṣaṇena bodhicittasevanādinā ca kuśalapakṣasya ca
T04bsa054_u:3639: ato lābhāntarāyakāriṇi yukta eva pradveṣa ityāśaṅkayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:3640: pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet /
T04bsa054_u:3641: lābhāduktakrameṇa jīvan dhriyamāṇaḥ pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca karomītyādi manyase /
T04bsa054_u:3642: nanu etaditaḥ samadhikaṃ doṣamapaśyatā abhidhīyata ityāha-
T04bsa054_u:3643: puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu // Bca_6.60 //
T04bsa054_u:3644: lābhārthaṃ lābhanimittaṃ tadantarāyakāriṇi dveṣaṃ kurvataḥ sukṛtakṣaya evopajāyate /
T04bsa054_u:3646: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ- akṣāntisamudbhavasya pāpasya rāśirabhivardhate //
T04bsa054_u:3647: athāpi syāt- yathākathaṃcit tāvaccirakālaṃ lābhājjīvitaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:3654: tad yadi sukṛtakṣayanimittameva tat syāt, tadā kiṃ tena tādṛśena jīvitenāpi kevalāśubhakarmakaraṇaśīlena? ninditameva taditi bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:3658: parāyaśaskare 'pyevaṃ kopaste kiṃ na jāyate // Bca_6.62 //
T04bsa054_u:3668: pareṣāmanyasattvānāmayaśaḥ prakāśayati, tatrāpi kopaste kiṃ na jāyate? so
T04bsa054_u:3676: parāśritāprasādattvādaprasādiṣu aprasannacitteṣu avarṇavādiṣu tava kṣamā kṣāntirūtpadyate
T04bsa054_u:3680: yadi yaḥ parāyattāprasādaḥ tatra kṣamā bhavato bhavati, tadā svasminnavarṇavādini kiṃ na kṣamā? kiṃrūpe? kleśotpādanaparāyatte kleśānāmutpādaparatantre /
T04bsa054_u:3685: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā // Bca_6.64 //
T04bsa054_u:3689: kutaḥ? yasmādbuddhādīnāṃ bodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vitathābhiniveśaprasūtātmagrāhanivṛtterabhiṣvaṅgābhāvānna vyathā cittapīḍālakṣaṇaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nāsti /
T04bsa054_u:3692: tathā viruddhadharmakāriṣu karuṇaiva tu yujyate teṣu sādhūnām /
T04bsa054_u:3694: yadi punardharmato nivārayituṃ śakyate, tadā na doṣaḥ
T04bsa054_u:3703: tathā priyāṇāṃ premasthānānāṃ cāpakāriṣu kopaṃ nivārayediti saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3709: tadanena yathā aparasamaye devagurudvijātimātāpitṛprabhṛtīnāmarthe pāpaṃ kurvato 'pi na doṣa
T04bsa054_u:3712: idamapi vastutattvaṃ manasi kurvatā na sattveṣu cittaṃ
T04bsa054_u:3715: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ // Bca_6.66 //
T04bsa054_u:3717: sā ca sāmagrī vastudharmatayā kācit kvacit samarthasvabhāvā /
T04bsa054_u:3722: svayameva yadṛcchayā vā loṣṭakuḍyādyabhighātajanitā vā dehināṃ śarīriṇāṃ niyatā vyathā niyamena samutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:3724: sā caivaṃ dvividhakāraṇasāmagrīprasūtāpi cetane savijñānake kāye dṛṣṭā pramāṇapariniścitā
T04bsa054_u:3728: tato yad yasyotpattisthānaṃ tat tatraiva bhavati nānyatra,
T04bsa054_u:3730: ataḥ asmānyāyāt kṣamasva sahasva enāmanantarakathitobhayarūpāṃ vyathām //
T04bsa054_u:3731: tadānīmubhayorapi sādhāraṇadūṣaṇatayā kvacidapi kopo na yukta iti
T04bsa054_u:3734: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam // Bca_6.67 //
T04bsa054_u:3740: itthaṃ brūmaḥ- kam eṣu kleśarākṣasāveśavaśīkṛteṣu nirdoṣam, kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam?
T04bsa054_u:3742: (Bcp 99) idamapi ca ātmagatameva cintayatā pratighacittaṃ nivartayitavyamityāha-
T04bsa054_u:3743: kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3751: evam, tathāpi pratīkāro yukta ityāha- sarva ityādi /
T04bsa054_u:3752: sarve duḥkhahetavaḥ karmapratyayopajanitapravṛttayaḥ iti ko 'hamatra anyathākṛtau
T04bsa054_u:3756: evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham /
T04bsa054_u:3757: yena sarve bhaviṣyanti maitracittāḥ parasparam // Bca_6.69 //
T04bsa054_u:3758: ete sattvāḥ karmakleśaparāyattāḥ parasparamasamañjasakarmakāriṇo nivartayitumaśakyā iti /
T04bsa054_u:3759: evaṃ buddhvā jñātvā punaḥ puṇyeṣu kuśaleṣu karmasu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham, tena prakāreṇa vīryaṃ samārabhe, yena tathāvidhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ pratilabhya sanmārge pravartitāḥ santaḥ sarve maitracittā hitasukhavidhānatatparāḥ parasparamanyonyaṃ bhaviṣyanti //
T04bsa054_u:3760: drohacittaṃ vinivartya priyavastūpaghātakāriṇi laukikodāharaṇena dveṣaṃ nivartayediti ślokadvayamupadarśayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:3765: ekasmin gṛhe 'gninā dahyamāne yathā tasmād gṛhādanyad gṛhaṃ gṛhāntaraṃ
T04bsa054_u:3767: agniryatra tṛṇakāṣṭhādau sajjate lagati, tadantargatamanyadapi vastu mā dhākṣīditi śaṅkayā tadākṛṣyāpanīyate, pṛthak kṛtvā nirdhāryate,
T04bsa054_u:3769: evamuktodāharaṇanyāyena cittaṃ mano yasya vastuna āsaṅgādāsakto dahyate paritapyate dveṣavahninā pratighānalena tadāsaṅgasthānaṃ vastu tatkṣaṇaṃ na kālāntarapalimbena parityājyaṃ tatrābhiniveśaḥ parihartavyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3772: tasya uktakrameṇa uddāhaḥ parikṣayo mā bhūt /
T04bsa054_u:3775: lābha evāyaṃ labdhaḥ, yanmanuṣyaduḥkhairnarakaphalaṃ karma vipacyate iti pratipādayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:3778: (Bcp 100) yo hi māraṇamarhati, sa yadi hastamātraṃ chittvā mucyate, tadā na kācit kṣatirasya
T04bsa054_u:3779: pratyuta labdhalābhamātmānaṃ manyate atyalpamidaṃ maraṇaduḥkhāt karacchedanaduḥkhamiti /
T04bsa054_u:3780: tathā yo 'pi manuṣyaduḥkhaṃ tāḍanabandhanatiraskārādikṛtamanubhūya narakaduḥkhādvimukto bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:3784: tato yadi vicakṣaṇaḥ syāt, tadā saumanasyamevātra yuktamasya //
T04bsa054_u:3785: athāpi syāt- na mayā svalpamātre 'pi duḥkhe kṣamā kartuṃ śakyata iti,
T04bsa054_u:3789: khaṭacapeṭaloṣṭādiprahārakṛtamīṣanmātramapi duḥkhamidānīṃ soḍhuṃ marṣituṃ na pāryate na śakyate
T04bsa054_u:3790: tadatra bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmaḥ- yadi evameva, tadayaṃ nārakaduḥkhasaṃvartanīyaḥ krodhaḥ kopaḥ kasmātkāraṇānna vāryate? ayameva hi atitarāṃ narakeṣu duḥkhadāyaka iti duḥkhabhīrūṇāmeva krodhaṃ nivartayituṃ yuktaṃ syāt //
T04bsa054_u:3792: yadyapi soḍhuṃ na śakyate, tathāpi taddhetukakarmasaṃbhavādanicchato 'pi duḥkhamāpatiṣyati bhavataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:3794: marṣaṇāt punastasya mahārthalābho bhaviṣyatīti vṛttadvayena śikṣayitumāha-
T04bsa054_u:3796: kārito 'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā // Bca_6.74 //
T04bsa054_u:3797: na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:3804: evaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāpi mayā na ca naiva ātmārthaḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalasādhanaḥ kṛto niṣpāditaḥ

T04bsa054_u:3838: yadapi ca bhavataḥ svātmasukhanimittaṃ svabhṛtyādiṣu bhṛtidānaṃ karmamūlyadānam, tathā upakārakāriṇi pratyupakārakaraṇam /

T04bsa054_u:4148: anyathā me kathaṃ kṣāntirbhiṣajīva hitodyate // Bca_6.110 //
T04bsa054_u:4149: apakāraḥ āśayaḥ asya śatroḥ, ityevamabhisaṃdhāya śatruryadi na pūjyate dānamānairna satkriyate
T04bsa054_u:4150: anyatheti apakāriṇi dveṣacittamanivārayataḥ kathaṃ mama kṣāntiḥ? tadapakāramasahamānasya (Bcp 110) pratyapakāraṃ vā kurvato naiva yuktetyarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4152: hitodyate, suvaidyavad hitasukhavidhāyake yatra premagauravameva sadā,
T04bsa054_u:4158: sa evātaḥ kṣamāhetuḥ pūjyaḥ saddharmavanmayā // Bca_6.111 //
T04bsa054_u:4159: yato bhiṣajīva hitodyate kṣāntirna yuktā, ataḥ asmāddhetoḥ tasya
T04bsa054_u:4162: ataḥ asmāt sa eva yasyāśayaṃ pratītyotpadyate kṣamā
T04bsa054_u:4165: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kiṃ mamānena āśayavicāreṇa prayojanam? abhimatasādhyasiddhau cedupayujyate,
T04bsa054_u:4168: mama tu śubhodayaheturevāyam, iti kathamiva pūjanīyo na bhavediti /
T04bsa054_u:4172: etānārādhya bahavaḥ saṃpatpāraṃ yato gatāḥ // Bca_6.112 //
T04bsa054_u:4177: kutaḥ? yato yasmādetān sattvān jināṃśca ārādhya ānukūlyānuṣṭhānena bahavo buddhatvamadhigamya sarvalaukikalokottarasarvasaṃpattiparyantaṃ prāptāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:4178: syādetat- yadi nāma sattvā api sarvasaṃpattihetavaḥ, tathāpi tathāgataiḥ saha sādhāraṇatā na yukteti /
T04bsa054_u:4181: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ // Bca_6.113 //
T04bsa054_u:4182: ubhayebhyo 'pi buddhadharmāṇāṃ balavaiśāradyādīnāmāgame pratilambhe tulye aviśiṣṭe /
T04bsa054_u:4184: ataḥ sādhāraṇe 'pi hetubhāve jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvat, tadvanna sattveṣu /
T04bsa054_u:4185: ityevaṃ kaḥkramaḥ paripāṭiḥ prekṣāvatām? naiva yuktetyarthaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:4186: nanu ca sattvānāṃ rāgādimalairhīnāśayatvāt kāraṇatve 'pi kathaṃ bhagavatsamānatā yujyate ityāśaṅkayāha-
T04bsa054_u:4187: āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4188: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ // Bca_6.114 //
T04bsa054_u:4189: (Bcp 111) yadyapi bhagavatāmaparimitapuṇyajñānopajanitamanuttaramiha māhātmyam, tathāpi upayuktopayogitvena hetubhāvasya tulyatvāt samaṃ māhātmyamucyate /
T04bsa054_u:4190: tena hetunā te sattvāḥ samāḥ jinaistulyā ucyante iti nātra viśeṣaḥ kriyate //
T04bsa054_u:4194: sattveṣu maitracittavihārī punaryatpūjyate janaiḥ, tattasyaiva maitryāśayasya pratyātmagataṃ māhātmyaṃ nānyasya /
T04bsa054_u:4199: na tu buddhaiḥ samāḥ kecidanantāṃśairguṇārṇavaiḥ // Bca_6.116 //
T04bsa054_u:4201: paramārthatastu na buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ samāḥ kecit sattvāḥ santi /
T04bsa054_u:4212: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam // Bca_6.117 //
T04bsa054_u:4213: guṇeṣu pradhānānāmekarāśayo ye bhagavantaḥ, teṣāṃ guṇaḥ aṇurapi
T04bsa054_u:4216: yadi kvacit sattvaviśeṣe dṛśyate pratīyate, tasya tadguṇādhārasya pūjānimittaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam /
T04bsa054_u:4224: sattvārādhanamutsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet // Bca_6.119 //
T04bsa054_u:4226: aparyantopakāriṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ tatkṛtāpakārasya niṣkrayaṇaṃ pariśodhanamiti yāvat /
T04bsa054_u:4229: prabhucittānukūlavartina eva bhṛtyasya vāñchitaṃ sidhyatītyavagamya sattvārādhanamevopādeyamiti
T04bsa054_u:4230: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīciṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:4232: karacaraṇaśironayanasvamāṃsāni chittvā chittvā pradattāni yeṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānāya, tathā avīcīmapi paraduḥkhaduḥkhino yeṣāṃ kṛte praviśanti tatsamuddharaṇāya /
T04bsa054_u:4234: tatra teṣu sattveṣu kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:4235: anyathā tu kṛtamapi na kṛtaṃ bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:4237: yenaivam, tena paramāpakāriṣvapi na cittaṃ dūṣayitavyam /
T04bsa054_u:4238: kiṃ tu sarvamanekaprakāraṃ kāyavāṅmanobhirvā kalyāṇameva hitasukhameva vidhātavyameteṣu //
T04bsa054_u:4240: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yadarthamātmanyapi nirvyapeikṣāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4241: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam // Bca_6.121
T04bsa054_u:4242: mama svāmina eva buddhādayaḥ svayameva ātmanaiva /
T04bsa054_u:4246: uktakrameṇa nirapekṣā nirabhiṣvaṅgāḥ tṛṇavat parityajanti, tadahaṃ punaḥ teṣāṃ bhṛtyaḥ teṣu sattveṣu prabhuputreṣvatyantapriyeṣu kathaṃ karomi mānam, kimiti jānanneva tān pratikūlayāmi? na tu dāsabhāvam, na punardāsībhūyārādhayāmi?
T04bsa054_u:4247: ito 'pi ca sattvāpakāraṃ parityajya tadārādhanameva kartavyamityāha-
T04bsa054_u:4248: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
T04bsa054_u:4250: yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ priyaputrāṇāmiva pitaro munīndrā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sukhe kāyamanojanmani mudaṃ harṣaṃ yānti, yeṣāṃ ca duḥkhe manyuṃ praviśanti aparitoṣamāsādayanti /
T04bsa054_u:4257: sattvavyathāyāmapi tadvadeva na prītyupāyo 'sti dayāmayānām // Bca_6.123
T04bsa054_u:4258: samantāt sarvāvayavānabhivyāpya vahninā prajvalitaśarīrasya yathā pañcakāmaguṇairna saumanasyam, kāyikamapi sukhaṃ nāsti, tasya prajvalitatvādeva duḥkhenākrāntatvāt, tadvat tathaiva sattvānāṃ vyathāyāṃ duḥkhavedanāyāṃ na prīteḥ saumanasyasya upāyo heturasti kṛpātmakānāṃ bhagavatām tasmādaparijñānena kleśagrahāveśavaśena vā sattvāpakārakarmaṇā
T04bsa054_u:4261: tadadya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditāstanmunayaḥ kṣamantām // Bca_6.124
T04bsa054_u:4262: yasmādevaṃ sattvāpakāre munīnāmapakṛtaṃ syāt, tasmāt pāpam adya idānīṃ
T04bsa054_u:4264: punarevaṃ saṃprajānanna kariṣyāmi, iti āyatyāṃ saṃvaramāpadye /
T04bsa054_u:4265: yadi pratirūpamācaritaṃ tatra me kṣāntiṃ kurvantu anukampāmupādāya //
T04bsa054_u:4268: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughā vighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:4269: tathāgatānāmabhipretasaṃpādanāya loke lokaviṣaye sarvātmanā kāyena vācā manasā vā dāsībhāvaṃ svīkaromi /
T04bsa054_u:4270: te 'pi me prasādaṃ kurvanto mastake pādaṃ nidadhatu /
T04bsa054_u:4272: anena mayi purvāparādhamapāsya jagatāṃ patirbhagavān saṃtuṣṭamānaso bhavatu //
T04bsa054_u:4273: (Bcp 114) bhagavatsu ca gauravakāribhiḥ sattveṣvanādaro na kartavya iti
T04bsa054_u:4275: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagattaiḥ kṛpātmabhirnaiva hi saṃśayo 'sti /
T04bsa054_u:4276: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarūpāsta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra // Bca_6.126 //
T04bsa054_u:4277: sarvatragadharmadhātuprativedhāt sarvasattvasamatāpādanaparātmaparivartanādinā vā ātmīkṛtaṃ svīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat, na kiyadeva /
T04bsa054_u:4281: tasmāt sattvarūpeṇa buddhā bhagavanta evaite sattvā dṛśyante /
T04bsa054_u:4282: tena kimanādaro 'tra mūḍhacetasām? naiva yukta iti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:4293: vikartuṃ naiva śaknoti dīrghadarśī mahājanaḥ // Bca_6.128 //
T04bsa054_u:4297: sa ca āgāmirājadaṇḍabhayadarśitayā mahājano vacanamātreṇāpi yāvadvikāramupagantumasamarthaḥ
T04bsa054_u:4300: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam /
T04bsa054_u:4305: tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcidaparāddhaṃ vimānayet // Bca_6.129 //
T04bsa054_u:4311: kutaḥ? yasmānnarakapālāśca tadapakāramiva pratyapakāriṇo 'nvācarantaḥ (?) kṛpāvantaśca jinādayaḥ tatpakṣapātino balam /
T04bsa054_u:4312: kathamivārādhayet? adhṛṣyaṃ rājānaṃ sarvānuvṛttikaraṇānujīvino yathā, tathā //
T04bsa054_u:4321: kiṃbhūtam? yena duḥkhajātena nārakī vedanā anubhūyate //
T04bsa054_u:4325: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥsausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi // Bca_6.133 //
T04bsa054_u:4327: cakravartisukhaṃ sphītaṃ kṣamī prāpnoti saṃsaran // Bca_6.134 //
T04bsa054_u:4328: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ
T04bsa054_u:4331: tadevaṃ vipakṣapratiṣedhena tridhā kṣāntiṃ pratipādya vīryaṃ
T04bsa054_u:4333: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
T04bsa054_u:4334: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vināgatiḥ // Bca_7.1 //
T04bsa054_u:4345: tadanena vīryāt puṇyajñānasaṃbhārau, tābhyāṃ ca buddhatvamityuktaṃ bhavati //
T04bsa054_u:4350: yo 'yaṃ kuśalakarmaṇi dānādau śrutādau ca samudyamaḥ, tadvīryamabhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:4352: vipakṣeṇopahataṃ vīryamanaṅgamevābhimatasiddhaye iti tadvipakṣamapanayanāya darśayitumāha- tadvipakṣa ityādi /
T04bsa054_u:4353: tasya vīryasya viruddho vināśāya pakṣo vipakṣaḥ ka ucyate? uttaramāha- ālasyamityādi /
T04bsa054_u:4364: saṃsāraduḥkhānudvegādasaṃvegāt, yo 'yamavyāpāro nirvyāpāratā, tatra tena vā sukhāsvādaḥ sukhābhirāmaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4369: saṃsāraduḥkhānudvegādavyāpāraḥ, kvacidapi kuśalakarmaṇi na pravṛttiḥ, tasmāt sukhāsvādaḥ, tato nidrā, tasyāśca
T04bsa054_u:4378: janmavāgurām, nikāyasabhāgatotpattireva vāgurikā jālam, tat praviṣṭaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:4381: adyāpi etāṃ daśāṃ prāpto 'pi mṛtyormukhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ san kimiti na vetsi?
T04bsa054_u:4385: tathāpi nidrāṃ yāsyeva caṇḍālamahiṣo yathā // Bca_7.5 //
T04bsa054_u:4386: yūthaṃ vargaḥ, tatra bhavā yūthyāḥ, yaiḥ saha bālyādyavasthāyāṃ
T04bsa054_u:4392: tena tāvatkālaṃ sukhānubhavanameva mama yuktamityatrāha- yadi nāmaivam, tathāpi nāvaśyaṃbhāvini maraṇe viśvāso yuktaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4394: kathaṃ te rocate bhoktuṃ kathaṃ nidrā kathaṃ ratiḥ // Bca_7.6 //
T04bsa054_u:4395: iti vadhyapuruṣasyeva sarvato vadhyaghātakairadhiṣṭhitasya vadhyabhūmiṃ nīyamānasya niḥsaraṇamapaśyataḥ sukhāsikāvalambanamanucitameva bhavataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4397: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma avaśyaṃbhāvitā mṛtyoḥ, tathāpi tatsaṃnidhānamavagamya ālasyamapahāsyāmi
T04bsa054_u:4400: saṃbhṛtaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ saṃbhāraḥ sāmagrī vadhāya vyādhijarālakṣaṇo yena /
T04bsa054_u:4403: tadā mṛtyumukhāntargataḥ asamaye ālasyaṃ tyaktvāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi? na tadā kiṃcit prayojanamiti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:4411: idaṃ yadanāgate kartavyatayā manasikṛtaṃ tanna prāptam /
T04bsa054_u:4415: aho bata atikaṣṭam, hato 'smīti vicintayan vihvalaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasītyanāgatena saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4418: tena samucchūnāni samunnatāni sāśrūṇi sabāṣpāṇi raktāni tāmravarṇāni locanāni yeṣu ānaneṣu tāni tathā /
T04bsa054_u:4419: tathābhūtāni ānanāni mukhāni yeṣāṃ bandhūnāṃ te tathā /
T04bsa054_u:4425: maraṇasamayopasthitakṛtāntānucaramukhāni ca saroṣaparuṣabhṛkuṭīni saṃpaśyan vihvalaḥ kiṃ kariṣyasi?
T04bsa054_u:4426: svayaṃkṛtapāpakarmasmaraṇena maraṇasamaye kimityevaṃ mayā kṛtamiti paścāttāpena tāpitaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4427: naitāvanmātrameva, kiṃ tu śṛṇvannādāṃśca nārakān tīvrakāraṇānubhavanadukhanirmuktān vikrośitaśabdān narakasamudbhūtān arthāntarakopāṇāmeva (?) /
T04bsa054_u:4428: tacchrutvā mamāpyevamevāvasthā iti saṃtrāsena yaḥ purīṣotsargo viṭpravṛttiḥ, tenopaliptagātraḥ
T04bsa054_u:4431: iti matvā svasthāvasthāyāmeva yatitavyam iti śikṣayitumāha-
T04bsa054_u:4434: jīvanta eva matsyāḥ krameṇa bhakṣaṇārthaṃ prāyaḥ prāgdiṅanivāsibhireva janai rakṣyante /
T04bsa054_u:4435: jīvanopalakṣitā matsyā jīvamatsyā iti teṣāmeva samayaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4437: tadvadahamapi adya śvo vā niyatameva mariṣyāmi iti manasi kṛtvā yuktaṃ bhayamihaiva te /
T04bsa054_u:4438: ihaiva saṃprajānadavasthāyāmeva tavāsaṃprāptamaraṇasya maraṇataḥ, kiṃ punaḥ kṛtapāpasya bhavato bhayaṃ yuktaṃ na bhavati, ityapi āhāryam /
T04bsa054_u:4442: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate // Bca_7.12 //
T04bsa054_u:4454: mṛtyunā ca vaśīkṛto 'si, atha ca amaraṇadharmāṇamātmānaṃ manyase /
T04bsa054_u:4455: evaṃ ca viparyastaṃ caritamasya vipaśyan karuṇāyamānaḥ sakhedamenamāha- hā duḥkhita vihanyase
T04bsa054_u:4462: mūḍha kālo na nidrāyā iyaṃ naurdurlabhā punaḥ // Bca_7.14 //
T04bsa054_u:4463: aṣṭākṣaṇavinirmuktaṃ manuṣyabhāvapratilambhaṃ nāvamiva abhyudayādipāragamanāya prāpya tara plavasva duḥkhamayīṃ mahānadīm /
T04bsa054_u:4467: nāyaṃ kālo nidrāyāḥ, yāvadiyaṃ nauḥ saṃnihitā /
T04bsa054_u:4469: kriyate, tadā punariyaṃ durgatigatasya naurdurlabhā bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:4479: sugatiparaṃparāsaṃjananādanantā aparyavasānā ratisaṃtatiḥ sukhapravāho yasyāḥ sā tathā /
T04bsa054_u:4490: evaṃ kutsitāsaktimapi nirākṛtya viṣādātmāvamanyanāṃ vīryavipakṣaṃ nirākartum, aparamapi ca tadvipakṣanirasanāya pratipādayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:4504: kuto me bodhiriti, kathamahaṃ varākaḥ samyaksaṃbodhibhājanam? buddhatvaṃ hi tīkṣṇendriyasya ārabdhavīryasya aparimitapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraiḥ atiduṣkarakarmānuṣṭhānaiḥ anekaiśca kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ kasyacit puruṣaviśeṣasya sādhyaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:4505: ahaṃ tu na tādṛśa iti kathaṃ madvidhānāṃ tathāvidhaṃ buddhatvaṃ saṃbhāvyeta, ityevamākāramanasikārādavasādo viṣādo na kartavyaḥ, mahārthabhraṃśasya hetutvāt /
T04bsa054_u:4509: yasmāt tathāgataḥ idaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ satyamavitathamuktavān kathitavān /
T04bsa054_u:4518: śākyamuniratnaśikhidīpaṃkaraprabhṛtayaḥ saṃsārasāgarāvartāntargatāḥ pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ paribhramanta evaṃbhūtā evāsan babhūvuḥ,
T04bsa054_u:4519: yairutsāhabalāt vīryotkarṣasāmarthyāt saṃbhārān saṃbhṛtya prāptā adhigatā durāpā durlabhapratilambhā bodhiruttamā anuttarā /
T04bsa054_u:4522: ato mama punaratitarāṃ na durlabhā bodhirityāha-
T04bsa054_u:4523: kimutāhaṃ naro jātyā śakto jñātuṃ hitāhitam /
T04bsa054_u:4528: hitamidamahitam, śubhamaśubhaṃ ca karmetyupadiṣṭam, jñātumavaboddhuṃ samartho 'smi, iti vicintya sarvajñasya sarvavastutattvavedinaḥ nītirnayaḥ upādeyatattvapratipādanam /
T04bsa054_u:4535: iha bodhisattvo naivaṃ cittamutpādayati- duṣprāpyā bodhirmanuṣyabhūtena satā /
T04bsa054_u:4536: idaṃ ca me vīryaṃ parīttaṃ ca hīnaṃ ca /
T04bsa054_u:4538: bodhiśca ādīptaśiraścailopamena bahūn kalpān bahūni kalpaśatāni bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi samudācaratā samudānetavyā /
T04bsa054_u:4542: ye 'pi te 'bhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, ye 'pi vā
T04bsa054_u:4543: abhisaṃbhotsyante, te 'pi īdṛśenaiva nayena, īdṛśyā pratipadā, īdṛśenaiva
T04bsa054_u:4544: vīryeṇābhisaṃbuddhāḥ, yāvanna ca te tathāgatabhūtā evābhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:4545: ahamapi tathā tathā ghaṭiṣye, tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye sarvasattvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasattvārambaṇena vīryeṇa yathāhamapyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti //
T04bsa054_u:4548: karacaraṇaśiraḥ prabhṛtidānamantareṇa buddhatvaṃ na prāpyate, iti atiduṣkarakarmasu pravṛttibhayādutsāho nivartata eva /
T04bsa054_u:4552: alpe bahutaraṃ bahutare cālpataramiti mohavaśena avicārato 'vivekānmama syāt, na tu paramārthavicārataḥ

T04bsa054_u:5424: sarvavikṣepaśamanī sarvavikṣepasya kāyavāṅmānasikasya durācārasya śamanī nivartanī samādhānahetutvāt
T04bsa054_u:5427: tadevaṃ janasaṃparkavivarjanāt kāyavivekaṃ pratipādya cittavivekaṃ pratipādayitumāha-
T04bsa054_u:5429: samādhānāya cittasya prayatiṣye damāya ca // Bca_8.39 //
T04bsa054_u:5430: sarvā yā anyacintā asadvitarkasvabhāvāḥ, tābhirnirmuktaḥ, tadvirahitaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5431: svacittaikāgramānasaḥ svacittameva ekamagraṃ pradhānaṃ yasmin mānase manasikāre tat tathoktam, tādṛśaṃ mānasaṃ yasya sa tathā /
T04bsa054_u:5432: svacittaṃ vā ekāgramekāyattaṃ tatpracāravyavalokanatatparaṃ niyatālambanapratibaddhaṃ vā mānasaṃ yasyeti samāsaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5436: damāya ceti punaḥpunastatraivālambane niyojanāya, bahirvikṣepanivāraṇāya vā //
T04bsa054_u:5439: kāmā hyanarthajanakā iha loke paratra ca /
T04bsa054_u:5441: aprahīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ kamanīyatayā adhyavasitatvāt kāmā rūpādayo viṣayā ucyante /
T04bsa054_u:5446: na ca pāpamakīrtirvā yadarthaṃ gaṇitā purā // Bca_8.41 //
T04bsa054_u:5450: prakāmaṃ saṃpariṣvajya kiṃ na gacchasi nirvṛtim // Bca_8.43 //
T04bsa054_u:5452: purā dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā mukhaṃ jālikayāvṛtam // Bca_8.44 //
T04bsa054_u:5456: tadadya bhakṣitaṃ yāvat kimīrṣyālo na rakṣasi // Bca_8.46 //
T04bsa054_u:5461: tairgṛdhrairanyaiśca gomāyuprabhṛtibhirmāṃsocchrayaṃ māṃsapuñjamimaṃ bhakṣitaṃ bībhatsaṃ dṛṣṭvā kimīrṣyālo na rakṣasīti yojayitavyam /
T04bsa054_u:5462: kimidānīṃ palāyase iti vā vyavahitena saṃbandhaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:5465: niścalādapi kāṣṭhaloṣṭhasamānāt tava trāso jāyate iti kākkā pṛcchati /
T04bsa054_u:5467: evamapi bībhatsarūpāt īkṣitāt dṛṣṭāt yadi vā evaṃ trāsaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5469: yadevaṃ calataḥ kathaṃ na trāsa ityāha-
T04bsa054_u:5470: vetāleneva kenāpi cālyamānādbhayaṃ na kim // Bca_8.48 //
T04bsa054_u:5471: bhūtagraheṇa cālyamānāt jīvataścalataḥ kiṃ na bhayaṃ bhavati?
T04bsa054_u:5476: tatrāmedhyamaniṣṭaṃ te lālāpānaṃ kathaṃ priyam // Bca_8.49 //
T04bsa054_u:5477: yo hi nāma mohāvṛtaviveko rāgaviṣamūrcchitacaitanyaḥ, tasya atikamanīyatayā kāminīvadanamadhupānabuddhayā
T04bsa054_u:5481: lālāyāḥ śleṣmaṇaḥ pānaṃ kathaṃ priyam? kena prakāreṇa tatrābhiratirnānyatra? dvayorapi yukteti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:5482: athāpi syāt- yadyapi dvayorapi kāraṇamabhinnam, tathāpi tasminnatidurgandhatayā vaimukhyam, itarasmiṃstu tadabhāvātprītiriti /
T04bsa054_u:5486: kārpāsāditūlaparipūritairmasūrakādibhirūpadhānaiḥ sukumārasparśaiḥ kāmino na ramante, na dhṛtimadhivāsayanti
T04bsa054_u:5487: kutaḥ? daurgandhyamaśuciniṣyandaṃ na muñcantīti kṛtvā aśuciparipūrite strīkalevare eva ramante /
T04bsa054_u:5493: syādetat- yadi nāma aśucitvamamedhye strīkalevare ca sādhāraṇam, tathāpi tadekatra vivṛtamanyatra pracchāditam /
T04bsa054_u:5496: na cetprayojanaṃ tena kasmācchannaṃ vimṛdyate // Bca_8.51 //
T04bsa054_u:5501: tat kimiti tathābhūtamapriyaṃ bhavataḥ? atha tathābhūte sarvathā vaimukhyameva te nācchannena kiṃcit prayojanaṃ tavāsti /
T04bsa054_u:5502: yadyevam, tarhi kasmāddhetoḥ channaṃ viśeṣeṇa mṛdyate, tadanyaparihāreṇa tasyaiva ghaṭanāya yatnaḥ kriyate?
T04bsa054_u:5504: idamapi praṣṭavyastvam- kiṃ bhavānaśucivirāgo na veti /
T04bsa054_u:5508: yadi bhavataḥ aśucau na rāgaḥ, na sarvathā āsaṅgo 'sti, tarhi kasmādāliṅgase apara manyam? kiṃ tadityāha-
T04bsa054_u:5510: māṃsameva kardama iva lepanasādharmyāt, tena liptamupadigdham /
T04bsa054_u:5514: syāt, iti virāgaviṣayatāmasya darśayati // atha śucau rāga iti dvitīyo vikalpaḥ svīkriyate, tatrāha- svamevetyādi /
T04bsa054_u:5516: anyathāvatāryateyaduktaṃ pareṇa- channe carmādinā rāgo bhavati nācchanne /
T04bsa054_u:5518: yadi tena hetunā carmādinā pihitatvāditi kṛtvā aśucau rāgo bhavati bhavataḥ, tadā kasmādāliṅgase paramanyadīyaṃ pañjaram /
T04bsa054_u:5527: gūthaghasmara purīṣabhakṣaṇaśīla vismara, tatra manasikāraṃ mā kārṣīḥ //
T04bsa054_u:5530: acetanaṃ svabhāvena māṃsaṃ tvaṃ kathamicchasi // Bca_8.54 //
T04bsa054_u:5539: ityevaṃ tatpralobhāt pratyupakāradhiyā vā draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ ca vāñchasi, darśanaṃ sparśanaṃ
T04bsa054_u:5543: na tu punaryathāpare varṇayanti- caitanyayogādacetanamapi cetanamabhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:5544: tādṛśaṃ māṃsaṃ tvamacetanasvabhāvaṃ kāmukaḥ san kathamicchasi? taddṛṣṭau ca mṛtpiṇḍe 'pi syāt /
T04bsa054_u:5545: tathā ca sati bhavānapi na cetanaḥ syāt //
T04bsa054_u:5546: asti tatra citsvabhāvaṃ cittam, tena tadicchāmīti cedāha-
T04bsa054_u:5547: yadicchasi na taccittaṃ draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ ca śakyate /
T04bsa054_u:5548: yacca śakyaṃ na tadvetti kiṃ tadāliṅgase mudhā // Bca_8.55 //
T04bsa054_u:5549: yaccittaṃ citsvabhāvamicchasi, tadarūpitvāt draṣṭuṃ na śakyate /
T04bsa054_u:5550: yacca māṃsādisvabhāvaṃ kalevaraṃ draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ ca śakyate, na tadvetti, na
T04bsa054_u:5559: svāmedhyamayameva tvaṃ taṃ nāvaiṣīti vismayaḥ // Bca_8.56 //
T04bsa054_u:5560: anyasya kāyaṃ yadamedhyamayaṃ na vetsi, tanna kiṃcidāścaryam /
T04bsa054_u:5564: punaratiśayenāścaryasthānam, yat svasyātmano 'medhyamayaṃ tvaṃ taṃ kāyaṃ
T04bsa054_u:5579: yataḥ kāyāttadamedhyaṃ nirgataṃ niryātam, taṃ kāyaṃ kathamicchasi spraṣṭum?
T04bsa054_u:5580: athāpi syāt- nāyamupālambho mama yuktarūpaḥ, yato na me kaścidabhiniveśo
T04bsa054_u:5582: yadi te nāśucau rāgaḥ kasmādāliṅgase param /
T04bsa054_u:5584: amedhyakṣetraṃ māturjaṭharam, anekāśucisthānatvāt, tatra saṃbhūtaṃ samutpannaṃ tadbījam, tadeva amedhyaṃ mātāpitṛśukraśoṇitasvabhāvaṃ bījaṃ yasya tattathoktam /
T04bsa054_u:5585: tena vardhitamiti tena amedhyena mātṛpītāśitasya vāntakalpasya rasena vardhitaṃ garbhasthitamupabṛṃhitam
T04bsa054_u:5590: atha aśucirāgo 'hamiti pakṣasvīkāraḥ, tathāpi upālambhastadavastha evetyāha-
T04bsa054_u:5596: athāpi syāt- kimatrottaraṃ vaktavyam? yato 'hamapi yādṛśaḥ, tādṛśaṃ tasyāḥ śarīram, tena aśucernāśucisaṃparko doṣaḥ, yādṛśo yakṣastādṛśo balirapītyāha-
T04bsa054_u:5599: ayamiha mahāmohasya prabhāvaḥ, yadātmagatameva tāvadaśucisvabhāvaṃ na
T04bsa054_u:5607: āsatāṃ tāvattāni vastūni, tatsaṃsargādbhūmirapi śucisvabhāvā aśucitvaṃ yāti //
T04bsa054_u:5609: śmaśāne patitān ghorān kāyān paśyāparānapi // Bca_8.63 //
T04bsa054_u:5610: evaṃ tāvadadhyakṣasiddho 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ, tathāpi yadi nādhimucyase, na saṃpratyeṣi /
T04bsa054_u:5614: vikhāditakavinīlakavipūyakādisvabhāvatayā bībhatsān bhayaṃkarān vā aparāniti ato 'dhikān //
T04bsa054_u:5616: prakṛtyā vikṛta evāyaṃ kāyo nābhiratisthānaṃ yujyate
T04bsa054_u:5619: kathaṃ jñātvāpi tatraiva punarutpadyate ratiḥ // Bca_8.64 //
T04bsa054_u:5623: evaṃ tatsvabhāvaṃ viditvāpi kathaṃ tasminneva sthāne bhayasthānatvena ekadā pratipanne punaranyadā jāyate ratirabhiṣvaṅgaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:5624: syādetat- yadi nāma aśucisvabhāvatā kāyasya adhyakṣasiddhā, tathāpi candanādisurabhivastūpalipto 'sau kamanīyo bhavati ityatrāha-
T04bsa054_u:5627: śarīre niveśito 'pyasau gandhaḥ candanādiprasūtaḥ, yadvaśātkāye kamanīyabuddhirupajāyate /
T04bsa054_u:5630: ataḥ kasmāt parakīyena gandhena candanasamudbhūtena anyatra yasyāsau gandho na
T04bsa054_u:5634: candanādisaṃskāro 'pi kevalātmopaghātāya vartate, na hitāyeti pratipādayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:5639: yadi rāgo notpadyate, tadā śivaṃ nanu kalyāṇameva syāt /
T04bsa054_u:5640: evaṃ guṇasaṃbhave 'pi kiṃ kāraṇamanarthapriyo lokaḥ taṃ kāyaṃ gandhenānulimpati? sarvathā na yuktametadityarthaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:5643: kāyasya svabhāvadurgandhasya kimāyātam, kiṃ bhūtam? na kiṃcit /
T04bsa054_u:5647: atha tadvaśāt tasmin kamanīyatāmupādāya abhiratirutpadyate ityatrāha-
T04bsa054_u:5659: malapaṅkadharaḥ mala eva paṅkaḥ kardamaḥ, taṃ dhārayatīti tathā, snānābhyañjanādivirahāt /
T04bsa054_u:5662: yadi kāyaḥ prakṛtyā bhīṣaṇaḥ pretānāmiva svabhāvena bhayaṃkaraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5663: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ kimiti saṃskriyate? yatnāditi keśanakhādiracanāviśeṣaiḥ,
T04bsa054_u:5669: ātmanaiva saṃcintya ātmano vyāmohamutpādayituṃ yatnavadbhiḥ unmattairasvasthacittaiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5670: evaṃ ca viparītakarmānuṣṭhānānnaite varākāḥ sacetasa iti khedaṃ karoti śāsrakāraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5671: na cātra kaścidātmajño dṛśyata iti unmattairākulā samākīrṇā mahī pṛthivīti //
T04bsa054_u:5673: kaṅkālān katicidṛṣṭvā śmaśāne kila te ghṛṇā /
T04bsa054_u:5679: tatra parasyottaram- na śmaśānagatakalevarasādṛśyamasya, yena tasminneva atrāpi ratirna syāt, kiṃ tarhi śmaśāne tasya ghṛṇāsthānatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:5684: tadeva śarīraṃ śmaśāne ghṛṇāsthānagrāme vā abhiratisthānamiti kākvā brūte /
T04bsa054_u:5687: na ca anena viśeṣeṇāśucisvabhāvatā ghṛṇāheturnivartate, yena pravṛttiriyaṃ syāditi /
T04bsa054_u:5690: tathā ca evaṃ vidhamapi draviṇavikalasya naitat sulabhamityupadarśayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:5693: vinā mūlyaṃ dravyamantareṇa na labhyate na prāpyate /
T04bsa054_u:5695: tadarjanena āyāsāt kṛṣivāṇijyasevādisamāśrayeṇa pariśramādihaiva duḥkhamupajāyate, adharmeṇa
T04bsa054_u:5700: yātyarjanena tāruṇyaṃ vṛddhaḥ kāmaiḥ karoti kim // Bca_8.72 //
T04bsa054_u:5702: kena dhanena prakāreṇa vā asau bālo yauvane yuvāvasthāyāṃ sukhī syāt?
T04bsa054_u:5704: yadapi kasyacit pitṛpitāmahopārjitadhanena yauvane sukhitvaṃ dṛśyate, tadapi pratiniyatasyaiva na sarvasya /
T04bsa054_u:5707: tadarjayata eva galitavayaso na kaścidupayogo viṣayairiti //
T04bsa054_u:5708: athāpi syāt- tadarjayatāpi kāmasukhamanubhūyata eva, ityatrāha-
T04bsa054_u:5710: gṛhamāgatya sāyāhne śerate sma mṛtā iva // Bca_8.73 //
T04bsa054_u:5711: ye kecit kutsitakāmākṣiptacetasaḥ kāṣṭhatṛṇapatrādyāharaṇabhṛtikarmakriyālakṣaṇairdinaparyantavyāpāraiḥ parikhinnakāyamanaso nirutsukāḥ, astaṃ gate savitari svagṛhamāgatya gāḍhamiddhākrāntatvāt mṛtakalpāḥ śerate sma svapanti /
T04bsa054_u:5714: evamāyuḥsaṃskārān kecit kukāminaḥ kṣapayanti, na ca kāmasukhāsvādamupalabhante /
T04bsa054_u:5723: taiḥ pravāso deśāntaragamanam, tena kleśaḥ pariśramaḥ, tena duḥkhitāḥ pīḍitāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5725: vatsarairapi anekavarṣātyaye 'pi putrān dārāṃśca nekṣante na paśyanti /
T04bsa054_u:5730: tanna prāptaṃ mudhaivāyurnītaṃ tu parakarmaṇā // Bca_8.75 //
T04bsa054_u:5731: yadarthaṃ sukhapratilambhanimittaṃ vikrītaḥ paradāsīkṛtaḥ ātmā kāmaviḍambitaiḥ tanna prāptam, taditi sukhaṃ na prāptaṃ na pratilabdham /
T04bsa054_u:5732: āyuḥsaṃskārā eva hi kevalamanarthakaṃ parakarmānuṣṭhānena kṣayamupanītāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5733: na sādhukarmaṇi kvacidapi yojitā iti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:5737: sukhabubhukṣayā vikrītaḥ parāyattīkṛtaḥ svātmabhāva svakāyo yaiste tathā,
T04bsa054_u:5747: mānārthaṃ dāsatāṃ yānti mūḍhāḥ kāmaviḍambitāḥ // Bca_8.77 //
T04bsa054_u:5750: jīvitasaṃdeham? tatra praviṣṭasya jīvitaṃ syādvā na veti jīvitasya saṃdeho 'sminniti kṛtvā
T04bsa054_u:5753: mānārthaṃ dāsatāṃ yānti, balavatā kenacidabhibhūtāḥ svamānoddharaṇārtham /
T04bsa054_u:5757: te? kāmabiḍambitāḥ kāmāya kāmena vā viḍambitāstiraskṛtāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:5759: ihaiva janmani kāmāsaktacetasāṃ yadduḥkhaṃ dṛśyate tatkathayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:5764: ayaṃ sukhasādhanatvena upādīyamāno 'pi ca anarthaparaṃparāprasūtiheturevārthaḥ iti kathayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:5769: tathā rakṣitasyāpi kathaṃcit taskarādibhirnāśādviṣādo daurmanasyaṃ paritāpaheturanarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5771: ityevamarjanādibhiḥ sarvadā vyākulatvāt dhanāsaktacetasāṃ kṣaṇamapi samādhānānavakāśatvāt nāvasaraḥ saṃsārāśṛ[śri?]tajātyādiduḥkhanirmokṣāya
T04bsa054_u:5786: tasyaivaṃbhūtasya atitucchasya sukhāsvādaleśasya paśorapi sādhāraṇāsyārthe tasya nimittam
T04bsa054_u:5798: kāyasyārthe kṛto yo 'yaṃ sarvakālaṃ pariśramaḥ // Bca_8.82 //
T04bsa054_u:5804: kāyasya ātmaśarīrasyārthe sukhotpādanāya yo 'yaṃ narakādiduḥkhamavigaṇayya kṛtaḥ sarvakālaṃ saṃsārasya pūrvasyāṃ koṭau pariśramaḥ prayāsaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:5806: tatastasmāt pariśramāt koṭiśatenāpi pariśramabhāgena aṃśena buddhatvaṃ
T04bsa054_u:5807: syāt, tadapekṣayā atyalpīyasā āyāsabalena buddhatvaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:5810: caryāduḥkhānmahadduḥkhaṃ sā ca bodhirna kāminām // Bca_8.83 //
T04bsa054_u:5811: caryāduḥkhamapekṣya idameva mahadduḥkhaṃ yatkāmārthe caratāṃ saṃsāre
T04bsa054_u:5813: na tu bodhisattvānāṃ pratiniyatakālaṃ svecchayā tadanubhavatām /
T04bsa054_u:5814: tadevaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāmapi kāmārthe kāmināṃ sā ca bodhirna bhavati, yā bodhisattvānāṃ parārthe duḥkhamanubhavatāmityarthaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:5816: na śastraṃ na viṣaṃ nāgnirna prapāto na vairiṇaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5818: amī śastrādayo duḥkhajanakatvena prasiddhā na sādṛśyaṃ bhajante prati kāmānām /
T04bsa054_u:5819: kasmāt? narakādidurgatiduḥkhasya āgamāt pratipannasya smaraṇāt smaraṇenāmukhīkaraṇāt /
T04bsa054_u:5821: maraṇamātraduḥkhadāyakāḥ, kāmāstu dīrghakālikatīvranarakādiduḥkhahetava iti kīdṛśī tairupamā
T04bsa054_u:5822: tadevaṃ kāyavivekānantaraṃ cittavivekaṃ pratipādya prakṛte yojayitumāha-
T04bsa054_u:5825: evamuktakrameṇa udvijya saṃtrāsaṃ kṛtvā pūrvoktaviveke ratimabhiratimutpādayet /
T04bsa054_u:5832: niḥśabdasaumyavanamārutavījyamānaiḥ caṃkramyate parahitāya vicintyate ca // Bca_8.86 //
T04bsa054_u:5835: śaśāṅkasya candramasaḥ karā raśmaya eva śuklatāśaityasādharmyāccandanānīva, taiḥ śītalāni yāni ślātalāni teṣu caṃkramyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5842: vījyamānāḥ taiścaṃkramyata iti parāvṛttyā punaḥ punarmandaṃ bhramyate /
T04bsa054_u:5843: na kevalaṃ caṃkramyate, kiṃ tu parahitāya sattvānāṃ sukhotpādanāya vicintyate /
T04bsa054_u:5847: vihṛtya yatra kvacidiṣṭakālaṃ śūnyālaye vṛkṣatale guhāsu /
T04bsa054_u:5857: upaśāntavitarkaḥ san bodhicittaṃ tu bhāvayet // Bca_8.89 //
T04bsa054_u:5860: vivekasya kāyikacaitasikasya guṇānāṃ bhāvanāt, iti hi sarvasukhasaṃpattiheturviveka
T04bsa054_u:5861: iti cetasi punaḥ punarāmukhīkaraṇāddhetoḥ upaśānto vitarkaḥ asanmanasikāro yasya saḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5863: evaṃ pariśuddhe cetasi bhāvyamānaṃ bodhicittaṃ prakarṣapadamadhirohatīti viśeṣaṃ tuśabdena darśayati //
T04bsa054_u:5864: tatra yāvadekatvaṃ pareṣu nātmanā kriyate, na tāvat parahitasukhāya samyak cittaṃ calati, ātmagrāhasya ātmanyeva viśeṣeṇa pravṛtteḥ /
T04bsa054_u:5876: ato yathā mama duḥkhaṃ bādhakaṃ tathā eṣāmapi /

T04bsa054_u:5882: yathā ātmā sarvathā sukhīkartumiṣyate, tathā anye 'pīti

T04bsa054_u:6275: tasya tathā pravartamānasya samyakpratipannaśamathasyāpi dānādayaḥ prajñāvikalatayā jagadarthasaṃpādananidānaṃ buddhatvaṃ nāvahantītyabhisaṃdhāya avaśyaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhanirmokśārthinā prajñotpādanāya yatitavyam yathoktam-
T04bsa054_u:6280: imaṃ parikaraṃ sarvaṃ prajñārthaṃ hi munirjagau /
T04bsa054_u:6282: imamiti samanantaramiha śāstre lakṣaṇataḥ pratipāditaṃ dānādikamidaṃtayā pratyakṣatayā parāmṛśati
T04bsa054_u:6288: yathāvasthitapratītyasamutpannavastutattvapravicayalakṣaṇā, saiva arthaḥ prayojanaṃ saṃbodhihetubhāvopanāyakatayā yasya dānādilakṣaṇasya parikarasya sa tathā, tamiti /
T04bsa054_u:6290: tathā hi dānaṃ saṃbuddhabodhiprāptaye prathamaṃ kāraṇam, puṇyasaṃbhārāntarbhūtatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:6292: kṣāntirapi tadvipakṣabhūtapratighapratipakṣatayā dānaśīlasukṛtamayaṃ saṃbhāramanupālayantī sugatatvādhigataye saṃpravartate /
T04bsa054_u:6293: etacca śubhaṃ dānāditritayasaṃbhūtaṃ puṇyasaṃbhārākhyaṃ vīryamantareṇa na bhavatīti tadapi ubhayasaṃbhārakāraṇatayā sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇāya samupajāyate /
T04bsa054_u:6294: samāhitacittasya ca yathābhūtaparijñānamutpadyata iti dhyānapāramitāpi anuttarajñānaheturupapadyate
T04bsa054_u:6295: evamete dānādayaḥ satkṛtya saṃbhṛtā api prajñāmantareṇa saugatapadādhigamahetavo na bhavantīti nāpi pāramitāvyapadeśaṃ labhante /
T04bsa054_u:6296: prajñākṛtapariśuddhibhājaḥ punaḥ avyāhatodārapravṛttitayā tadanukūlamanuvartamānāḥ taddhetubhāvamadhigacchanti, pāramitānāmadheyaṃ ca labhante /
T04bsa054_u:6297: tathā dātṛdeyapratigrāhakāditritayānupalambhayogena prajñāpariśodhitāḥ sādaranirantaradīrghakālamabhyasyamānāḥ prakarṣaparyantamupagacchantaḥ avidyāpravartitasakalavikalpajālamalarahitaṃ kleśajñeyāvaraṇavinirmuktamubhayanairātmyādhigamasvabhāvaṃ sarvasvaparahitasaṃpadādhārabhūtaṃ paramārthatattvātmakaṃ tathāgatadharmakāyamabhinirvartayantīti prajñāpradhānā dānādayo guṇā ucyante //
T04bsa054_u:6298: na caitadvaktavyam- yadi prajñā pradhānaṃ dānādīnām, saiva kevalā saṃbodhisādhanamastu, kimaparairdānādibhiriti /
T04bsa054_u:6300: varṇitatvāt, kevalaṃ netravikalā iva dānādayaḥ prajñānetṛkā eva
T04bsa054_u:6301: yathābhimatāṃ saugatīṃ bhūmimabhisarantīti prajñopanāyakā ucyante, na tu prajñaiva kevalā samyaksaṃbodhisādhanam /
T04bsa054_u:6308: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sūryamaṇḍalaṃ candramaṇḍalaṃ ca caturṣu dvīpeṣu karma karoti, caturaśca dvīpānanugacchati anuparivartate, evameva subhūte prajñāpāramitā pañcasu pāramitāsu karma karoti, pañca pāramitā anugacchati, anuparivartate, prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvāt pañca pāramitāḥ
T04bsa054_u:6310: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājā cakravartī virahitaḥ saptabhī ratnai ścakravartināmadheyaṃ na labhate, evameva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvānna pāramitānāmadheyaṃ
T04bsa054_u:6312: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kāścana kunadyaḥ, sarvāstā yena gaṅgā mahānadī tenānugacchanti
T04bsa054_u:6314: mahāsamudramanugacchanti, evameva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti /
T04bsa054_u:6318: iyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dānapāramitāmabhibhavati, śīlapāramitāmabhibhavati,
T04bsa054_u:6321: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jātyandhānāṃ śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā apariṇāyakānāmabhavyaṃ mārgāvataraṇāya,
T04bsa054_u:6322: punarnagarānupraveśāya, evameva kauśika acakṣuṣkāḥ pañca pāramitā jātyandhabhūtā bhavanti vinā prajñāpāramitayā apariṇāyakāḥ, vinā prajñāpāramitayā abhavyā bodhimārgāvataraṇāya, kuta eva sarvākārajñatānagarānupraveśāya /
T04bsa054_u:6323: yadā punaḥ kauśika pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā bhavanti, tadā etāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ sacakṣuṣkā bhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:6324: prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītāścaitāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante // iti vistaraḥ
T04bsa054_u:6332: prajñārthamiti prajñaiva pūrvoktā arthaḥ prayojanaṃ sādhyatayā yasya tam /
T04bsa054_u:6346: hiriti yasmāt prajñārthaṃ dānādiparikaraṃ śamathātmakaparikaraṃ vā
T04bsa054_u:6348: utpādayediti niṣpādayet sākṣātkuryāt bhāvayeta sevayet bahulīkuryādvā //
T04bsa054_u:6349: sā ca prajñā dvividhāhetubhūtā phalabhūtā ca /
T04bsa054_u:6350: hetubhūtāpi dvividhā adhimukticaritasya ca bhūmipraviṣṭasya ca bodhisattvasya /
T04bsa054_u:6353: tatra prathamato hetubhūtā śrutacintābhāvanāmayī krameṇa abhyāsādbhūmipraviṣṭasya prajñāṃ nirvartayati /
T04bsa054_u:6354: sā ca aparāparabhūmipratilambhayogena prakarṣamabhivardhayantī yāvadubhayāvaraṇavigamāt sakalakalpanājālavigatabuddhatvasvabhāvaprajñāṃ niṣpādayati /
T04bsa054_u:6356: duḥkhasya pañcagatisaṃgṛhītasattvarāśigatasya svātmagatasya ca sāṃsārikasya jātivyādhijarāmaraṇasvabhāvasya priyaviprayogāpriyasaṃprayogaparyeṣyamāṇalābhavighāta lakṣaṇasya,
T04bsa054_u:6357: saṃkṣepataḥ pañcopādānaskandhātmakasya ca, nivṛttiḥ nirvāṇam upaśamaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6362: rāgādikleśagaṇaḥ samupajāyate, tasmāt karma, tato janma, tataśca vyādhijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāśca prajāyante /
T04bsa054_u:6363: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:6365: punastameva nirātmakamasvāmikaṃ māyāmarīcigandharvanagarasvapnapratibimbādisamānākāratayā paramārthato niḥsvabhāvaṃ paśyato yathābhūtaparijñānāttadvipakṣātmakatayā
T04bsa054_u:6367: evaṃ pūrvapūrvasya kāraṇabhūtasya nirodhāduttarottarakāryabhūtasya nirodho veditavyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6369: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:6370: tatra avidyā tṛṣṇopādānaṃ ca kleśavartmano vyavacchedaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6374: evameva trivartma nirātmakam ātmātmīyarahitaṃ saṃbhavati ca
T04bsa054_u:6375: saṃbhavayogena, vibhavati ca vibhavayogena, svabhāvānnaḍakalāpasadṛśa iti /
T04bsa054_u:6377: tadevaṃ prajñayā svapnamāyādisvabhāvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā pratipatteḥ paramārthādhigamāt savāsananiḥśeṣadoṣarāśivinivṛttirbhavatīti sarvaduḥkhopaśamahetuḥ prajñā upapadyate //
T04bsa054_u:6378: yathā ca yuktyāgamābhyāṃ vicārayataḥ aviparītavastutattvapravicayaḥ samupajāyate, tadupadarśayituṃ satyadvayavyavasthāmāha saṃvṛtirityādi-
T04bsa054_u:6381: saṃvriyate āvriyate yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ svabhāvāvaraṇādāvṛtaprakāśanācca anayeti saṃvṛtiḥ
T04bsa054_u:6383: avidyā hi asatpadārthasvarūpāropikā svabhāvadarśanāvaraṇātmikā ca satī saṃvṛtirupapadyate
T04bsa054_u:6393: tadeva lokasaṃvṛtisatyamityamidhīyate lokasyaiva saṃvṛtyā tat satyamiti kṛtvā /
T04bsa054_u:6395: mohaḥ svabhāvāvaraṇādi saṃvṛtiḥ satyaṃ tayā khyāti yadeva kṛtrimam /
T04bsa054_u:6396: jagāda tatsaṃvṛtisatyamityasau muniḥ padārthaṃ kṛtakaṃ ca saṃvṛtim //
T04bsa054_u:6399: sā ca saṃvṛtirdvividhā lokata eva, tathyasaṃvṛtirmithyāsaṃvṛtiśceti /
T04bsa054_u:6400: tathā hi kiṃcit pratītyajātaṃ nīlādikaṃ vasturūpamadoṣavadindriyairūpalabdhaṃ lokata eva satyam,
T04bsa054_u:6401: māyāmarīcipratibimbādviṣu pratītya samupajātamapi doṣavadindriyopalabdhaṃ yathāsvaṃ tīrthikasiddhāntaparikalpitaṃ ca lokata eva mithyā /
T04bsa054_u:6404: satyaṃ hi tallokata evaṃ śeṣaṃ vikalpitaṃ lokata eva mithyā //
T04bsa054_u:6410: paramaḥ uttamaḥ arthaḥ paramārthaḥ, akṛtrimaṃ vasturūpam, yadadhigamāt sarvāvṛtivāsanānu saṃdhikleśaprahāṇaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:6413: sarvasya hi pratītyasamutpannasya padārthasya niḥsvabhāvatā pāramārthikaṃ
T04bsa054_u:6415: tathā hi- na tāvat yathāparidṛśyamānarūpeṇa satsvabhāvo bhāvaḥ, tasya
T04bsa054_u:6416: uttarakālamanavasthānāt, svabhāvasya ca sarvadā anāgantukatayā avicalitarūpatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:6417: yo hi yasya svabhāvaḥ, sa kathaṃ kadācidapi nivarteta?
T04bsa054_u:6419: nāpi sa utpadyamānaḥ satsvabhāvarūpeṇa kutaścidāgacchati, nirudhyamāno vā kvacit
T04bsa054_u:6420: saṃnicayaṃ gacchati, api tu hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītya
T04bsa054_u:6423: satsvabhāvatā? na ca kasyacit padārthasya paramārthato hetupratyayasāmagrītaḥ samutpattiḥ saṃbhavati, tasyā api aparasāmagrījanitātmatayā parāyattātmalābhāyā niḥsvabhāvatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:6425: itthaṃ kāraṇānurūpaṃ kāryamicchatā kathaṃ niḥsvabhāvāt sasvabhāvasyotpattirabhyupetavyā?
T04bsa054_u:6427: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām //
T04bsa054_u:6432: yaḥ pratyayairjāyati sa hyajāto na tasya utpādu sabhāvato 'sti /
T04bsa054_u:6433: yaḥ pratyayādhīnu sa śūnya ukto yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so 'pramattaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:6436: iti śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhya iti //
T04bsa054_u:6437: na ca svaparobhayarūpahetunibandhanamahetunibandhanaṃ vā bhāvasya janma atipeśalamupapadyate
T04bsa054_u:6438: tathā hi ātmasvarūpaṃ bhāvānāṃ svajanmanimittaṃ bhavet, niṣpannamaniṣpannaṃ vā bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:6440: kāraṇatā, tasya sarvātmanā svayaṃ niṣpannatvāt kva punarasya vyāpāro 'stu?
T04bsa054_u:6441: utpādyasya punarasyāniṣpannasyānyasya svabhāvasyābhāvāt, ekasya cāsya niraṃśatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:6445: na cāpi svatautpattipakṣe prāṅniṣpannaṃ svarūpamitaretarāśrayadoṣasaṅgāt kasyacit saṃbhavati
T04bsa054_u:6446: nāpi tadaniṣpannasvabhāvamākāśakuśeśayasaṃkāśamaśeṣasāmarthyaśūnyaṃ svaniṣpattau hetubhāvamupagantumarhati, anyathā kharaviṣāṇasyāpi svasvabhāvajanakatvaprasaṅgāt //
T04bsa054_u:6447: nāpi parata iti pakṣaḥ, ādityādapi andhakārasya, sarvasmādvā sarvasya utpattiprasaṅgāt, janakājanakābhimatayorvivakṣitakāryāpekṣayā paratvāviśeṣāt /
T04bsa054_u:6448: janyajanakaikatvaikasaṃtatipratiniyamo 'pi anutpanne kārye kālpanikatayā vastuto na saṃgacchate
T04bsa054_u:6451: nāpi bījāvasthāsu vidyamānāṅkurāpekṣayā bījasya paratvamakālpanikamasti, kāraṇe kāryāstitvasya (Bcp 173) niṣetsyamānatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:6452: yatra paridṛśyamānameva rūpaṃ vicārato nāvatiṣṭhate, tatra anāgatādiṣu saṃbhāvitasya kā cintā?
T04bsa054_u:6455: utpattau vā na kiṃcijjanayitavyamastīti kutra ubhayarūpasya hetorvyāpāraḥ syāt?
T04bsa054_u:6456: nāpi ahetuta iti vikalpaḥ, yato nāyaṃ prasajyapratiṣedhātmatayā ahetuta iti yujyate /
T04bsa054_u:6464: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6465: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana //
T04bsa054_u:6474: evaṃ niḥsvabhāvataiva sarvabhāvānāṃ nijaṃ pāramārthikaṃ rūpamavatiṣṭhate /
T04bsa054_u:6477: anyathā bhāvābhiniveśo vā śūnyatābhiniveśo veti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ, ubhayorapi kalpanātmakatayā sāṃvṛtatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:6478: na ca abhāvasya kalpitasvabhāvatayā kiṃcit svarūpamasti /
T04bsa054_u:6481: yadi ca bhāvasyaiva kaścit svabhāvaḥ syāt, tadā tatpratiṣedhātmā abhāvo 'pi syāt /
T04bsa054_u:6483: ato na bhāvanivṛttirūpaḥ abhāvo nāma kaścit /
T04bsa054_u:6484: na ca bhāvābhāvayoruktakrameṇa asattve pratipādite tadubhayasaṃkīrṇātmatā saṃbhavati ubhayapratiṣedhasvabhāvatā vā, bhāvavikalpasyaiva sakalavikalpanibandhanatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:6485: tasminnirākṛte sarva eva amī ekaprahāreṇa nirastā bhavantīti /
T04bsa054_u:6491: subhūtirāha- ihāyuṣman śāradvatīputra bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anupāyakuśalo rūpaṃ śūnyamiti prajānāti, saṅgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6497: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jivhā kāyo manaḥ, yāvat sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ śūnyāmiti saṃjānāti, saṅgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6512: tatra saṃvṛtisatyamavitathaṃ rūpaṃ lokasya, paramārthasatyaṃ ca satyamavisaṃvādakaṃ tattvamāryāṇāmiti viśeṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6514: etaduktaṃ bhavati- sarva eva amī ādhyātmikā bāhyāśca bhāvāḥ
T04bsa054_u:6515: svabhāvadvayamābibhrataḥ samupajāyante yaduta sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ca /
T04bsa054_u:6519: anayośca svabhāvayormṛṣādṛśāṃ bāliśānāṃ yo viṣayaḥ, tat saṃvṛtisatyam /
T04bsa054_u:6520: yaśca samyagdṛśāmadhigatatattvānāṃ viṣayaḥ, tat paramārthasatyamiti vyavasthā
T04bsa054_u:6524: samyagdṛśāṃ yo viṣayaḥ sa tattvaṃ mṛṣādṛśāṃ saṃvṛtisatyamuktam //
T04bsa054_u:6531: idameva satyadvayaṃ nānyat satyamastīti avadhāraṇārtho 'pi yujyate cakāraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6538: satya ime duvi lokavidūnāṃ diṣṭa svayaṃ aśruṇitva pareṣām /
T04bsa054_u:6539: saṃvṛti yā ca tathā paramārtho satyu na sidhyati kiṃ ca tṛtīyu //
T04bsa054_u:6541: nanu catvāri āryasatyāni duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇāni abhidharme kathitāni bhagavatā, tat kathaṃ dve eva satye iti? satyam, kiṃ tarhi vaineyajanāśayānuśayavaśādete dve eva catvāri kṛtvā kathitāni (kathite?),
T04bsa054_u:6543: tathā hi duḥkhasamudayamārgasatyāni saṃvṛtisvabhāvatayā saṃvṛtisatye 'ntarbhavanti, nirodhasatyaṃ tu paramārthasatye, iti na kaścidvirodhaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:6544: syādetat- saṃvṛtiravidyopadarśitātmatayā abhūtasamāropasvarūpatvādvicārāt śataśo viśīryamāṇāpi kathaṃ satyamiti /
T04bsa054_u:6549: ata eva lokasaṃvṛtisatyaṃ ceti śāstre 'pi viśeṣa ukta ācāryapādaiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6553: ekameva bhikṣavaḥ paramaṃ satyaṃ yaduta apramoṣadharma nirvāṇam,
T04bsa054_u:6558: paramārthasatyaṃ tu na jñāyate kīdṛk kiṃsvabhāvaṃ kiṃlakṣaṇamiti /
T04bsa054_u:6562: kenacit prakāreṇa tat sarvabuddhiviṣayīkartuṃ na śakyate iti yāvat /
T04bsa054_u:6563: iti kathaṃ tatsvarūpaṃ pratipādayituṃ śakyam? tathā hi sarvaprapañcavinirmuktasvabhāvaṃ
T04bsa054_u:6564: paramārthasatyatattvam, ataḥ sarvopādhiśūnyatvāt kathaṃ kayācit kalpanayā paśyet? kalpanāsamatikrāntasvarūpaṃ ca śabdānāmaviṣayaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6565: vikalpajanmāno hi śabdā vikalpadhiyāmaviṣaye na pravartitumutsahante /
T04bsa054_u:6566: (Bcp 176) tasmāt sakalavikalpābhilāpavikalatvādanāropitamasāṃvṛtamanabhilāpyaṃ paramārthatattvaṃ kathamiva pratipādayituṃ śakyate? tathāpi bhājanaśrotṛjanānugrahārthaṃ parikalpamupādāya saṃvṛtyā nidarśanopadarśanena kiṃcidabhidhīyate //
T04bsa054_u:6567: yathā timiraprabhāvāt taimirikaḥ sarvamākāśadeśaṃ keśoṇḍukamaṇḍitamitastato mukhaṃ vikṣipannapi paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:6568: tathā kurvantamavekṣya ataimirikaḥ kimayaṃ karotīti tatsamīpamupasṛtya tadupalabdhakeśapraṇihitalocano 'pi na keśākṛtimupalabhate, nāpi tatkeśādhikaraṇān bhāvābhāvādiviśeṣān parikalpayati /
T04bsa054_u:6569: yadā punarasau taimirikaḥ ataimirikāya svābhiprāyaṃ prakāśayati- keśāniha paśyāmīti, tadā tadvikalpāpasāraṇāya tasmai yathābhūtamasau bravīti- nātra keśāḥ santīti /
T04bsa054_u:6571: na ca tena tathā pratipādayatāpi kasyacit pratiṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavati vidhānaṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:6572: tacca keśānāṃ tattvaṃ yadataimirikaḥ paśyati, tanna taimirikaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:6575: tāneva skandhādīn yena svabhāvena nirastasamastāvidyāvāsanā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paśyanti ataimirikopalabdhakeśadarśananyāyena, tadeṣāṃ paramārthasatyamiti /
T04bsa054_u:6581: iti paramārthato 'vācyamapi paramārthatattvaṃ dṛṣṭāntadvāreṇa saṃvṛtimupādāya kathaṃcit kathitam /
T04bsa054_u:6582: na tu tadaśeṣasāṃvṛtavyavahāravirahitasvabhāvaṃ vastuto vaktuṃ śakyate iti /
T04bsa054_u:6584: anakṣarasya dharmasya śrutiḥ kā deśanā ca kā /
T04bsa054_u:6595: evaṃ paramārthadeśanopāyabhūtā saṃvṛtiḥ, paramārthādhigamaśca upeyabhūta iti /
T04bsa054_u:6597: nanu ca tathāvidhamapi tathāvidhabuddhiviṣayaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃ na bhavatītyatrāha- buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti /
T04bsa054_u:6599: vikalpasvabhāvā, vikalpaśca sarva eva avidyāsvabhāvaḥ, avastugrāhitvāt /
T04bsa054_u:6603: iti naiva kācid buddhiḥ pāramārthikarūpagrāhiṇī paramārthato yujyate /
T04bsa054_u:6604: anyathā sāṃvṛtabuddhigrāhyatayā paramārtharūpataiva tasya hīyeta, paramārthasya vastutaḥ sāṃvṛtajñānāviṣayatvāt
T04bsa054_u:6606: yadi hi devaputra paramārthataḥ paramārthasatyaṃ kāyavāṅyanasāṃ
T04bsa054_u:6607: viṣayatāmupagacchet, na tat paramārthasatyamiti saṃkhyāṃ gacchet,
T04bsa054_u:6613: ata eva tadaviṣayaḥ sarvakalpanānāṃ yadbhāvābhāvasvaparabhāvasatyāsatyaśāśvatocchedanityānityasukhaduḥkhaśucyaśucyātmānātmaśūnyāśūnyalakṣyalakṣaṇaikatvānyatvotpādanirodhādayo viśeṣāstattvasya na saṃbhavanti, amīṣāṃ sāṃvṛtadharmatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:6616: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam /
T04bsa054_u:6621: yāvadakriyaḥ, akaraṇaḥ, yāvanna lābho nālabho na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na yaśo
T04bsa054_u:6628: evaṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthabhedena dvividhaṃ satyaṃ vyavasthāpya tadadhikṛtaśca loko 'pi dvividha evetyupadarśayannāha- tatra loke ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:6629: tatra loko dvidhā dṛṣṭo yogī prākṛtakastathā /
T04bsa054_u:6630: tatra prākṛtako loko yogilokena bādhyate // Bca_9.3 //
T04bsa054_u:6639: yogaḥ samādhiḥ sarvadharmānupalambhalakṣaṇaḥ, so 'syāstīti yogī loka ityekaḥ prakāro rāśiḥ
T04bsa054_u:6640: tathā prakṛtiḥ saṃsārapravṛtteḥ kāraṇamavidyā tṛṣṇā, tasyā jāta iti prākṛtaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6641: prākṛta eva prākṛtako loka iti dvitīyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6642: tatra yogī pradhānatattvamaviparītaṃ paśyati, prākṛtakaśca viparyastaṃ vastutattvaṃ
T04bsa054_u:6644: syādetat- ubhayorapi yathāsvaṃ tattvadarśitvāt kataraḥ punaranayorbhrāntimānastu ya evānyatareṇa bādhyate? kaḥ punaranayoḥ kena
T04bsa054_u:6648: tatra tayoryogiprākṛtakayorlokayormadhye prākṛtako lokaḥ prākṛtakatvajātyā samudāyānnirdhāryate, nirdhārya ca bādhyate, iti bādhanaṃ vidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:6658: bādhyate, evamavidyāmalatimiradūṣitabuddhicakṣuṣo viparītavastusvarūpagrāhiṇaḥ prākṛtakasya jñānaṃ prajñāsalilakṣālitavigatamalānāsravajñānacakṣuṣaḥ bhāvanijatattvavedinaḥ
T04bsa054_u:6659: yogilokasya jñānena bādhyate, na punaritarajñānena yogijñānamiti /
T04bsa054_u:6666: atha kiṃ prākṛtā eva bādhyante yogibhiḥ, uta yogino 'pītyāha- bādhyanta
T04bsa054_u:6679: dhiyo jñānasya prajñāyā viśeṣaḥ tattadāvaraṇavigamāt prakarṣaḥ, tena /
T04bsa054_u:6683: pramuditākhyaprathamabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānādiguṇāpekṣayā taduttaravimalābhidhānadvitīyabhūmilābhino bodhisattvasya jñānaprabhāvādayo guṇā viśiṣyante /
T04bsa054_u:6686: tathā prathamadhyānādilābhināmapi uttarottarairbādhanaṃ yojanīm, yāvat sāsravāṇāmanāsravairiti
T04bsa054_u:6687: syādetat- satyapi yogināṃ dhiyo viśeṣe prākṛtajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti
T04bsa054_u:6690: ubhayeṣāṃ yogiprākṛtakānāmiṣṭaḥ abhimataḥ, tena dṛṣṭāntena nidarśanena /
T04bsa054_u:6691: ya eṣa sūtreṣu bhagavatā māyāmarīcigandharvanagarapratibimbādirukto dṛṣṭāntaḥ, sa ca ubhayeṣāmapi niḥsvabhāvatayā prasiddhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6693: tathā hi- ye tāvat sarvajanapratipannasvarūpā rūpādayaḥ, te yogināmeva paramārthasatyādhigamānniḥsvabhāvatayā siddhāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6694: ye punarime svapnamāyādiṣu upalabdhāḥ, te prākṛtakānāmapi /
T04bsa054_u:6695: atastatra ubhayorapi vipratipatterabhāvāt dṛṣṭāntadharmatā na vihanyate /
T04bsa054_u:6696: yeṣāṃ tu mīmāṃsakādīnāṃ deśakālānyathātmakaṃ vastu eva tattathā pratibhāsate iti
T04bsa054_u:6697: matam, te 'nyatra nirākṛtā iti na tanmatamiha nirasyate /
T04bsa054_u:6698: ye tu svayūthyāḥ cittameva vastusat svapnādiṣu tathā pratibhāsate iti manyante, te 'pi
T04bsa054_u:6701: atastena dṛṣṭāntena viparītavastusvarūpagrāhitayā prākṛtakajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti vyavasthāpyate
T04bsa054_u:6703: nanu yadi niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti vastutattvam, kathaṃ tarhi sarvasattvasamuddharaṇāśayena dānādiṣu saṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ
T04bsa054_u:6710: tathābhūteṣvapi tatra idaṃpratyayatāniyamasya vidyamānatvāt na hetuphalabhāvasya virodhaḥ
T04bsa054_u:6711: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi māyādisvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvā dānādayaḥ, tathāpi trikoṭipariśuddhyā sādarādiyogena abhyasyamānāḥ tathābhūtā api paramārthādhigamāya hetubhāvamāpadyante, teṣāṃ tadupāyatvāt, pratītyasamutpādasya ca acintyatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:6721: sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt hetvanurūpaṃ ca sarvatra phalamiṣyate /
T04bsa054_u:6722: ataḥ sāṃvṛtādapi niḥsvabhāvāddhetoḥ niḥsvabhāvatādhigama eva phalam,
T04bsa054_u:6724: iti dānādayo vastuto niḥsvabhāvā api paramārthatattvādhigamāya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāyamānairbodhisattvairupādīyante, anyathā paramārthādhigamāyogāt /
T04bsa054_u:6729: tadeva yadi prākṛtako 'pi janaḥ pratipadyate, kva tarhi vipratipattirastītyāha lokenetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:6730: lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6731: na tu māyāvadityatra vivādo yogilokayoḥ // Bca_9.5 //
T04bsa054_u:6733: hetupratyayaṃ pratītya bhavanti svarūpaṃ labhante iti bhāvāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6734: na punaḥ pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ nijameṣāmasti, iti bhāvaśabdena niḥsvabhāvatābhidhānaṃ pratīyate
T04bsa054_u:6735: satsvarūpeṇa na kevalaṃ dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6740: na tu māyāvat, na tu punaryathā
T04bsa054_u:6741: yoginā māyeva māyāvat svabhāvaśūnyā dṛśyante, paramārthatastathā
T04bsa054_u:6742: pratīyante, ityatrāsmin vivādo vipratipattiryogilokayoḥ yoginā saha lokasyetyarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6743: tatpratipanne vastuttattve lokasyāpratipatteḥ lokena saha vā yoginaḥ, tatpratipanne yoginā yathārthatāpratiṣedhāt /
T04bsa054_u:6744: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- sarvabhāvānāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ceti rūpadvayamasti,
T04bsa054_u:6745: tatra yat sāṃvṛtaṃ tadeva lokena pratīyate, yattu pāramārthikaṃ tad
T04bsa054_u:6747: yathā māyākāranirmitahastyādirūpameva mantrādisāmarthyavibhramitalocano janaḥ paśyati, māyā kārastu tatsvabhāvādi nijaṃ tatsvarūpam, evaṃ yogilokayorapi yathāyogaṃ
T04bsa054_u:6749: athāpi syāt- yadetat samastajanasādhāraṇamarthakriyākṣamaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇapratītaṃ vasturūpam, tat kathamapahrotuṃ śakyata iti parasya hṛdayamāśaṅkayāha pratyakṣamapītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:6753: tadapi prasiddhayā rūḍhyā lokapravādena na pramāṇataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6754: na pramāṇenādhigataṃ sat pratyakṣaṃ rūpādīti saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6756: / na ca laukikapramāṇasamadhigamyaṃ tāttvikaṃ rūpam, sarvajanānāṃ tattvaveditvaprasaṅgāt /
T04bsa054_u:6764: rūpādi tattvaṃ pratyakṣamapi yadi na pramāṇādhigatam, kathaṃ
T04bsa054_u:6767: yathā ca paramārthato 'śucini strīkalevarādau tadāsaktiviparyastacetasāṃ śucibuddhirupajāyate
T04bsa054_u:6772: yadi na pratyakṣapramāṇāt tatsiddhiḥ, āgamāttarhi bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:6773: tathā hi skandhadhātvāyatanādisvabhāvatayā bhagavatā bhāvāḥ sūtre deśitāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:6776: sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva pañca skandhāḥ, dvādaśāyatanāni,
T04bsa054_u:6781: bhūtiryaiṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate //
T04bsa054_u:6787: tattvataḥ kṣaṇikā naite saṃvṛtyā cedvirudhyate // Bca_9.7 //
T04bsa054_u:6788: lokānāṃ bhāvābhiniveśināṃ skandhādideśanāvaineyānāṃ sattvānāmāpātataḥ śūnyatādeśanānadhikṛtānāṃ śūnyatāyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ sukumāropakrameṇa pravartanāya /
T04bsa054_u:6790: yasmādbhāvāḥ skandhāyatanādilakṣaṇāḥ, vastuto niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi sarvadharmāṇām, nāthena narakādiduḥkhāt
T04bsa054_u:6791: paritrāyamāṇena abhyudayaniḥśreyasasukhaṃ prāpayatā sattvāśayādivedinā buddhena bhagavatā deśitāḥ prakāśitāḥ, na tu paramārthataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6798: yadi na paramārthato deśitāḥ, kathaṃ tarhi te kṣaṇikā ityāha- tattvataḥ kṣaṇikā naite iti
T04bsa054_u:6799: tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt kṣaṇikā api na bhavanti ete ime bhāvāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6802: tarhi deśanāyāmapi kathitā iti manasi nidhāya [āha] saṃvṛtyā cet [iti]-
T04bsa054_u:6803: yadi saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā abhidhīyanta ityucyate, ityuttaramāśaṅkaya dūṣayati,
T04bsa054_u:6804: tadā virudhyate, saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā na paramārthataḥ iti virudhyate na saṃgacchate /
T04bsa054_u:6806: sāṃvyavahāribhirakṣaṇikatvapratīteḥ na kṣaṇikatvaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ rūpamiti yāvat
T04bsa054_u:6807: etat siddhāntavādī pariharati na doṣo yogisaṃvṛtyeti-
T04bsa054_u:6811: kutaḥ? yogināṃ pudgalanairātmyasamādhilābhināṃ yā saṃvṛtirvyavahāraḥ, tayā kṣaṇikatayā pratīteḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6812: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yadi nāma arvāgdarśanaiḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na pratīyate, tathāpi yogivyavahāragocaraḥ
T04bsa054_u:6813: yogivyavahāro 'pi saṃvṛtirūpatāṃ na jahāti, buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirūcyate [9.2] iti vacanāt /
T04bsa054_u:6814: na ca pratītibādhitaṃ bādhitameva, tathāvidhāyāḥ pratīterapramāṇatvāt //
T04bsa054_u:6815: kutaḥ punaretat sāṃvṛtamapi kṣaṇikatvādi yogina eva paśyanti nārvāgdarśina ityāha- lokātte tattvadarśina iti /
T04bsa054_u:6827: aśucibhāvanāsamaye aśucīti striyāḥ kāminyā nirūpaṇe vibhāvanāyāṃ lokabādhā syāt, lokapratītena virodho bhavet, lokena śucisvabhāvatayā strīśarīrasyādhyavasānāt /
T04bsa054_u:6833: syādetat- yadi sarvavyāpinī māyopamasvabhāvatā, buddho 'pi tarhi māyopamaḥ svapnopamaḥ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:6835: evamukte subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat- māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ
T04bsa054_u:6837: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
T04bsa054_u:6850: sacennirvāṇādapi kaścid dharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt, tamapyahaṃ māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ vadāmi
T04bsa054_u:6851: evaṃ kathaṃ tatra satkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpasamudbhava iti parasyābhiprāyamāśaṅkayannāha māyopamādityādi-
T04bsa054_u:6853: yadi bhagavānapi māyopamasvabhāvaḥ, tadā māyopamānniḥsvabhāvājjinādbhagavataḥ puṇyaṃ sukṛtaṃ pūjāsatkārapādavandanādibhiḥ kathaṃ yathā kathamiveti manyase? upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat /
T04bsa054_u:6855: na hi māyākāranirmitapuruṣasatkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpaprasūtiryukteti parasyā bhiprāyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6860: bhagavataḥ kathamiva puṇyam? kathaṃ yathetyubhayatrāpi yojanīyam /
T04bsa054_u:6861: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yathā kasyacit paramārthasato jināt paramārthasat puṇyamupajāyate, tathā anyasya māyopamānmāyopamamevetyāvayorna
T04bsa054_u:6863: iti yadevottaraṃ bhavatām, tadevāsmākamapi, nātiricyate kiṃcit /
T04bsa054_u:6864: na ca yuktisiddhaṃ paramārthasad vastusvarūpaṃ kiṃcidastīti pratipāditam //
T04bsa054_u:6866: idaṃ tu kathaṃ samādhīyate ityāha yadi māyopama ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:6867: yadi māyopamaḥ sattvaḥ kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ // Bca_9.9 //
T04bsa054_u:6868: athavā anyathāvatāryate- yadi jino 'pi māyopamaḥ, kā vārtā tarhi
T04bsa054_u:6871: evaṃ sati mahān doṣaḥ prasajyate ityāha- yadītyādi /
T04bsa054_u:6872: yadi māyopamo māyāsvabhāvasamānadharmaḥ sattvaḥ prāṇī, tadā kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ? kimiti praśne akṣamāyāṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:6880: yāvatkālaṃ pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ mantrauṣadhādīnāṃ sāmagrī samudāyaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:6881: samagrāṇi kāraṇāni, tāvatkālaṃ māyāpi vartate, na arvāṅ nivartate, nāpi tataḥ paraṃ pravartate
T04bsa054_u:6882: evaṃ yāvadavidyākarmatṛṣṇāsvabhāvā sāmagrī, tāvat sattvasaṃtānamāyāpi vartate, idaṃpratyayatāyattavṛttitvāt
T04bsa054_u:6883: (Bcp 184) yadi na paramārthataḥ sattvo 'sti, kathamāsaṃsāraṃ sattvasaṃtānaḥ pravartate,
T04bsa054_u:6884: na tu māyāvadaciraṃ nivartate? uktamatra- yāvatpratyayasāmagrī tāvat pravartate, yasya tu tathā nāsti, sa nānuvartate iti /
T04bsa054_u:6889: dīrghaścirakālāvasthitaḥ saṃtānaḥ pravāhaḥ, sa eva kevalastanmātraṃ tena /
T04bsa054_u:6890: kathamiti pṛcchati- kena prakāreṇa sattvo 'sti vidyate? satyataḥ paramārthataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6891: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- yasya hi dīrghakālāvasthitihetupratyayaviśeṣo 'sti, sa dīrghakālamanuvartate
T04bsa054_u:6892: yasya tu tathā nāsti, sa nānuvartate iti /
T04bsa054_u:6895: evaṃ tarhi yathā māyāpuruṣavadhādau na prāṇātipātaḥ, tathā tadaparapuruṣavadhādāvapi na syāt, abhinnasvabhāvatvāt, ityatrāha māyāpuruṣa ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:6900: asattvāt na pāpakaṃ na akuśalamutpadyate prāṇātipātādi /
T04bsa054_u:6903: tatrāpi māraṇābhiprāyeṇa prahāraṃ dadato bhavatyeva aśubham, na tu prāṇātipātaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6904: māyāpuruṣādanyatra kathaṃ prāṇātipāta iti cedāha cittamāyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:6906: cittameva māyā cittamāyā, tayā samete yukte /
T04bsa054_u:6914: yaduktam- cittamāyeti, tat paro vighaṭayannāha mantrādīnāmityādi-
T04bsa054_u:6916: mantrādīnām, ādiśabdādauṣadhādīnāṃ cittotpādaṃ prati asāmarthyādavyāpārāt na māyācittasaṃbhavaḥ na māyāsvabhāvaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:6917: yathā paravyāmohanibandhanānāṃ māyākāraprayuktānāṃ mantrādīnāṃ prabhāveṇa hastyādyākāranirvṛttiḥ, na tathā cittasyeti parasya bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6923: ata eva nānāpratyayasaṃbhavā nānāpratyayāt anekaprakārakāraṇāt saṃbhava utpādo yasyāḥ sā tathoktā
T04bsa054_u:6925: yadi māyā māyeti śabdasāmyamasti, tathāpi na tatkāraṇasyāpyabhedaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:6927: na hi ekasmin kārye kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kāryaśabdasāmyāt sarvatra tadeva prakalpayituṃ
T04bsa054_u:6928: api tu kvacideva kasyacit sāmarthyam, śabdasāmye 'pi svabhāvabhedāt /
T04bsa054_u:6931: naikasya kvacidupalabdhasāmarthyasya pratyayasya kāraṇasya hetoḥ sarvasāmarthyaṃ sarvasmin kārye sāmarthyaṃ śaktirasti saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:6932: kvacidṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā kutraciditi kasmiṃścit samaye deśe kāle vā dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:6936: etat sarva lokavyavahārānugataṃ kalpanānirmitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ vastutattvamupādaya samutthitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6939: etadasahamānaḥ paraḥ punaranyathā prasañjayannāha nirvṛta iti-
T04bsa054_u:6943: yadi saṃvṛtyā saṃvṛtisatyena kālpanikatvena saṃsaret, jātijarāmaraṇayogī bhavet, tadā ayaṃ mahān virodhaḥ syādityāha buddho 'pi saṃsaredevamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:6944: buddho 'pi saṃsaredevaṃ tataḥ kiṃ bodhicaryayā // Bca_9.13 //
T04bsa054_u:6945: evamabhyupagamyamāne buddho 'pi sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇato nirvṛto 'pi saṃsaret janmādibhāg bhavet
T04bsa054_u:6946: yata evam, tataḥ tasmāt kāraṇāt kiṃ bodhicaryayā?
T04bsa054_u:6948: tayā kim? na kiṃcit prayojanam, uktakrameṇa vaiphalyāt /
T04bsa054_u:6950: samāśrīyate, tathāpi na sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttiścet, kiṃ tatsamāśrayeṇa saṃsādhitamiti bhāvaḥ
T04bsa054_u:6951: tat pratyuktameva yāvatpratyayasāmagrītyādinā, punarapi vispaṣṭayannāha pratyayānāmityādi-
T04bsa054_u:6953: pratyayānāṃ tu vicchedātsaṃvṛtyāpi na saṃbhavaḥ // Bca_9.14 //
T04bsa054_u:6957: māyāpi na kevalaṃ saṃsāra iti samuccaye apiśabdaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:6959: pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ tu (Bcp 186) vicchedāt nivṛtteḥ, saṃvṛttyāpi kālpanikavyavahāreṇāpi na saṃbhavo na saṃsaraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:6962: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-
T04bsa054_u:6963: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena- yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati, sa dharma paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:6964: yo dharmaṃ paśyati, sa buddhaṃ paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:6977: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:6980: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:6983: ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamabhayamahāryamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati, sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:6984: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ yāvadavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ paśyati, so 'nuttaraṃ
T04bsa054_u:6987: tatra avidyā katamā? eteṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ yā ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā
T04bsa054_u:6992: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu, amī avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iutyucyante /
T04bsa054_u:7010: ye cānye evamādāya upakleśāḥ, ime upāyāsā ityucyante //
T04bsa054_u:7039: pratyayānāṃ punarucchede sarvathaiva saṃsaraṇaṃ na syāt, kāraṇavaikalyāt /
T04bsa054_u:7041: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikādicodyamudasya yogācāravipratipattinirākaraṇāya tanmatena dūṣaṇamudbhāvayannāha yadā na bhrāntirapītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7042: yadā na bhrāntirapyasti māyā kenopalabhyate // Bca_9.15 //
T04bsa054_u:7043: yadā sarvaṃ jagat māyātmakatayā svabhāvaśūnyamupagataṃ madhyamakavādibhiḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7044: māyāsvabhāvasaṃvṛtigrāhiṇī buddhirapi bhavatāṃ nāsti bāhyavat, tadā māyā kenopalabhyate, kena pratīyate tadgāhakavastusajjñānamantareṇa? naiva kenacidityarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7045: yasya punaḥ svacittameva paramārthasat bāhyarūpatayā bhrāntaṃ tathā pratibhāsate, na tasyāyaṃ doṣa iti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:7047: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:7048: yadā māyaiva grāhyatayā hastyādyākārapravṛtyā tava vijñānavādino nāsti,
T04bsa054_u:7050: tadā kimiha pratibhāsate? bahirarthābhāvāddeśādivicchedena pratibhāso na
T04bsa054_u:7054: cittasyaiva sa ākāro yadyapyanyo 'sti tattvataḥ // Bca_9.16 //
T04bsa054_u:7055: uktamatra cittameva bahīrūpatayā bhrāntaṃ hastyādyākāraṃ pratibhāsate iti
T04bsa054_u:7057: kiṃ tu yadyapi cittasyaiva jñānasyaiva sa iti deśādivicchedena grāhyatayā pratibhāsamāna ākāro nirbhāsaḥ, anya ityaparaḥ āntarād grāhakāccittākārāt, asti vidyate, tattvato vastutaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:7058: yadyapītyabhyupagamyoktam, tathāpi naitat saṃgacchata ityāha cittameva yadā māyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7059: cittameva yadā māyā tadā kiṃ kena dṛśyate /
T04bsa054_u:7060: cittameva vijñānameva vedakatayā svīkṛtam, yadā māyā nānyā, na hi vedakacittavyatiriktā kācidanyā māyā nāma, tadātmatayā tasyāstathā pratibhāsopagamāt, tadā kiṃ (Bcp 188) kena dṛśyate, kiṃ kena pratīyate?
T04bsa054_u:7064: ato na kenacit kiṃcit dṛśyeta, iti āndhyamaśeṣasya jagataḥ prāptamiti bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7065: nanu syādevaitat yadi jñānasya ātmasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt, yāvatā svasaṃvedanatayā svarūpaṃ saṃvedayat tadabhinnaṃ māyādipratibhāsamapi vedayet /
T04bsa054_u:7066: tathā ca sati na kācit kṣatiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7068: uktaṃ ca lokanāthena cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:7069: svabhāvaśūnyameva sarva jagad yadā yuktitaḥ pratipāditam, tadā kaḥ kasya
T04bsa054_u:7070: svabhāvo vastutaḥ iti kasya kena vedanaṃ syāt? uktaṃ ca bhagavatā-
T04bsa054_u:7076: uktaṃ ca kathitaṃ ca lokanāthena lokānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ nāthena śaraṇyena buddhena bhagavatā
T04bsa054_u:7078: cittaṃ svātmānaṃ na jānāti, satyapi vastutve svātmani kāritravirodhāt /
T04bsa054_u:7080: na cchinatti yathātmānamasidhārā tathā manaḥ // Bca_9.17 //
T04bsa054_u:7081: yathā sutīkṣṇāpyasidhārā khaṅgadhārā tadanyavadātmānaṃ svakāyaṃ na cchinatti na vighāṭayati, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt, tathā manaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7083: tathā hi na tadevaikaṃ jñānaṃ vedyavedakavedanātmasvabhāvatrayaṃ yuktam /
T04bsa054_u:7086: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
T04bsa054_u:7093: tat kimanyaccittamanyadālambanam, atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam? yadi tāvadanyadālambanamanyaccittam, tad dvicittatā bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:7094: atha yadevālambanaṃ tadeva cittam, tat kathaṃ cittaṃ cittaṃ paśyati? na hi cittaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
T04bsa054_u:7095: tadyathā na tasyaiva asidhārayā saiva asiṃdhārā śakyate chettum, na tenaiva aṅgulyagreṇa tadeva aṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate, evameva tenaiva cittena
T04bsa054_u:7097: atra cittāmātravādinaḥ svātmani kriyāvirodhaṃ vighaṭayituṃ svapakṣaprasādhanāya dṛṣṭāntamudbhāvayannāha
T04bsa054_u:7099: ātmabhāvaṃ svasvarūpaṃ yathā dīpaḥ pradīpaḥ saṃprakāśayati dyotayati /
T04bsa054_u:7100: yathā hi kila andhakārāvṛtaghaṭādivastupratipattaye pradīpa upādīyate, na tathā pradīpaprakāśanāya pradīpāntaram, api tu ghaṭādi prakāśayanneva ātmānamapi prakāśayati, tathā prakṛte 'pi svasaṃvedane (Bcp 189)
T04bsa054_u:7102: na cāpi kvacidvirodho dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra yojanīyam /
T04bsa054_u:7103: tasmāt pradīpavadavirodha eveti cet, yadyevaṃ manyase, tadā naivaṃ vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:7105: naiva prakāśyate dīpo yasmānna tamasāvṛtaḥ // Bca_9.18 //
T04bsa054_u:7106: naiva prakāśyate ghaṭādivannaiva uddayotyate dīpaḥ, yasmānna tamasāvṛtaḥ na andhakārapihitaḥ
T04bsa054_u:7107: vidyamānasyāvaraṇasya apanayanaṃ prakāśanam, tato yuktaṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ prakāśanam, teṣāṃ prāg vidyamānatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7114: syādetat- ātmabhāvamityādinā naitadabhidhīyate yadātmānaṃ ghaṭavat tamasāvṛtaṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ, api tu tatsvabhāvaṃ prati paranirapekṣatāmātramasyābhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:7119: yathā sphaṭikopalaḥ svayamanīlaḥ san, nīlatve nīlaguṇotpattinimittamanyamupādhiṃ nīlapatrādisaṃnidhimapekṣate, tathā svayameva yadvastu nīlam, tadapi na nīlatve 'nyamupādhimapekṣate /
T04bsa054_u:7120: tathā tena prakāreṇa kiṃcid ghaṭādikaṃ parāpekṣaṃ pradīpādyapekṣaṃ prakāśaṃ dṛśyate, kiṃcit punaḥ pradīpādikamanapekṣaṃ ca svayaṃprakāśātmakaṃ dṛśyate
T04bsa054_u:7123: evaṃ vijñānavādinā upadarśite viśeṣe siddhāntavādī nīlameva tāvannīlatve paranirapekṣaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopadarśitaṃ pratiṣedhayannāha anīlatva ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7125: nīlameva hi ko nīlaṃ kuryādātmānamātmanā // Bca_9.20 //
T04bsa054_u:7126: ayamapi na sadṛśo dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yato nīlamapi na nīlatve
T04bsa054_u:7128: kadā punaridamanapekṣaṃ syāt? yadi tadanīlameva svahetorutpadyeta /
T04bsa054_u:7134: nīlaṃ nīlaguṇayuktamātmānaṃ svarūpamātmanā svayameva na kuryāt, na kartuṃ śaknoti, pūrvavat svasmin kriyāvirodhāt /
T04bsa054_u:7135: tasmānna nīlasyāpi parānapekṣatā nīlatvaṃ prati sphaṭikavat /
T04bsa054_u:7139: nīlopādhiviśeṣahakāriṇaśca pūrvasvarasanirodhāt anya eva nīlaguṇoparaktaḥ sphaṭikopala utpadyate iti siddhāntaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7142: nanu priyamidamanuṣṭhitaṃ priyeṇa yasmāt jaḍasvabhāvavyāvṛttātmatayā svahetupratyayāt utpattireva jñānasya prakāśāntaranirapekṣasya ātmaprakāśatā svasaṃvedanamucyate /
T04bsa054_u:7158: yadi punardoṣabhayāllokaprasiddho 'pi śabdārthaḥ parityajyate, tadā lokata eva
T04bsa054_u:7162: tathā ca sutarāṃ na svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya, tattvato nijasvabhāvābhāvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7164: na cāpi jaḍasvabhāvatā madhyamakavādinaṃ prati paramārthataḥ kasyacit siddhā, yena jaḍavyāvṛttamajaḍaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ syat /
T04bsa054_u:7169: sāṃprataṃ pradīpasya svayaṃprakāśatāmabhyupagamya buddheḥ svasaṃvedanamayuktamiti pratipādayannāha dīpa ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7170: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti jñātvā jñānena kathyate /
T04bsa054_u:7171: buddhiḥ prakāśata iti jñātvedaṃ kena kathyate // Bca_9.22 //
T04bsa054_u:7172: bhavatu vā pradīpasya prakāśātmatā, tathāpi na buddhisaṃvedanasādhanaṃ
T04bsa054_u:7174: dīpaḥ prakāśata iti ābhāsate prakāśāntaranirapekṣaḥ svayameva, iti jñātvā pratītya jñānena buddhyā kathyate pratipādyate, pradīpasya jñānaviṣayatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7176: 191) prakāśate iti yaducyate, tat punaḥ kena jñānena jñātvā kathyate iti paraṃ pṛcchati /
T04bsa054_u:7177: na cātra kiṃcid buddhipratipattinibandhanamastīti asaṃbhāvanāṃ prakāśayati /
T04bsa054_u:7182: na ca anupakārakasya viṣayabhāvaḥ, nākāraṇaṃ viṣayaḥ iti
T04bsa054_u:7186: itthaṃ sarvathā buddherapratipattau tatsaṃvedanamatīva ayuktamityāha prakāśā vetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7187: prakāśā vāprakāśā vā yadā dṛṣṭā na kenacit /
T04bsa054_u:7192: buddhiḥ yadā dṛṣṭā na kenacit, na pratipannā kenacit pratipantrā svayaṃrūpeṇa vā /
T04bsa054_u:7194: tadā vandhyāyā aprasavadharmiṇyāḥ striyā duhitā putrī,
T04bsa054_u:7203: tadapratīteḥ tasyā api apratītiriti kathyamānāpi yuktirahitena vacanamātreṇa sā svasaṃvittirmudhāḥ, anupādeyatvānniṣprayojanā //
T04bsa054_u:7207: yadi svasaṃvedanaṃ vijñānasya nāsti na vidyate, tadā vijñānaṃ smaryate
T04bsa054_u:7208: katham? vijñānasya svasaṃvedanābhāvāduttarakālaṃ smaraṇaṃ na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:7210: tasmādanubhavaphalasya smaraṇasya uttarakālaṃ darśanāt jñānasaṃvedanamastītyanumīyate iti
T04bsa054_u:7212: yato yadi svasaṃvedanakāryatayā smaraṇaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet, bhaved vahveryathā dhūmaḥ svasaṃvedanasya kāraṇaṃ smṛtiḥ
T04bsa054_u:7213: / na ca asiddhe svasaṃvedane pramāṇataḥ, smaraṇasya tatkāryatāgrahaṇamasti /
T04bsa054_u:7215: na ca cakṣurāderiva vijñānam, adarśane 'pi smaraṇaṃ tatkāryaṃ setsyati,
T04bsa054_u:7221: ataḥ smaraṇamapi jñānatvāt kathaṃ siddhamiti vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:7223: na ca smaraṇaṃ svasaṃvedanasya pratyakṣatayā grāhakam, tasya tasmādanyatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7224: na ca jñānasya jñānāntaraviṣayatvam, bahirarthavat saṃbandhāsiddhayādidoṣaprasaṅgāt /
T04bsa054_u:7225: anyatvāviśeṣāt saṃtānāntarabhāvināpi smaraṇena tasya grahaṇaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:7226: atha tena pūrvamananubhūtatvānna smaryata iti cet, ekasaṃtatipatitenāpi na pūrvamanubhūtamiti samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:7227: kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi na tasya niyāmako yujyate, kāryakāraṇabhāvasyaiva paramārthato 'bhāvāt, satyapi tasmin sarvajñānānāṃ svapratipattiniṣṭhatayā tadgahaṇasyāśakyatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7229: kālpanikatve ca sarvavyavahārāṇāṃ kalpanānirmitatvāt sāṃvṛtatvamiti sādhitaṃ naḥ sādhyam /
T04bsa054_u:7231: bhavato 'pi kathaṃ tarhi svasaṃvedanābhāve smṛtirityāha anyānubhūta ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7233: jñānādanyasmin grāhye vastuni viṣaye 'nubhūte sati jñāne smṛtiḥ
T04bsa054_u:7235: nanu anyasminnanubhūte anyatra smaraṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ syādityāha- saṃbandhāditi /
T04bsa054_u:7237: vijñānaṃ hi tadgāhakatayā tatsaṃbaddham, ato vijñānaṃ smaryate, nānyat /
T04bsa054_u:7238: satyapi saṃbandhe anyasminnanubhūte anyasya smaraṇe viplutaṃ smaraṇaṃ syāditi cenna, pūrvamanubhūto viṣayaḥ uttarakālamanusmaryamāṇaḥ sa evānubhavaviśiṣṭo 'nusmaryate /
T04bsa054_u:7240: jñānameva ca viṣayānubhavo nānya iti viṣayānubhavasmaraṇāttatsaṃbaddhatayā jñāne smaraṇamabhidhīyate, na tu viṣayarahitaṃ jñānamapi kevalamanusmaryate ityadoṣaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:7242: ākhuviṣaṃ mūṣikaviṣaṃ yathā saṃbandhāt kālāntareṇa jāyate, tathā smṛtirapītyarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7243: tathā hi mūṣikaviṣamekasmin kṣaṇe śarīrasaṃkrāntaṃ punaḥ kālāntareṇa meghastanitamadhigamya vināpi svasaṃvedanāhitasmṛtivāsanābījamidaṃpratyayatāmātrāyatavṛttitvāt anyasmin kṣaṇe vikṛtimupayāti, tathā prakṛte 'pi na duṣyatīti bhāvaḥ //
