T04bsa054_u:7248: īkṣaṇikādividyā paracittādijñānābhijñā ca tābhyāṃ yuktasya tatsāmagrīsaṃbaddhasya cittasya darśanāt pratibhāsanāt vijñānasya khaṃ prakāśate svarūpaṃ pratibhāsate /
T04bsa054_u:7250: yadi hi tat sarvadā parokṣarūpaṃ kathaṃ kadācit sāmagrīviśeṣādupalabhyeta, tato yathā sāmagrīviśeṣāt paracittamupalabhyate, tathā samanantarālambanādipratyayāt svacittamapyupalabhyate iti bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7254: siddhaṃ ca tadañjanaṃ ca, siddhasya vā añjanam, tasya vidhiḥ vidhānaṃ
T04bsa054_u:7255: prayogaḥ, tasmād dṛṣṭaḥ pratītaḥ ghaṭo nidhānādi vā naiva añjanaṃ bhavati
T04bsa054_u:7258: evamīkṣaṇikādividyāsahakāriṇā jñānena paracittaṃ ca ghaṭādivad dṛṣṭamiti naitāvatā tatsaṃvedanaṃ siddhaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:7260: nanu yadi jñānamaviditasvarūpaṃ syāt, arthasyāpi pratītirna syāt /
T04bsa054_u:7261: avyaktavyaktikatvād jñānasya, na hi arthasya vyaktiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7262: tadapratītau kathamarthasya pratītiḥ? tathā hi svasaṃvedanasya pratiṣedhāt, anyena anyasya grahaṇāyogācca, tadgahaṇābhyupagame ca uttarottarasya apratītasya pratītaye jñānāntarānusaraṇena anavasthāprasaṅgācca na kathaṃcidapi
T04bsa054_u:7266: sarvaścāyaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāro loke na syādityāha yathā dṛṣṭamityādi /
T04bsa054_u:7267: yaducyate dṛṣṭādivyavahāro na syāditi, sa kiṃ paramārthato na syāt,
T04bsa054_u:7268: saṃvṛtyā vā? tatra yadi paramārthato na syādityucyate, tadā priyamidamasmākam /
T04bsa054_u:7272: yathā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ jñātaṃ naiveha pratiṣidhyate /
T04bsa054_u:7277: tadetadiha sarvaṃ vyavahāramāśritya naiva pratiṣidhyate, naiva vāryate /
T04bsa054_u:7278: yad yathā lokataḥ pratīyate, tat tathaiva avicāritasvarūpamabhyupagamyate
T04bsa054_u:7282: yadi tat tathaivābhyupagamyate, kiṃ nāma tarhi pratiṣidhyate ityāha satyata ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7296: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te /
T04bsa054_u:7300: tasmādasatsamāropakalpanābhiniveśapratiṣedhamātramatrābhipretam, na tu vāstavaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣidhyate iti /
T04bsa054_u:7301: tadevaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ jñānasya na kathaṃcidacidapi yujyate /
T04bsa054_u:7305: yatra boddhā ca bodhyaṃ ca tatra bodhirna vidyate //
T04bsa054_u:7307: yattu kvacid bhagavatā cittamātratāstitvamuktam, tat skandhāyatanādivanneyārthatayeti kathayiṣyate
T04bsa054_u:7308: idānīṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ parisamāpya prakṛte yojayannāha cittādanyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7310: vastu cetsā kathaṃ nānyānanyā cennāsti vastutaḥ // Bca_9.27 //
T04bsa054_u:7311: tarhi cittādanyā māyā syāt, ananyā vā syāt, ubhayasvabhāvā vā,
T04bsa054_u:7315: / dvitīyapakṣe tu "yadā māyaiva te nāsti" [9.6] ityādinā pratipādita eva
T04bsa054_u:7318: / atha caturthī kalpanā, sāpi na saṃgacchate /
T04bsa054_u:7320: ananyā tarhi, nāpyananyeti tattvasyāpi pratiṣedhaḥ, iti ubhayapakṣapātaścedyadi kalpyate vyavasthāpyate, so 'pi
T04bsa054_u:7321: na yuktaḥ, anyonyaparihāravatorekapratiṣedhasya aparavidhināntarīyakatvāt tayorekatrābhāvāt caturthī kalpanā sāpi na saṃghaṭate // api ca /
T04bsa054_u:7323: yadi sā māyā vastusatī kathaṃ nānyā cittādvayatiriktā na bhavati?
T04bsa054_u:7324: atha ananyā cet, yadi cittameva māyā, tadā nāsti vastutaḥ, na vidyate paramārthataḥ, tasyāstatsvabhāvatvāt cittameva kevalam ityetat tadevāyātam /
T04bsa054_u:7326: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:7329: asatyapi yathā māyā dṛśyā draṣṭṛ tathā manaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7331: tādṛśyapi dṛśyā darśanaviṣayā yathā māyā, draṣṭu tathā manaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7333: dṛṣṭāntaḥ, tathā manaḥ paramārthato 'satsvabhāvamapi darśanasamarthaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:7334: tena "yadā na bhrāntirapyasti" [9.15] ityādi yaduktaṃ pareṇa
T04bsa054_u:7339: tathāhi- saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca heyopādeyatayā dvayamidaṃ yathāvat
T04bsa054_u:7346: / tadevaṃ (Bcp 195) saṃkleśavyavadānayorvastusamudbhūtacittamantareṇa vyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti manyante, saṃsāranirvāṇayościttadharmatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7347: cittameva saṃkliśyate, cittameva vyavadāyate iti vacanāt /
T04bsa054_u:7348: tadeva paramataṃ nirūpayati-vastveva vastusadbhūtacittameva āśrayaḥ asyeti
T04bsa054_u:7350: cet yadi saṃsāro vyavasthāpyate, tadā saṃsāro 'nyathā
T04bsa054_u:7351: bhavet, cittādanyaḥ syāt, vastuno 'nyatve avastu syāt, cittasyaiva ca vastutvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7354: 'bhidhīyate, sa kiṃ vastu avastu vā? vastvapi cittaṃ tadanyadvā? tatra yadi vastu cittameva, tadā na cittādanyaḥ saṃsārastadāśryaḥ, cittameva saḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7358: atha avastu, tadā saṃsāro nāma na kiṃcidasti, kharaviṣāṇavat /
T04bsa054_u:7360: yathā ākāśaṃ prajñaptisanmātramasat, na kvacidarthakriyāyāṃ samartham, tathā saṃsāro bhavataḥ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:7363: syādetat- yadi nāma avastu, tathāpi vastusadbhūtacittasamāśritatvāt tasya
T04bsa054_u:7366: na asadrūpasya kaścidāśrayo bhavitumarhati, āśrayāśrayibhāvasya kāryakāraṇarūpatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7367: na ca abhāvaḥ kasyacit kāryam, anirvartyaviśeṣatvāt
T04bsa054_u:7369: abhāvasya asadātmakasya kriyāvattvam, arthakriyākāritvaṃ kathaṃ bhavet? na kadācidapi yujyate ityarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7378: nanu uktameva- grāhyagrāhakādyākāravinirmuktamadvayalakṣaṇaṃ cittam, iti cittaikatāpratipādane na kiṃcidaniṣṭamasmākam /
T04bsa054_u:7381: tat kathaṃ cittamevaikaṃ vastu? astu nāma,
T04bsa054_u:7383: grāhyamuktaṃ yadā cittaṃ tadā sarve tathāgatāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7387: grāhakābhāve ca tadupakalpitasya abhilāpyasyābhāvāt abhilāpasyābhāva ityupadarśayituṃ grāhyamuktamityuktam
T04bsa054_u:7389: jagataścittam, tadā tasya cittasya sarvasattvasaṃtānāntargatatvāt sarvasaṃsāriṇaḥ sattvāḥ (Bcp 196) tathāgatā buddhā bhagavantaḥ prāpnuvanti
T04bsa054_u:7393: tasmāt satyapi grāhyagrāhakavaidhurye bhāvābhiniveśasya tadavasthatvānna sarvathā saṃkleśaprahāṇamityabhisaṃdhāyāha evaṃ cetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7394: evaṃ ca ko guṇo labdhaścittamātre 'pi kalpite // Bca_9.30 //
T04bsa054_u:7397: evamapi svīkṛte ko guṇo labdhaḥ? naiva kaścit /
T04bsa054_u:7404: māyopamatve māyāsvabhāvatve 'pi jagato jñāte kathaṃ kleśo nivartate,
T04bsa054_u:7406: kimatra prahāṇānupapattikāraṇaṃ yat pṛcchasītyāha yadā māyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7408: idamatra prahāṇānupapattibījaṃ dṛśyate- yadā māyāstriyāṃ māyākāravinirmitāyāmabalāyāṃ rāgaḥ saṃraktacittatā jāyate utpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:7411: teṣāmeva jāyate, kiṃ tu tasyā māyāstriyāḥ kartuḥ nirmāturapi jāyate iti apiśabdārthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7412: yadā hi paracittavibhramasaṃpādanārthaṃ mantrauṣadhisāmarthyavinirmitāṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgāvayavalakṣaṇaparipūrṇāmabhinavayauvanaśobhāsaṃpatsamāpannāṃ prasannamanoharavarṇāṃ lāvaṇyātiśayaśālinīm atīva tadākāranirmāṇapravīṇaḥ kaścinmāyākāro janapadakalyāṇīṃ striyamupadarśayati, tadā na tāvat tadanye tāmabhisamīkṣya manmathaśaraprahārāntaravyathitacetaso jāyante, api tu yo
T04bsa054_u:7416: kathaṃcidapi cetaḥ saṃdhārayitumalam, tat kathaṃ māyopamatve 'pi niścite saṃsārasaṃtaticchedaḥ
T04bsa054_u:7424: kimaprahīṇā? jñeyasaṃkleśavāsanā jñeyasaṃkleśaḥ sasvabhāvatāsamāropādāsaṅgādiḥ, vastutāsamāropo vā /
T04bsa054_u:7431: āgantukasaṃkleśavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvāt na sarve tathāgatā bhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:7435: asmākaṃ tu niḥsvabhāvameva janyaṃ janakaṃ ceti na samānam /
T04bsa054_u:7438: tasyā jñeyasasvabhāvatāyā dṛṣṭiḥ upalabdhiḥ, tasyāḥ kāle /
T04bsa054_u:7441: durbalā śūnyavāsaneti śūnyasya śūnyatattvasya śūnyatāyā veti vigrahaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7442: chandonurodhād bhāvapratyayasya lopaṃ kṛtvā śūnyeti nirdeśaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7443: vāsanā saṃskārādhānam, sa durbalā sāmarthyavikalā, āropitasya darśanāt /
T04bsa054_u:7445: kathaṃ tarhi sā nivartate ityāha śūnyatetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7447: śūnyatāyā māyāsvabhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyā vāsanā tasya ādhānam āvedhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7455: / nanu bhāvābhiniveśo vā śūnyatābhiniveśo vā iti nābhiniveśaṃ prati kaścidviśeṣaḥ, tasyāpi kalpanāsvabhāvānatikramāt /
T04bsa054_u:7466: ityevaṃ cābhyāsāt bhāvavāsanāprahāṇasya paścāt sāpi śūnyavāsanāpi prahīyate nivartate /
T04bsa054_u:7467: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- śūnyatāvedho hi bhāvābhiniveśasya pratipakṣatvāt prahāṇopāyabhūtaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7468: adhigate ca upeye paścāt kolopamatvāt upāyasyāpi prahāṇamanuṣṭhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:7473: syādetat- yadi nāma kiṃcinnāstīti manasikārābhyāsād bhavati śūnyatāvāsanāyāḥ prahāṇam, tathāpi tadabhyāsāt punarabhāvakalpanā
T04bsa054_u:7476: jāta iti tadavasthaṃ tava dauṣṭhayam, ityatrāha yadā na labhyate ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7478: yadā na labhyate bhāvo yo nāstīti prakalpyate /
T04bsa054_u:7479: tadā nirāśrayo 'bhāvaḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhenmateḥ puraḥ // Bca_9.34 //
T04bsa054_u:7482: prakalpyate, yasya bhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate, sa yadi vicāryamāṇo
T04bsa054_u:7483: niḥsvabhāvatayā na labhyate na prāpyate taimirikopalabdhakeśastabakavat /
T04bsa054_u:7485: yasyāsau parikalpito bhāvaḥ, tasya saṃbandhino 'bhāvāt nirālambaḥ abhāvaḥ kalpanāvidarśitamūrtiḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhenmateḥ puraḥ, kathamasau vicāreṇa buddheragrataḥ pratibhāsate? svayameva bhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ nivartate //
T04bsa054_u:7488: tatpratiṣedhābhāvādabhāvābhiniveśastu kena vāryate ityata āha- yadā na labhyate ityādi /
T04bsa054_u:7493: yāpi ca kathaṃcid bhāvakalpanā jāyate, sāpi samanantaravicāreṇa nivartate /
T04bsa054_u:7494: ata eva etatsamastakalpanājālavinivartanāya bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa adhyātmaśūnyatādayo 'ṣṭādaśa śūnyatāḥ proktāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7495: na ca śūnyatā bhāvād vyatiriktā, bhāvasyaiva tatsvabhāvatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7496: anyathā śūnyatāyā bhāvād vyatireke dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:7499: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairevaṃ pratyavekṣate- na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyam, rūpameva śūnyam, śūnyataiva rūpam /
T04bsa054_u:7500: na vedanāśūnyatayā vedanā śūnyā, vedanaiva śūnyā, śūnyataiva vedanā /
T04bsa054_u:7501: na saṃjñāśūnyatayā saṃjñā śūnyā, saṃjñaiva śūnyā, śūnyataiva saṃjñā /
T04bsa054_u:7502: na saṃskāraśūnyatayā saṃskārāḥ śūnyāḥ, saṃskārā eva śūnyāḥ, śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7503: na vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaṃ śūnyam, vijñānameva śūnyam,
T04bsa054_u:7506: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
T04bsa054_u:7511: evaṃ sarvavikalpapratyastamayāt samastāvaraṇanirmuktirupajāyate ityupadarśayannāha yadā na bhāva ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7513: yadā na bhāvo nābhāvo mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7515: yadā na bhāvaḥ paramārthasatsvabhāvo materbuddheḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puro
T04bsa054_u:7516: 'grataḥ, na abhāvaḥ, nāpi bhāvavirahitalakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ yadā mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ, tadā anyagatyabhāvena vidhipratiṣedhābhyāṃ
T04bsa054_u:7518: ābhyāmavyatiriktatayā anayoḥ saṃgrahe tāvapi saṃgṛhītāviti nirāśrayā,
T04bsa054_u:7521: kathaṃ tarhi sakalakalpanāvirahādanekakalpāsaṃkhyeyābhilaṣitaṃ parārthasaṃpadupāyabhūtaṃ buddhatvamadhigamya parārthamabhisaṃpādayati bhagavānityatrāha cintāmaṇiriti-
T04bsa054_u:7526: sa yathā vikalpamantareṇāpi lokānāṃ yathābhavyamicchāyāḥ paripūraṇaḥ abhilāṣasya saṃpādakaḥ
T04bsa054_u:7530: jinasya buddhasya bhagavataḥ bimbaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairvirājitaṃ śarīram /
T04bsa054_u:7531: tathā tena prakāreṇa īkṣyate sarvakalpanābhāve 'pi parahitasukhasaṃpādanasamarthaṃ pratīyate
T04bsa054_u:7539: yasyāṃ rātrau tathāgato 'bhisaṃbuddho yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ, atrāntare tathāgatena ekamapyakṣaraṃ nodāhṛtam /
T04bsa054_u:7540: tat kasya hetoḥ? nityaṃ samāhito bhagavān /
T04bsa054_u:7541: ye ca akṣarasvararutavaineyāḥ sattvāḥ, te tathāgatamukhādūrṇākośāduṣṇīṣāt dhvaniṃ niścarantaṃ śṛṇvantītyādi /
T04bsa054_u:7554: evamasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇamākhyāya punaranyathā hetvavasthāyā eva sa tādṛśaḥ
T04bsa054_u:7555: prabhāvāti- śayaviśeṣo yadanābhogena parārthasaṃpādanasamarthaphalamupajāyate iti vṛttadvayenopadarśayannāha
T04bsa054_u:7559: yathā gāruḍiko viṣatatvavit labdhamantrasāmarthyaḥ stambhaṃ kāṣṭhamayaṃ vā anyadvā sādhayitvā mantreṇābhisaṃskṛtya mamābhāvādayameva sarvaviṣāpahāracaturo bhaviṣyatīti vinaśyati, svayamuparatavyāpāro bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:7560: sa stambhaḥ tenābhimantritaḥ tasmin gāruḍike ciranaṣṭe 'pi
T04bsa054_u:7562: chāndasasamayaṃ paripālayatā mito 'pi upadhāyā ṇici hrasvo na kṛtaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7573: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7574: dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum //
T04bsa054_u:7585: iti ubhayathāpi sarvathā kalpanāvirahe 'pi sattvārthasaṃpādanamavikalamupadarśitaṃ bhavati (Bcp 201)
T04bsa054_u:7586: syādetat- yadi bhagavānuparatasakalavikalpālambanatayā nivṛttasarvacittacaittavyāpāraḥ, kathaṃ tarhi tathāgatapūjā mahāphalā varṇyate ityāśaṅkayannāha acittake ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7587: acittake kṛtā pūjā kathaṃ phalavatī bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:7588: saṃvṛticittavivikte bhagavati kṛtā upahṛtā pūjā kārāviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ phalavatī bhavet, saphalā syāt? tatra asatyupabhoktari dāyakadānapatīnāṃ
T04bsa054_u:7590: tulyaiva paṭhyate yasmāttiṣṭhato nirvṛtasya ca // Bca_9.39 //
T04bsa054_u:7593: yasmāt tiṣṭhato nirvṛtasya ca tasmāt phalavatī bhavediti yojanīyam /
T04bsa054_u:7596: nirvṛtasya nirupadhinirvāṇaṃ gatasya pūjāyā nāsti viśeṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7597: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- dvividhaṃ hi puṇyam- tyāgānvayaṃ ca, tyāgādeva yadutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:7599: tatra yadi nāma nirvṛte bhagavati pratigrahīturabhāvāt paribhogānvayaṃ na bhaviṣyati puṇyam, parityāgānvayaṃ ca kena vāryate? apratigṛhṇati kasmiṃścit kathaṃ parityāgānvayamapi puṇyam? kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sati pratigrahītari bhavitavyaṃ puṇyena, nāsati? kasyacidapyabhāvāditi cet,
T04bsa054_u:7605: guṇavati tadbhaktikṛtaṃ svacittādbhavat puṇyaṃ na virudhyate iti //
T04bsa054_u:7606: api ca sarvapuṇyapāpasadbhāve sarveṣāmāgamaḥ sākṣītyāha āgamāccetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:7607: āgamācca phalaṃ tatra saṃvṛtyā tattvato 'pi vā /
T04bsa054_u:7611: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- kasyacit tat phalaṃ sāṃvṛtam,
T04bsa054_u:7615: bhagavadāgamāt pratīyate, tatra ca āvayoravivāda eva tatra idamuktaṃ
T04bsa054_u:7617: ye kecit siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kariṣyanti tiṣṭhato vā parinirvṛtasya vā, sarve te triyānādekatareṇa yānena parinirvāsyanti /
T04bsa054_u:7618: yaśca khalu siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ prasādayet, prasannacittaḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet upacaret, lābhena cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānairupatiṣṭhet /
T04bsa054_u:7619: yaśca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya sarṣapaphalamātradhātau śarīrapūjāṃ kuryāt, samo vipākaḥ
T04bsa054_u:7620: / tathā pūjāyai nāsti viśeṣo nānākaraṇaṃ ca /
T04bsa054_u:7629: yaśca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgataṃ varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā
T04bsa054_u:7631: bodhicittaparigṛhītaikapuṣpamāropayet, tathāgatapūjāyai jalāñjaliṃ copanāmayet, jalena copasiñcet, īṣikāpadaṃ vā dadyāt, nirmālyaṃ vā apanayet, upalepanapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryāt, āttamanāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7632: ekakramapadavyatihāraṃ vā atikramya vācaṃ bhāṣeta- namastamai buddhāya bhagavate iti, mā te atra siṃhavikrīḍita kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā,
T04bsa054_u:7633: yadasau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchet,
T04bsa054_u:7636: satyabuddhe kṛtā pūjā saphaleti kathaṃ yathā // Bca_9.40 //
T04bsa054_u:7637: satyabuddhe paramārthasati bhagavati kṛtā pūjā saphaleti phalavatī,
T04bsa054_u:7642: śūnyatāvāsanādhānādityādi yaduktam, tatra vaibhāṣikādayaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāḥ sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇamasahamānāḥ caturāryasatyadarśanabhāvanāṃ ca tadupāyamicchantaḥ prāhuḥ satyadarśanata ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7652: tatra vṛttasthasya śrutacintāvato bhāvanāyāṃ pravṛttasya aśubhānāpānasmṛtismṛtyupasthānabhāvanā niṣpattikrameṇa anityato duḥkhata śūnyato 'nātmataśca ityetaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhirākāraiḥ duḥkhādisatyaṃ paśyataḥ uṣmagatādicaturnirvedhabhāgīyadvāreṇa duḥkhe
T04bsa054_u:7663: na vinānena mārgeṇa bodhirityāgamo yataḥ // Bca_9.41 //
T04bsa054_u:7667: sarva eva hi bhāvā āropitamanāropitaṃ ceti rūpadvayamudvahanti /
T04bsa054_u:7668: tatra yat tadavidyāpravāhitamāropitaṃ rūpam, tat sarvajanasādhāraṇamiti na
T04bsa054_u:7672: tacca prajñayā vivecyamānaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhalakṣaṇamavasitamiti sarvadharmaśūnyataiva sarvāvaraṇavibhramaprahāṇāya paṭīyasītyavagamyate /
T04bsa054_u:7680: bhagavānāha- iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
T04bsa054_u:7685: yāvat mārgākārajñatāṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati /
T04bsa054_u:7686: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati /
T04bsa054_u:7693: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa bhāvaḥ eṣo 'hamiti dvayorantayoḥ saktaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7694: dāne śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyām /
T04bsa054_u:7697: yaśca dvayorantayoḥ saktaḥ, tasya nāsti mokṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7698: tatkasya hetoḥ? nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñino dānam, yāvat nāsti prajñā,
T04bsa054_u:7699: nāsti mārgaḥ, nāsti jñānam, nāsti prāptiḥ, nāsti abhisamayaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:7700: nāstyānulomikī kṣāntiḥ, nāsti rūpasya parijñā, nāsti vedanāyāḥ parijñā,
T04bsa054_u:7708: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, te 'pi imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ
T04bsa054_u:7709: (Bcp 204) ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanti anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ, te 'pi imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
T04bsa054_u:7711: te etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ
T04bsa054_u:7712: samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti, dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti, te 'pi
T04bsa054_u:7716: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanti anāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ, ye 'pi te etarhi pratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ, te 'pi imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ, prāpsyanti prāpnuvanti ca /
T04bsa054_u:7717: tatkasya hetoḥ? atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvāṇi trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni /
T04bsa054_u:7718: tāni punaranimittayogena anupalambhayogena anutpādayogena asaṃkleśayogena avyavadānayogena, yāvat tatpunaḥ lokavyavahāreṇa aparamārthayogena /
T04bsa054_u:7725: nanvasiddhaṃ mahāyānaṃ nanu bhoḥ śūnyatāvādin, mahāyānamāgamatvena mama asiddham, asaṃmatam,
T04bsa054_u:7729: yadi mahāyānamasiddham, kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa tvadīyāgamo bhagavadvacanamiti siddhaḥ? tatra na kiṃcidāgamatvaprasādhakaṃ
T04bsa054_u:7733: yasmāt kāraṇāt ubhayasya tava mama ca siddhaḥ āgamatvena niścito 'sau
T04bsa054_u:7735: na hi madāgame bhavato 'pi mahāyānānuyāyino buddhavacanatvena vipratipattirasti, tasmāt siddho 'sau /
T04bsa054_u:7741: yadyapi ubhayasiddhatvaṃ tvadāgamasya āgamasiddhau hetuḥ, tadāpi
T04bsa054_u:7743: yasmāt tavaiva tāvadasau tvadāgamaḥ na siddhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7745: na hi abhyupagamāt prāk tava kathaṃcidapyasau siddhaḥ, iti ubhayasiddhatvamasiddhatvādasādhanam
T04bsa054_u:7747: yadyapi ubhayasiddhatvamasiddham, idaṃ tarhi sādhanamastu- yad guruśiṣyaparaṃparayā āmrāyāyātaṃ buddhavacanatvena, yacca sūtre 'vatarati,
T04bsa054_u:7748: vinaye saṃdṛśyate, dharmatāṃ [pratītyasamutpādaṃ] ca na vilomayati, tad buddhavacanaṃ nānyat
T04bsa054_u:7750: yatpratyayā ca tatrāsthā mahāyāne 'pi tāṃ kuru /
T04bsa054_u:7751: yaḥ pratyayo nibandhanam asyā āsthāyāḥ, sā tathoktā /
T04bsa054_u:7755: tāṃ tatpratyayāmāsthām iha mahāyāne 'pi kuru vidhehi /
T04bsa054_u:7758: api tu maitreya caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ sarvabuddhabhāṣitaṃ veditavyam /
T04bsa054_u:7766: yasya kasyacinmaitreya etaiścaturbhiḥ pratibhāti pratibhāsyati vā, tatra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā buddhasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /
T04bsa054_u:7768: tatkasya hetoḥ? yat kiṃcinmaitreya subhāṣitam, sarvaṃ tadbuddhabhāṣitam /
T04bsa054_u:7769: tatra maitreya ya imāni pratibhānāni pratikṣipet- naitāni
T04bsa054_u:7770: buddhabhāṣitānīti, teṣu ca agauravamutpādayet, pudgalavidveṣeṇa tena sarvaṃ buddhabhāṣitaṃ pratibhānaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:7771: dharmaṃ pratikṣipya dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā apāyagāmī bhavati //
T04bsa054_u:7777: etanmahāyāne sarvamastīti kathamupādeyaṃ na syāt? yaduktam "na siddho 'sau
T04bsa054_u:7780: siddhamubhayasiddhamiti, kiṃ tarhi āvābhyāmanyeṣāmubhayeṣāṃ madāgamaḥ siddha ityupādeyaḥ, na mahāyānam, etadviparītatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7783: yadi āvayorvivādārūḍhatvāt āvābhyāmanye ye kecidapratipannā ubhaye,
T04bsa054_u:7786: tasya satyatve yathārthatve abhyupagamyamāne sati vedāderapi satyatā vedavākyasya codanālakṣaṇasya
T04bsa054_u:7789: tatrāpi vādiprativādibhyāmanyonyobhayasaṃmatiḥ saṃbhāvyate, iti tadapyupādeyaṃ bhavataḥ syāt
T04bsa054_u:7791: athāpi syāt- madāgame buddhavacanatve 'vivādaḥ, na tu mahāyāne /
T04bsa054_u:7792: tena sa upādeyo netaradityāśaṅkayannāha savivādaṃ mahāyānamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:7796: kecid buddhavacanatayā pravṛttyaṅgamicchanti, kecit tadviparītasamāropānnecchanti, iti hetoḥ, cet yadi na grāhyam, tadā āgamaṃ tyaja, svāgamamapi vijahīhi, so 'pi
T04bsa054_u:7799: na kevalaṃ tīrthikaiḥ, api tu svayūthyairityāha- svairiti /
T04bsa054_u:7801: tatra ekasyaiva nikāyasya anekabhedasaṃbhavāt svayūthyairapi parasparavivādaḥ saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:7808: tvadāgamasyāpi aparāpekṣayā savivādatvaṃ samānamiti parityāge tulya eva nyāyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7810: svairiti ekabhedavyavasthitaiḥ sautrāntikābhidharmikavainayikaiḥ parasparaṃ savivādatvāt sūtrābhidharmavinayāḥ parityāgamarhanti /
T04bsa054_u:7818: na ca sūtrābhidharmavinayānāṃ parasparamekavākyatā bhavataḥ saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:7834: saiva mūlaṃ kando yasyeti tattathoktam, tatpratiṣṭhitatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:7837: bhavati, tathā bhagavato 'pi śāsanakalpapādapobhikṣutākandamāsādya smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattibodhipākṣikāryāṣṭāṅgikamārgaśrāmaṇyaphalasaṃpannaḥ (Bcp 207) ṛddhiprātihāryādibhiḥ kleśoṣmasaṃtāpādyapaharaṇapaṭurbhavati,
T04bsa054_u:7840: bhikṣaṇaśīlo bhikṣuḥ, jñapticaturthakarmaṇopasaṃpanno bhikṣuḥ, bhinnakleśo bhikṣuḥ iti pañcaprakāro bhikṣuḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7847: sā ca āryasatyadarśanato na saṃgacchate ityāha- bhikṣutaiva cetyādi /
T04bsa054_u:7851: yasmāt sā bhikṣutaiva duḥsthitā, śūnyatādarśanamantareṇa asamañjasā kevalasatyadarśanato na yujyate /
T04bsa054_u:7854: sahāvalambanena vastvabhiniveśena vartate iti sāvalambanam, tattādṛśaṃ cittaṃ yeṣāṃ yogināṃ te tathoktāḥ, teṣāmiti /
T04bsa054_u:7855: yataḥ te duḥkhādisatyaṃ kleśavisaṃyogaṃ ca vastutvenāvalambante iti mataṃ bhavatām /
T04bsa054_u:7858: dvidhā hi satyadarśanaṃ saṃbhāvyate, paramārthataḥ saṃvṛtito vā /
T04bsa054_u:7859: tad yadādyo vikalpaḥ, tadā nāsmākaṃ vipratipattiḥ, asmatpakṣasya pradhānatvāt,
T04bsa054_u:7866: tattvātattvavivecanāt, paramārthasatyamevātra kleśaprahāṇāya niścīyate na saṃvṛtisatyam /
T04bsa054_u:7870: nivartate, yāvacca kalpanā tāvadakhaṇḍitamahimānaḥ saṃkleśāḥ cittasaṃtānamadhyāvasanti /
T04bsa054_u:7871: yāvacca saṃkleśāḥ tāvat karmanirmitajanmaparaṃparāprasavaḥ saṃsāro 'pi sutarāmavyāhataprasaraḥ pravartate /
T04bsa054_u:7882: iti na kevalaṃ bhikṣutā, kiṃ tarhi nirvāṇamapi, ityaperarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7887: yadi ca āryasatyadarśanataḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante, tato vimuktirupajāyate,
T04bsa054_u:7888: tadā tadanantaraṃ kleśaprahāṇāt samanantaramevāstu sā muktirbhavastu /
T04bsa054_u:7890: ko vai nāma anyathā brūte? naitadasti, kuta ityāha-
T04bsa054_u:7891: dṛṣṭaṃ ca teṣu sāmarthyaṃ niṣkleśasyāpi karmaṇaḥ // Bca_9.46 //
T04bsa054_u:7895: yasmāt teṣu prahīṇakleśeṣu āryamaudgalyāyanāryāṅgulimālaprabhṛtiṣu sāmarthyaṃ phaladānaṃ prati śaktiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7900: nanu ca satyadarśanādavidyādi prahīyate, tatprahāṇāt saṃskārādiprahāṇakrameṇa tṛṣṇāpi prahīyate
T04bsa054_u:7902: tataśca tayorabhāvāt tuṣarahitasya bījasyeva karmaṇaḥ sadbhāve 'pi na kiṃcidvihanyate iti
T04bsa054_u:7910: tatra katamat samudayāryasatyam? yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī
T04bsa054_u:7912: nandinī, yaduta kāmatṛṣṇā bhavatṛṣṇā vibhavatṛṣṇā ceti //
T04bsa054_u:7913: tadevaṃ yasya tṛṣṇā nāsti, tasya prahīṇasamudayasya kāraṇābhāvāt na punarjanmasaṃbhavaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7916: avidyāprahāṇāt tṛṣṇā punarbhavopādānaṃ kāraṇaṃ tāvannāsti, na vidyate cedyadi saṃpradhāryate niścīyate, tadā naitadvaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:7920: kimakliṣṭāpi tṛṣṇaiṣāṃ nāsti saṃmohavat satī // Bca_9.47 //
T04bsa054_u:7921: akliṣṭāpi satī kleśāsaṃprayuktāpi tṛṣṇā kimeṣāṃ bhavadyogināṃ nāsti na saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:7927: tṛṣṇā tu tatkāryam, avikale 'pi kāraṇe na samasti
T04bsa054_u:7928: iti kathamabhidhātuṃ śakyate? niravidyasya vedanāyāmapi tṛṣṇā na bhavatīti cet, na /
T04bsa054_u:7930: tato yadi akliṣṭājñānavat nābhyupagamyate tṛṣṇā, tathāpi śūnyatādarśanamantareṇa nyāyabalādāpatati
T04bsa054_u:7931: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- yadā muktasaṃtāne 'pi karmaṇaḥ phaladānasāmarthyamupalabhyate, (Bcp 209) tṛṣṇā ca vedanāsadbhāve saṃbhāvyamānā, tadā kleśaprahāṇamapi saṃdihyamānaṃ
T04bsa054_u:7932: kathamiva vimuktau niścayaṃ kuryāt? tasmānna śūnyatāmantareṇa bhikṣutā
T04bsa054_u:7937: sālambanena cittena sthātavyaṃ yatra tatra vā // Bca_9.48 //
T04bsa054_u:7939: yatra tatra vā yatra tatra āsaṅgasthāneṣu āryasatyādiṣu tadbhāvanāphaleṣu vā /
T04bsa054_u:7940: āsaṅgasaṃbhāvanāyāṃ na punarjanmanivṛttiriti kathaṃ punarjanmasaṃbhāvanāyāṃ nirvāṇamapi na saṃdigdhaṃ syāt?
T04bsa054_u:7944: vinā śūnyatayā śūnyatāmantareṇa cittaṃ vijñānaṃ sālambanaṃ baddhaṃ saṃyatam ālambanāsaṅgapāśena
T04bsa054_u:7945: utpadyate punaḥ, samādhibalāt kiyatkālaṃ nivṛttamapi punarutpattimad bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:7946: kva punaridaṃ dṛṣṭamityāha- yathā asaṃjñisamāpattau iti /
T04bsa054_u:7947: yathā asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ samāpadyamānānāṃ tāvatkālaṃ cittacaittanirodhe 'pi punastadutpattiḥ syāt, tathā anyatrāpi ityarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:7951: yathā asaṃjñisamāpattiṃ samāpadya asaṃjñiṣu deveṣu upapadyamānānāmanekakalpaśataṃ yāvanniruddhānāmapi tatsamāpattivipākaphalaparisamāptau cittacaittānāṃ punarutpattiḥ, tathā /
T04bsa054_u:7952: yataḥ śūnyatāmantareṇa na bhikṣutā na nirvāṇamupapadyate, tataḥ ubhayārthināṃ śūnyataiva bhāvanīyetyāha bhāvayedityādi /
T04bsa054_u:7953: yena kāraṇena vinā śūnyatayā cittaṃ baddhamutpadyate punaḥ, tena kāraṇena nirvāṇādyarthī
T04bsa054_u:7958: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api tu strotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati- mayā strotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti? subhūtirāha- no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
T04bsa054_u:7960: hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan kiṃcidāpannaḥ, tenocyate strotaāpanna iti /
T04bsa054_u:7961: na rūpamāpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyāni na dharmānāpannaḥ, tenocyate strotaāpanna iti /
T04bsa054_u:7962: saced bhagavan strotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavet- mayā strotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti, sa eva tasya ātmagrāho bhavet sattvagrāho jīvagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāho bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:7964: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu arhata evaṃ bhavati- mayārhattvaṃ
T04bsa054_u:7971: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam, na kvacit pratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam, na rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam, na śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyamiti /
T04bsa054_u:7975: mahāyānaṃ bhavatsūtraiḥ prāyastulyaṃ na kiṃ matam // Bca_9.50 //
T04bsa054_u:7977: ekena sūtratulyena kiṃ na sarvaṃ jinoditam // Bca_9.51 //
T04bsa054_u:7983: śāsanaṃ bhikṣutetyādiṣu āgamavivādāt, prakramāntaratvāt pūrvameva vaktumucitam /
T04bsa054_u:7984: anenāntaritasya vivādasya punarupakramo granthakārasya prastāvākauśalaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:7988: syādetat- yathā sālambanacittasyāsaṅgasaṃbhavāt na muktiḥ syāt, tathā śūnyatāyāmapi bhayamupajāyāte
T04bsa054_u:7992: mohena duḥkhināmarthe śūnyatāyā idaṃ phalam // Bca_9.53 //
T04bsa054_u:8008: ataḥ śūnyatāyā idaṃ phalam, yat punarapi nivṛtya saṃsāre 'vasthānam /
T04bsa054_u:8009: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yathā śūnyatāvyatirekeṇa upalambhadṛṣṭerna muktiḥ syāt, tathā viṣayāsaṅgasukhacetāḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatābhayabhītakātaraḥ varaṃ saṃsāra evāvasthānamiti manyamāno bālaḥ praśamasukhavimukho vinivṛtya jātyādiduḥkhamanubhavan
T04bsa054_u:8011: anye tu saktitrāsāntanirmuktayeti pāṭhaṃ manyamānā evaṃ vyācakṣate-
T04bsa054_u:8016: tathā hi- śāśvatadṛṣṭerāsaktiḥ, ucchedadṛṣṭeśca trāso jāyate /
T04bsa054_u:8019: yat paramārthavicāreṇa śāśvatāntavivarjanam, saṃvṛtisatyābhyupagamena ca ucchedāntaparityāgaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8021: tathā ca kiṃ saṃpadyate ityāha- saṃsāre sidhyati sthitiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8022: prajñayā saṃsāradoṣāliptasya karuṇāparatantratvāt saṃsāre sidhyati niṣpadyate sthitiravasthānam
T04bsa054_u:8023: kimartham? duḥkhināmarthe paraduḥkhaduḥkhitayā duḥkhināṃ saṃsāriṇāmarthe, tadduḥkhasamuddharaṇābhilāṣāt
T04bsa054_u:8024: nanu saṃsāriṇo nāma paramārthato na santyeva, tat kathaṃ tadavasthānamityatrāha- mohena viparyāsena saṃvṛtyā sattvasyopalambhāt /
T04bsa054_u:8025: etacca "duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ tu kāryamoho na vāryate" [9.77] ityatra paścād vyaktīkariṣyate
T04bsa054_u:8026: tasmācchūnyatāyā idaṃ phalam, yatkaruṇayā saṃsāre 'vatiṣṭhamāno 'pi śūnyatādarśanāt saṃsāradoṣairna lipyate /
T04bsa054_u:8031: tadetat evamuktakrameṇa śūnyatāpakṣe uktaṃ dūṣaṇam- śūnyatāyāṃ trāsāt saṃsārāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ nopapadyate na saṃgacchate vakṣyamāṇasamādhānāt /
T04bsa054_u:8036: tena satā bhāvanīyaiva abhyasanīyaiva śūnyatā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā anupalambhayogena //
T04bsa054_u:8037: etena yaduktam- "na vinānena mārgeṇa" [9.41] tadupasaṃhṛtaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:8040: śīghraṃ sarvajñatākāmo na bhāvayati tāṃ katham // Bca_9.55 //
T04bsa054_u:8046: jñeyameva samāropitarūpatvādāvṛtiḥ, saiva tama iva tamaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8049: tasmāt śīghraṃ tvaritaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ buddhatve kāmo 'bhilāṣo yasyāsau tathoktaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8052: kathamiti, tāṃ śūnyatāṃ kathaṃ na bhāvayati nābhyasyati? api tu mahatā
T04bsa054_u:8055: yadapyuktam- trāsācchūnyatāyāṃ pravṛttirna syāt, tadapi na yuktamityāha-
T04bsa054_u:8057: dvitīyapakṣe punaritthamavatāraṇīyam- astyeva śūnyatāyāmeṣo 'nuśaṃsaḥ, kevalaṃ prathamata eva tatra saṃtrāsātpravṛttirna syāditi /
T04bsa054_u:8060: śūnyatā duḥkhaśamanī tataḥ kiṃ jāyate bhayam // Bca_9.56 //
T04bsa054_u:8061: yadvastu duḥkhajananaṃ pīḍākaram, tasmādvastunaḥ sakāśāt trāsaḥ bhayaṃ jāyatāṃ nāma /
T04bsa054_u:8063: tataḥ tasyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ kiṃ kiṃnimittaṃ abhayasthāne kātarasya janasya bhayaṃ jāyate? sarvaguṇanidānatvāt premaiva tasyāmucitamiti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:8067: yatastato vāstu bhayaṃ yadyahaṃ nāma kiṃcana /
T04bsa054_u:8068: ahameva na kiṃciccedbhayaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // Bca_9.57 //
T04bsa054_u:8069: yatastato vā bhayābhayasthānāt astu bhavatu bhayam /
T04bsa054_u:8073: ahaṃ nāma ahaṃpratyayavedyaṃ yatkiṃcana kiṃcidvastu syāt /
T04bsa054_u:8076: yadā punarahameva na kiṃcit na vastusat vicāryamāṇamahaṃ kiṃcit śabdavikalpamātrādanyata, tadā bhayaṃ kasya? ahamityasyābhāvāt /
T04bsa054_u:8078: ito 'pi vicārāt trāso nivartate iti bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8080: nāsmyahaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi na me 'sti na bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:8086: na siṃghāṇaṃ na ca śleṣmā na pūyaṃ lasikāpi vā // Bca_9.58 //
T04bsa054_u:8093: siṃghāṇaṃ na ca śleṣmā na pūyam /
T04bsa054_u:8100: nāhaṃ vasā na ca svedo na medo 'strāṇi nāpyaham /
T04bsa054_u:8101: na cāhamantranirguṇḍī gūthamūtramahaṃ na ca // Bca_9.59 //
T04bsa054_u:8102: nāhaṃ vasā na ca svedo na meda iti /
T04bsa054_u:8114: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na ca strāyu noṣmā vāyurahaṃ na ca /
T04bsa054_u:8115: na ca cchidrāṇyahaṃ nāpi ṣaḍ vijñānāni sarvathā // Bca_9.60 //
T04bsa054_u:8116: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na ca snāyu noṣmā /
T04bsa054_u:8123: na ca cchidrāṇi cakṣurādīni, tānyapi nāham /
T04bsa054_u:8125: sarvathā, ṣaṭ cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānāni, tānyapi nāhaṃ bhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:8128: tacca pratyekamahaṃpratyayavedyaṃ na bhavati, pratyekamahaṃpratyayasya teṣu abhāvāt /
T04bsa054_u:8129: na hi pareṣāmapi ekaikaśaḥ keśādayo 'haṃ pratyayavedyā bhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:8130: samuditā api te eva kevalāḥ pūrvavat /
T04bsa054_u:8131: na ca samuditeṣu teṣu kaścidekaḥ saṃbhavati, tasya pratiṣetsyamānatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:8133: na ca anekeṣu ekapratyayo bhrānto yuktaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8137: santi asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajo malaṃ tvakū māṃsāsthi snāyu śirā bukkā hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ antrāṇi antraguṇāḥ āmāśayaḥ pakkāśayaḥ audarīyakaṃ yakṛt purīṣam aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṃghāṇakaṃ vasā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śliṣmapūyaśoṇitaṃ mastakaluṅgaṃ prasrāvaḥ eṣu ca vastuṣu bodhisattvaḥ upaparīkṣaṇajātīyo bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:8141: syādetat- yadi nāma keśādayo 'haṃpratyayavedyā na bhavanti, tathāpi nāyaṃ nirviṣayaḥ sidhyati
T04bsa054_u:8145: yasmāt- ahaṃ gauraḥ kṛśo dīrgho gacchāmītyādyākāraparāmarśātmaka eva ayamahaṃpratyayaḥ pratibhāsate /
T04bsa054_u:8147: na ca anyākāreṇa jñānena anyasya grahaṇaṃ yuktam, atiprasaṅgāt /
T04bsa054_u:8148: tathā hi tadvān, idamidaṃ tasya lakṣaṇamupavarṇayanti pare /
T04bsa054_u:8149: tatra naiyāyikāstāvat nityaṃ sarvagataṃ pratiprāṇibhinnamacetanaṃ cetanāyogāttu cetanaṃ sukhādiguṇādhāraṃ śubhāśubhakarmakartāraṃ tatphalopabhoktāraṃ paralokinaṃ ca ātmānamicchanti /
T04bsa054_u:8160: na ca tasya pravṛttinivṛttī bhavataḥ, tasyobhayatrānugatarūpatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:8177: kāpilāstu nityaṃ vyāpakaṃ nirguṇaṃ svayameva caitanyātmakamātmānamicchanti, na tu buddhisaṃbandhāt
T04bsa054_u:8180: nāpi sa kasyacit kāryasya kartā, svayaṃ tatphalopabhoktā vā, niṣkriyatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:8183: tathā hi- yadā puruṣasya śabdādiviṣayopabhogākāramautsukyamupajāyate, tadā prakṛtiḥ parijñātapuruṣautsukyā puruṣeṇa yujyate, tataḥ śabdādisargaṃ karoti /
T04bsa054_u:8184: śabdādiṣu śrotrādivṛttibhirmanasādhiṣṭhitābhiḥ parigṛhīteṣu viṣayeṣu buddhiradhyavasāyaṃ karoti
T04bsa054_u:8189: ātmanaśca nijaṃ rūpaṃ caitanyaṃ kalpayanti te //
T04bsa054_u:8191: pradhānenopanītaṃ ca phalaṃ bhuṅkte sa kevalam /
T04bsa054_u:8196: upaniṣadvādinastu samastaprāṇisaṃtānāntargatamekameva vyāpi nityaṃ ca jñānamicchanti /
T04bsa054_u:8199: na bāhyaṃ kimapyavayavi paramāṇvādikaṃ grāhyaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhamasti /
T04bsa054_u:8214: tatkathamātmā ahaṃpratyayatayā pratibhāsate ityucyate? tasmād vikalpamātrametat /
T04bsa054_u:8216: saṃprati citsvabhāvātmavādinaḥ sāṃkhyādayaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānāmātmaniṣedhamasahiṣṇavaḥ prāhuḥ- śabdādijñānaṃ cidātmakamātmaivāsmābhirabhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:8219: śabdajñānaṃ yadi tadā śabdo gṛhyeta sarvadā /
T04bsa054_u:8220: nanu yadi śabdajñānātmaka ātmā, tasya ca nityatvāt śabdajñānaṃ nityaṃ syāt, tadā śabdo 'pi sadā nityameva tadbhāvābhāvakālayorgrahītavyaḥ syāt,
T04bsa054_u:8225: jñeyaṃ vinā tu kiṃ vetti yena jñānaṃ nirucyate // Bca_9.61 //
T04bsa054_u:8226: jñānameva nityamupasthitam, śabdasya tu kādācitkatvāt na sarvadā sattābhivyaktiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8227: tataśca tadasattākāle jñeyaṃ vinā viṣayamantareṇa kiuṃ vetti kiṃ jānāti tad jñānam? tuśabdo 'sattākālapraśnaviśeṣe vartate /
T04bsa054_u:8228: yena jñeyena śūnyamapi jñānaṃ nirucyate abhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:8229: jñeyaṃ jānātīti jñānamākhyāyate, tadabhāvāt kathaṃ jñānamityāśayaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:8231: ajānānaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
T04bsa054_u:8232: yadapi viṣayaṃ na jānāti, tadapi yadi jñānamucyate, tadā kāṣṭhamajñānasvabhāvaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate
T04bsa054_u:8233: na hi tena kiṃcidaparāddhaṃ yena na vijñānaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:8235: tasmādviṣayaparijñānābhāvāt yathā kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati, tathā anyadapi na syādityāha-
T04bsa054_u:8237: yena nirviṣayaṃ na jñānam, tena kāraṇena asaṃnihitajñeyaṃ
T04bsa054_u:8238: asaṃnihitamayogyadeśasthaṃ jñeyaṃ grāhyo viṣayo yasya tattathoktaṃ jñānaṃ nāsti na vidyate iti niścayaḥ ekānta eṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8243: yato yadasya jñānasya paricchedyaṃ rūpaṃ vyaktamityucyate,
T04bsa054_u:8245: śabdasya tu sadā sattvamasattvaṃ vā na vivakṣitam /
T04bsa054_u:8248: yena rūpeṇa jñānasya grāhyo viṣayaḥ, tasya na sarvadā saṃnidhānamastīti kṛtvā iti kathaṃ noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ? śabdasya yathā sarvadā sattvaṃ nāsti,
T04bsa054_u:8251: yadi śabdajñānamevātmā, tadā tadgrahaṇātmakatvāttasya rūpagrahaṇaṃ na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:8253: yataḥ tadeva rūpagrāhakamiṣyate iti cedatrāha tadevetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8254: tadeva rūpaṃ jānāti tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi /
T04bsa054_u:8255: tadeva śabdajñānameva yadi rūpaṃ jānātīti matam, tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi,
T04bsa054_u:8256: tadā rūpagrahaṇakāle kimiti na śṛṇotyapi, śabdamapi kiṃ na gṛhṇāti?
T04bsa054_u:8259: kevalamasaṃnidhānāt na doṣa iti parasyottaramāśaṅkayāha śabdasyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8261: śabdasya viṣayatāmāpannasya asaṃnidhānādayogyadeśāt grahaṇaṃ na syāt-
T04bsa054_u:8263: tat tasmāt tarhi śabdasyāsaṃnidhānāt tat jñānamapi śabdajñānam asadavidyamānam /
T04bsa054_u:8267: yadi śabdajñānaṃ tadā rūpagrahaṇādyātmakaṃ tanna yujyate ityāha
T04bsa054_u:8272: yat jñānaṃ tad rūpagrahaṇaṃ rūpagrahaṇātmakaṃ katham? na kathaṃcidapi syāt
T04bsa054_u:8274: nanu yathā kaścideka eva kasyacidapekṣayā pitā, kasyacidapekṣayā ca sa eva putraḥ syāt, tathā prakṛte 'pi rūpadvayamekasya bhaviṣyatītyāha ekaḥ pitetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8275: ekaḥ pitā ca putraśca kalpyate na tu tattvataḥ // Bca_9.64 //
T04bsa054_u:8276: ekaḥ pitā eva janakaḥ putraśca janyaḥ sa eveti kalpyate, sa tu tadapekṣayā
T04bsa054_u:8278: na tu tattvataḥ, na punaḥ paramārthataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8283: tasmāt yathā vāstavamekasya dvirūpatvaṃ tanna dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyasti, yaccāsti
T04bsa054_u:8285: ito 'pi na pāramārthiko 'yaṃ vyapadeśa ityāha sattvaṃ raja iti-
T04bsa054_u:8286: sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpi na putro na pitā yataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8287: etacca avaśyaṃ tvayāpi svīkartavyam- sāṃkhyamate hi triguṇamekaṃ jagat,
T04bsa054_u:8288: tataḥ sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpīti samudāyaḥ samuccayārthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8289: yato yasmādete guṇāḥ svasvabhāvāvasthitāḥ pratyekaṃ samuditā vā /
T04bsa054_u:8293: putrāvasthāyāṃ ye sattvarajastamolakṣaṇā guṇāḥ, te eva prāptajanakabhāvā
T04bsa054_u:8304: svabhāvastasya rūpagrāhakasya jñānasya nekṣyate na pratīyate /
T04bsa054_u:8306: syādetat- yadi nāma na pratīyate, tathāpi tadeva tat /
T04bsa054_u:8310: anyena rūpeṇa svabhāvena rūpagrahaṇātmakena rūpaṃ gṛhṇātīti śeṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8312: yathā nāṭyasamaye raṅgabhūmigato naṭaḥ eka eva (Bcp 218) nānārūpeṇāvatarati, tathā prakṛte 'pīti na doṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8313: atrāha- so 'pyaśāśvataḥ iti anityaḥ pūrvasvabhāvaparityāgena rūpāntaramāviśati /
T04bsa054_u:8314: na ca pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāva eva naṭo nānārūpasaṃbandhāt, anyathā tasya rūpadvayamekadeti bhāṣeta /
T04bsa054_u:8318: svabhāvaḥ punarasya aparāpara utpadyate nirudhyate ca /
T04bsa054_u:8323: ced yadi ucyate, tadā apūrveyaṃ tadekatā, apūrveyamadṛṣṭapūrveyamīdṛśī tadekatā /
T04bsa054_u:8325: tathā hi- sa eveti tattvamākhyāyate, punaranyasvabhāva iti tasyaiva anyatvam /
T04bsa054_u:8327: na hi bhāvo nāma anya eva
T04bsa054_u:8328: svabhāvāt, yena tasyotpādanirodhayorapi bhāvasya tau na syātām /
T04bsa054_u:8329: nāpi tadabhinnasya svabhāvasya utpādanirodhayorbhāvasya tādavasthyaṃ yuktamabhedābhāvaprasaṅgāt
T04bsa054_u:8331: syādetat- bhavatveva eṣa prasaṅgaḥ yadi rūpadvayamasyātmanaḥ satyaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:8332: kiṃ tarhi nijamasya rūpamapahāya aparaṃ rūpamatāttvikam, tena
T04bsa054_u:8336: cedyadi, tarhi nijaṃ tadrūpamucyatām nijaṃ svābhāvikaṃ tasyātmano rūpaṃ tattvamucyatām /
T04bsa054_u:8343: 'stītyucyate, evaṃ sarvapuṃsāmaikyaṃ prasajyate, evaṃ jñānatvena tatsādhāraṇarūpatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:8344: tadyathā pūrvaparakālikayoḥ śabdarūpajñānayorbhinnākāratvād bhinnayorapyekatvameva, tathā sarvasattvānāṃ prāṇigatigatānāmekātmatā prasajyate] āpadyate, vastuto bhede 'pi viśeṣābhāvāt itthaṃ ca punaridamatiprasajyate ityāha cetanetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8347: yadi vā avāntaraṃ bhedanibandhanaṃ viśeṣamapāsya kiṃcidākārakamāśritya ekatvamucyate tadā cetanā puruṣadharmaḥ, acetanā prakṛtyādidharmaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8357: viśeṣaśca yadā mithyā kaḥ sādṛśyāśrayastadā // Bca_9.68 //
T04bsa054_u:8359: viśeṣo bhedaḥ sarvabhāvānāmaniyamena yadā mithyā asatyam [tyaḥ?], nijameva rūpaṃ satyam, tadā kaḥ sādṛśyāśrayaḥ
T04bsa054_u:8360: syāt? kimāśritya sādṛśyaṃ vyavasthāpyate? viśeṣasadbhāve hi kiṃcinmātrasādharmyeṇa sādṛśyaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:8361: viśeṣābhāve ca tadeva tat syānna sadṛśam /
T04bsa054_u:8362: na hi gogavayayorgoviśeṣamananubhavan na gavayo gosadṛśo bhavet,
T04bsa054_u:8365: sa ca yadā pāramārthiko na bhavati, tadā kaḥ sādṛśyasya samānākāratāyāḥ puṃsāmanyasya vā āśrayo nibandhanaṃ vā bhavet? naiva kaścidityarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8366: ato vastuta eva ekatvamāpatitaṃ bhavataḥ, na sādṛśyakṛtam /
T04bsa054_u:8382: yathā paṭavṛkṣaparvatādayaḥ caitanyavirahādātmā na bhavanti, tathā abhimato 'pi /
T04bsa054_u:8385: na ca acetanasya tadyuktam, yathā paṭādeḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8386: yadi nāma svayamasāvacetanaḥ, tathāpi buddheścetanā cetayate, tenāyamadoṣaḥ iti parābhiprāyaṃ saṃbhāvayannāha atha jña ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:8393: yadā tarhi madamūrcchāvasthāyāṃ cetanānivṛttau ayamātmā ajño na kiṃcidapi jānāti, tadā naṣṭaḥ prāktanacaitanyasaṃbaddhasvabhāvaparityāgādvinaṣṭaḥ prasajyate //
T04bsa054_u:8398: yadyevam, tarhi caitanyenāsya kiṃ kṛtam, acetanasya sarvakālamavikṛtasya sataḥ asyātmanaḥ caitanyena buddhisamavāyena kiṃ kṛtam,
T04bsa054_u:8404: ajñasya kiṃcidapi hitāhitaṃ jñātumaśaktasya niṣkriyasya nirgato bahirbhūtaḥ kriyāyā iti niṣkriyaḥ
T04bsa054_u:8406: athavā sarvakarmaṇi śaktivikalasya gamanādhikriyāśūnyasya vā ākāśasya prakṛtānupayogitvādākāśakalpasya
T04bsa054_u:8412: yathā ca na karmakartrādirūpamākāśamacetanatvādakriyatvācca, tathā ātmapīti bhāvaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:8413: idānīṃ punaranyathā ātmapratiṣedhabādhakaṃ paramatenotthāpayannāha na karmetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8415: yadi na kaścidekaḥ paralokī syāt, tadā tenātmanā paralokagāminā vinā antareṇa karmaphalasaṃbandho 'yuktaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8416: karma śubhāśubham, phalaṃ ca tasyaiva iṣṭāniṣṭalakṣaṇam, tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8418: yenaiva kṛtaṃ karma, tasyaiva tatphalapratilambho nānyasyeti
T04bsa054_u:8423: anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma, ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na hi bhikṣavaḥ
T04bsa054_u:8424: kṛtopacitāni karmāṇi pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau /
T04bsa054_u:8428: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
T04bsa054_u:8434: kathamasati ātmani karmaphalasaṃbandho ghaṭate ityāha karma kṛtvetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8435: karma kṛtvā vinaṣṭe hi phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // Bca_9.71 //
T04bsa054_u:8436: hi yasmāt karma kṛtvā karmotpādya śubhāśubhalakṣaṇam /
T04bsa054_u:8441: yena cittakṣaṇena kṛtaṃ karma, tasya kṣaṇikatayā tatkarmakriyākāle nivṛttatvāt, kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sugatau durgatau vā sukhaduḥkhātmakaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati utpatsyate? naiva kasyacit syāt /
T04bsa054_u:8442: paraloke ca kṛtakarmaṇa eva phalayogino 'nyasya kasyacidutpādāt,
T04bsa054_u:8446: 'pi na syuḥ cedyadi matam, tanna yuktamityāha dvayorityādi-
T04bsa054_u:8451: ke siddhe? āhabhinnādhāre kriyāphale karma kriyā asmin bhave,
T04bsa054_u:8454: tathāhi- na yenaiva śarīreṇa tasmin janmani karma karoti, tenaiva pretya phalamupabhuṅkte
T04bsa054_u:8459: ātmavyāpāramantareṇa te eva kartṛtvopabhoktṛtve na syātāmityatrāha-
T04bsa054_u:8460: nirvyāpāraśca tatrātmetyatra vādo vṛthā nanu // Bca_9.72 //
T04bsa054_u:8469: iti hetoratrātmani nirvyāpāre vādo vivādo vṛthā niṣphalaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8472: nanu yadi ātmā na bhavet, kathaṃ tarhi kṛtavipraṇāśādidoṣo na syāt? tato na vṛthā tadvāda ityāha hetumānityādi-
T04bsa054_u:8475: yo hetumān karmaṇā yuktaḥ, sa eva phālayogī phalasaṃbaddhaḥ iti evameṣa
T04bsa054_u:8478: anya eva mṛto loke jāyate anya eva hi /
T04bsa054_u:8481: anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma, ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti? atrāha
T04bsa054_u:8484: saṃtānasya uttarottarānekakṣaṇaparaṃparālakṣaṇasya kāryakāraṇabhāve na pravartamānasya aikyamāśritya anekeṣu ekatvaṃ lokādhyavasāyavaśādāropitameva nimittīkṛtya kartā bhoktā iti deśitam- ya eva karmaṇaḥ kartā sa eva tatphalasyopabhoktā ca /
T04bsa054_u:8491: tathā cetanā karma, cetayitvā karma iti vacanācca /
T04bsa054_u:8493: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat /
T04bsa054_u:8499: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti //
T04bsa054_u:8504: tadapi tadāhitavāsanamuttarottaratadabhisaṃskṛtakṣaṇaparaṃparāvicchedataḥ saṃtānapravartamānaṃ pariṇativiśeṣamupagacchat karmaviśeṣānurūpaṃ tathāvidhaṃ sukhādisvabhāvaṃ cittātmakameva phalamabhinirvartayati paraloke /
T04bsa054_u:8505: tadyathā kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparopasarpaṇapratyayaviśeṣāt samadhigatātiśayatayā prathamakṣaṇopanipātinaḥ svopādeyabhūtadvitīyakṣaṇakalāpe kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādanadvāreṇa taduttarottaratāratamyamupajanayantaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣādantyakṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ prakarṣaparyantamāsādayanto
T04bsa054_u:8507: yathā ca lākṣārasaparibhāvitaṃ mātuluṅgādibījamuptaṃ tatsaṃskāraparaṃparāpravṛtteḥ tatpuṣpādiṣu
T04bsa054_u:8508: raktatāmutpādayati, na ca tatra kaścit pūrvāparakālayoreko 'nugāmī samasti
T04bsa054_u:8513: phalaṃ tatraiva badhnāti karpāse raktatā yathā //
T04bsa054_u:8515: tasmādyathā bījādiṣu ātmānamantareṇāpi pratiniyamena kāryaṃ tadutpattiśca krameṇa bhavati, tathā prakṛte 'pi paralokagāminamekaṃ vināpi kāryakāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt pratiniyatameva phalam,
T04bsa054_u:8516: kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtasya saṃtānasya avicchedena pravartanāt paraloke phalapratilambho 'bhidhīyate, iti nākṛtābhyāgamo na kṛtavipraṇāśo bādhakam /
T04bsa054_u:8518: yathā ca satyevātmani sa na ghaṭate, tathā sapracayamucyamānamativistaraṃ syāditi
T04bsa054_u:8527: tasmādābhiprāyikīṃ bhagavato deśanāmajānadbhiḥ parikalpito 'sau, na vastusat /
T04bsa054_u:8529: nānyatvam, ityātmano nirākaraṇenaiva nirastaḥ, iti na punarviśeṣeṇa
T04bsa054_u:8532: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ asti karma, asti phalam /
T04bsa054_u:8533: kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imān skandhān vijahāti, anyāṃśca skandhānupādatte, anyatra dharmasaṃketāt
T04bsa054_u:8534: atrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketaḥ, yadasmin sati idaṃ bhavati,
T04bsa054_u:8545: dṛṣṭā śaktirmatā sā cetsaṃvṛtyāstu yathā tathā //
T04bsa054_u:8548: ekasyānugamātmano 'bhāvāt na smartā kaścidiha vidyate, kiṃ tarhi smaraṇameva kevalamāropavaśāt smaryamāṇavastuviṣayam /
T04bsa054_u:8549: na ca atra smarturabhāve 'pi kaścid vyāghātaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8550: anubhūte hi vastuni vijñānasaṃtāne smṛtibījādhānāt kālāntareṇa saṃtatiparipākahetoḥ smaraṇaṃ nāma kāryamutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:8552: ativistarabhayāt pratyekamiha na pratividhīyante iti tatsamarthanamanyatraiva vistareṇāvadhāryamiti
T04bsa054_u:8555: paramārthe tu sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarvavikalpoparamācca na kiṃcidutpadyate vā nirudhyate vā sātmakamanātmakaṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:8556: nāpi vicāryamāṇaṃ karma tatphalaṃ vā, nāpi ihaloko na paraloko vā na kaścidasti, kalpanāviṭhapitatvāt
T04bsa054_u:8557: tasmāt sarvametat pratibimbasaṃnibhaṃ niḥsvabhāvamutpadyate nirudhyate ca /
T04bsa054_u:8558: kāryakāraṇaṃ ca sātmakaṃ nirātmakaṃ ca nityamanityaṃ cābhidhīyate /
T04bsa054_u:8564: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti tattvataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8572: na kartāsti na bhoktāsti puṇyāpuṇyaṃ pratītyajam /
T04bsa054_u:8573: yatpratītya na tajjātaṃ proktaṃ vācaspate tvayā //
T04bsa054_u:8577: niḥsvabhāvatā ca, yathā dṛṣṭasarvadharmāvirodhaśca, tathā pitāputrasamāgame deśitam /
T04bsa054_u:8579: bhagavānāha- evameva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni abhiniviśate /
T04bsa054_u:8584: tacca karmābhisaṃskṛtamādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, na dakṣiṇām, na paścimām, nottarām, nordhvam,
T04bsa054_u:8585: nādhaḥ, nānuvidiśam, neha, na tiryak, nobhayamantarā /
T04bsa054_u:8586: tat punaḥ kālāntareṇa maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāt caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati tadyathāpi nāma śayitavibuddhasya janapadakalyāṇī /
T04bsa054_u:8587: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmārambaṇena aupapattyaṃśikaṃ dvayapratyayaṃ prathamaṃ vijñānamutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:8588: yadi vā nārakeṣu, yadi vā tiryagyonau, yadi vā yamaloke, yadi vā āsurakāye, yadi vā manuṣyeṣu, yadi vā deveṣu /
T04bsa054_u:8589: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya anantaraṃ sabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate, yatra vipākasya (Bcp 225) pratisaṃvidā prajñāyate /
T04bsa054_u:8590: tatra yaścaramavijñānasya nirodhaḥ, tatra cyutiriti saṃkhyā bhavati, yaḥ prathamavijñānasya prādurbhāvaḥ, tatropapattiriti /
T04bsa054_u:8591: iti mahārāja na kaściddharmo 'smāllokāt paralokaṃ gacchati, cyutyupapattī prajñāyete /
T04bsa054_u:8594: karmāpyutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati, nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacidgacchati /
T04bsa054_u:8597: caramavijñānaṃ caramavijñānena śūnyam, karma karmaṇā śūnyam, prathamavijñānaṃ prathamavijñānena śūnyam, cyutiścyutyā śūnyā, upapattirupapattyā śūnyā /
T04bsa054_u:8598: karmaṇāṃ ca avandhyatā prajñāyate, vipākasya ca pratisaṃvedanā /
T04bsa054_u:8599: na tatra kaścit kartā, na bhoktā, anyatra nāmasaṃketāt // iti vistaraḥ //
T04bsa054_u:8603: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8606: puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati, apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmapuṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati, ānañjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmānañjyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:8609: nāmarūpavivṛddhyā ṣaḍbhirāyatanadvāraiḥ kṛtyakriyāḥ pravartante, tannāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamucyate
T04bsa054_u:8612: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
T04bsa054_u:8615: vedayati, viśeṣeṇāsvādayati, abhinandayati, adhyavasyati, adhitiṣṭhati, sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate /
T04bsa054_u:8617: ātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhavatviti aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaśca
T04bsa054_u:8619: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayatti kāyena vācā manasā, sa upādānapratyayo bhava ityucyate /
T04bsa054_u:8623: jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāmupacayaparipākādvināśo bhavati, tadidaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityucyate
T04bsa054_u:8633: tatra karmaṇāṃ naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi /
T04bsa054_u:8636: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
T04bsa054_u:8638: api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditam avidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati,
T04bsa054_u:8640: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8641: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogādṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādanānuprabaddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt peyālaṃ /
T04bsa054_u:8644: asti ca karmaphalam, asti ca vijñaptiḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8647: yathā agnirupādānavaikalyānna jvalati, upādānāvaikalyācca jvalati, evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu
T04bsa054_u:8651: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatataḥ, nocchedataḥ, na saṃkrāntitaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8653: kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, anye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti
T04bsa054_u:8654: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, ta eva aupapattyaṃśikāḥ prādurbhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:8656: kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti, nāpyaniruddheṣu /
T04bsa054_u:8657: api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante, tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti, tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat /
T04bsa054_u:8659: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāt sattvanikāyādvisabhāgāḥ skandhā
T04bsa054_u:8662: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ? parīttaṃ karma kriyate, vipulaphalavipāko
T04bsa054_u:8666: tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yathāvedanīyaṃ karma kriyate, tathāvedanīyo vipāko 'nubhūyate /
T04bsa054_u:8668: evamādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ [kāraṇaiḥ-ākāraiḥ] draṣṭavyaḥ // iti vistaraḥ tadevamātmādivirahe 'pi karmaphalasaṃbandho 'vikalaḥ sūtreṣu bhagavatā svayamupadarśita ityupadarśitaṃ bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:8671: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:8672: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:8677: cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham /
T04bsa054_u:8680: tadapi ca ātmadṛṣṭayabhiniviṣṭānāmanyatrātmagrāhaparikalpavicchedārthaṃ neyārthatayā saṃvṛtyā cittamātmeti prakāśitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8687: yataḥ tadapi ca anyatra pudgalādyabhiniveśabādhanāya vacanam /
T04bsa054_u:8692: tathāpi na vastutaḥ tadahaṃkāragocara ityupadarśayannāha atītetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8693: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate /
T04bsa054_u:8694: tridhā hi cittaṃ saṃbhavati parikalpamupādāya atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca /
T04bsa054_u:8696: atītānāgataṃ naṣṭājātaṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ na ahaṃdarśanaviṣayaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8698: tadatītā nāgataṃ cittaṃ na vidyate, na saṃpratyasti,
T04bsa054_u:8700: yadatītaṃ tat kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇāmitam /
T04bsa054_u:8702: pratyutpannaṃ tarhi cittamahaṃ bhaviṣya tītyata āha-
T04bsa054_u:8704: yathā utpannaṃ vartamānaṃ cittamahamastu, tadapi na yuktam /
T04bsa054_u:8705: yato naṣṭe 'sminnāstyahaṃ punaḥ, asmin pratyutpanne citte naṣṭe dvitīyakṣaṇe atīte
T04bsa054_u:8706: sati nāstyahaṃ punaḥ, paścādahaṃpratyayasya viṣayo neṣṭaḥ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:8708: tat kutaścittamālambyatāṃ yena ālambanaṃ syāt? ato na cittālambano 'pīti nirālambana evāyamahaṃpratyaya utpadyate //
T04bsa054_u:8710: nāpi cittamahaṃkārasya viṣaya iti prasādhyopasaṃharannāha yathaivetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8714: yathaiva kadalīstambho rambhādaṇḍakhaṇḍam, bhāgaśaḥ pratyavayavaśaḥ kṛto
T04bsa054_u:8715: 'vadhūto na kaścit na vastusan prāpyate, tathā ahamapyasadbhūtaḥ kadalīstambhavat /
T04bsa054_u:8721: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet /
T04bsa054_u:8722: yadi sarvathaiva sattvaḥ ātmā pudgalo vā vicāryamāṇo na vidyeta, na syāt,
T04bsa054_u:8723: tadā kasyopari kṛpā karuṇā bodhisattvānāṃ bhavet, sattvamantareṇa kimālambya pravarteta? karuṇā ca samyaksaṃbodhisādhanam, tatpūrvakameva saṃbhāranidāneṣu dānādiṣu pravartanāt /
T04bsa054_u:8726: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-
T04bsa054_u:8727: na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam /
T04bsa054_u:8728: eka eva dharmo bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ kartavyaḥ supratibiddhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8730: tadyathā- yena rājñaścakravartinaścakraratnaṃ gacchati, tena sarvabalakāyo gacchati /
T04bsa054_u:8731: evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati, tena sarve buddhadharmā gacchanti
T04bsa054_u:8732: tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati, evameva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyāṃ bodhikārakāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavatīti //
T04bsa054_u:8734: kimārambhā mañjuśrīḥ bodhisattvānāṃ caryā, kimadhiṣṭhānā? mañjuśrīrāha-
T04bsa054_u:8735: mahākaruṇārambhā devaputra bodhisattvānāṃ caryā sattvādhiṣṭhānā // iti vistaraḥ //
T04bsa054_u:8736: tasmādavaśyaṃ prathamataḥ sattvālambanā karuṇābhyupagantavyāḥ duḥkhitasattvādhiṣṭhānena samutpatteḥ
T04bsa054_u:8737: sattvābhāve ca sā na syāditi cet,
T04bsa054_u:8738: evaṃ manyase yadi, tadā naitadvaktavyamityāha kāryārthamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:8741: tadarthamabhyupetena svīkṛtena mohena saṃvṛtyā yaḥ prakalpitaḥ samāropitaḥ sattvaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8743: tathāhi sakalakalpanājālarahitaṃ sarvāvaraṇavinirmuktaṃ paramapuruṣārthatayā buddhatvamiha sādhyam /
T04bsa054_u:8748: sā ca prathamato duḥkhitasattveṣu pravartamānā saṃbhārārambhanidānamupapadyate iti kāryārthaṃ mohasya saṃvṛtisatyarūpasyābhyupagamaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8750: karuṇā, tataḥ paraṃ dharmālambanā, anālambanā ca /
T04bsa054_u:8755: ye kecidbhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti imānete (tān?) pañcopādānaskandhān /
T04bsa054_u:8757: tato yadi nāma prajñayā nirūpayataḥ paramārthataḥ sattvānupalambhaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8760: yataḥ prajñā tattvaṃ bhajati karuṇā saṃvṛtimataḥ tavābhūnniḥsattvaṃ jagaditi yathārthaṃ vimṛśataḥ
T04bsa054_u:8761: yadā cāviṣṭo 'bhūrdaśabalajananyā karuṇayā tadā te 'bhūdārte suta iva pituḥ prema jagati //
T04bsa054_u:8765: sattvasaṃjñā ca te nātha sarvathā na pravartate /
T04bsa054_u:8770: nanu paramārthataḥ sattvābhāve kasya tat kāryam, iti kathaṃ tatsādhanāya
T04bsa054_u:8772: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8775: rūpādīnāṃ ca utpannavināśitvāt kāryaṃ kasya? na kasyacit syādityarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8777: evameva etanmatameva asmākam- naiva kasyacit paramārthataḥ kāryam, asvāmikatvāt sarvadharmāṇām
T04bsa054_u:8778: yadyevam, kathaṃ tarhi tatsādhanāya prathamataḥ pravṛttiriti cet, īhā tu mohataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8780: mamaiva tat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatītyekatvādhyavasāyena sattvābhāve 'pi saṃvṛtyā māyāsvabhāvatayā
T04bsa054_u:8787: nanu ca moho nāma avidyāsvabhāvatayā sarvathaiva anupādeyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8788: tat kathaṃ punastasyaiva svīkāraḥ ityata āha duḥkhetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:8789: duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ tu kāryamoho na vāryate // Bca_9.77 //
T04bsa054_u:8791: tatra yaḥ saṃsāranidānam, sa prahātavya eva /
T04bsa054_u:8793: kāryamohaḥ kāryasya paramārthasatyalakṣaṇasyādhigamāya mohaḥ, sa punarna vāryate, na pratiṣidhyate
T04bsa054_u:8795: idamihādhikṛtam, tadapi kāryaṃ nātmasukhābhilāṣeṇa mahadbhirupādīyate, api tu sarvasattvānāmātyantikasarvaduḥkhavyupaśamārtham
T04bsa054_u:8800: etat kāryārthamavicārataḥ [9.4] ityasmin prastāve pratipāditameva pūrvam /
T04bsa054_u:8804: tat kimātmā yatnena niṣidhyate? tatsadbhāve 'pi ātmabhāvanayā ahaṃkāraparikṣayāt bhaviṣyati saṃsāranivṛttiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8808: yathā kāryamoho duḥkhopaśamahetuḥ, na tathā dvitīya ātmamohaḥ, tasmin sati ahaṃkārakṣayābhāvāt
T04bsa054_u:8809: ātmamohāttu anātmani ātmaviparyāsadarśanāt punarahaṃkāro vardhate, vṛddha upajāyate /
T04bsa054_u:8810: kiṃbhūtaḥ? duḥkhahetuḥ duḥkhasya sāṃsārikasya triduḥkhatālakṣaṇasya hetuḥ kāraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:8815: tathāhi ātmānaṃ paśyataḥ saṃskṛteṣu skandhadhātvāyataneṣu ahamiti dṛḍhataramutpadyate snehaḥ
T04bsa054_u:8816: tatastadduḥkhapratīkārecchayā sukhābhilāṣo doṣān pracchādya tadarthitayā guṇādhyāropāt tatsādhaneṣu pravartate /
T04bsa054_u:8818: ahaṃ mameti ca darśanāt paripanthini vidveṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8819: tataḥ samastaduḥkhanidānaṃ sarva eva kleśopakleśā labdhaprasarāḥ pravartante /
T04bsa054_u:8832: tato 'pi ātmadarśanādapi na nivartyo nivartayitumaśakyo 'haṃkāraśced yadi,
T04bsa054_u:8838: tāvatkālamastu, paścāt punariyamapi prahāsyate, upalambhadṛṣṭitvāditi bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8839: tathāhi tadbhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamanāt sākṣānnairātmyadarśanāt virodhi satkāyadarśanaṃ nivartate /
T04bsa054_u:8840: tannivṛttau ca ekasyānugāmino darśanābhāvāt pūrvāpararūpavikalasya kṣaṇamātrasya darśanam
T04bsa054_u:8841: tataḥ pūrvāparasamāropābhāvāt na anāgatasukhasādhanaṃ kiṃcidātmanaḥ paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:8842: tato na tasya kvacidviṣaye rāgo jāyate, nāpi tatprativirodhini dveṣaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:8847: 'pakāre prekṣāvataḥ anyatra vairaniryātanamucitam, nāpi yasya kṛtastenāpi
T04bsa054_u:8848: / evaṃ rāgādinivṛttau anye 'pi tatprabhavāḥ kleśopakleśā notpadyante /
T04bsa054_u:8849: nāpi vastutaḥ kaścit kasyacidapakārī, idaṃ pratītya idamutpadyate iti pratītyasamutpādadarśanādvā
T04bsa054_u:8850: evaṃ hi pudgalaśūnyatāyāṃ satkāyadarśananivṛttau chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti /
T04bsa054_u:8852: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlacchinnasya sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśaṃ
T04bsa054_u:8853: śuṣyati, evameva śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭipraśamāt sarvakleśā upaśāmyantīti //
T04bsa054_u:8857: / syādetatyadi nāma ātmā vicāreṇa kharaviṣāṇasadṛśatvānnāhaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ, tathāpi kāyāvayavī tadviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyatrāha kāyo neti-
T04bsa054_u:8858: kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca /
T04bsa054_u:8859: nodaraṃ nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ // Bca_9.79 //
T04bsa054_u:8860: na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8861: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ // Bca_9.80 //
T04bsa054_u:8862: kāyo 'pi vicāreṇaiko naiva kaścidastītyupadarśayati- tathā hi karacaraṇādayo bhāgā evaṃ paraṃ dṛśyante, na tvekaḥ kāyo nāma pratibhāsate /
T04bsa054_u:8864: yataḥ kāyo na pādau, na caraṇau, na jaṅghā /
T04bsa054_u:8869: nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭham, ayaṃ kāyaḥ pṛṣṭhamapi naiva /
T04bsa054_u:8871: bāhū na cāpi saḥ, sa kāyo bhujāvapi na bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:8874: nāpyayaṃ pārśvau, (Bcp 232) ayaṃ kāyaḥ pārśvāvapi na bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:8875: na kakṣau, bhujamūle api na kāyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8881: 'pyanavasthānāt, karacaraṇādīnāmanyatamacchede kāyavināśena maraṇaprasaṅgāt, parābhyupagamābhāvācca naiṣu pratyekaṃ kāyātmatā /
T04bsa054_u:8882: evaṃ yadā na pratyekamete kāyasvabhāvāḥ, etatsamudāyamātraṃ ca śarīram, tat kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ, atra eṣu pādādibhāgeṣu purovartiṣu śarīrakalpanānimitteṣu kataraḥ kāyo bhavatu? naiva kaścideko 'pi
T04bsa054_u:8884: athāpi syāt- naivamabhidhīyate pratyekaṃ karādayaḥ kāyaḥ, kiṃ tarhi sarvāvayavavyāpakatvādavayavinaḥ sarvāvayaveṣu vartate ityatrāha
T04bsa054_u:8887: sarvāvayaveṣu vartamāno 'yamekadeśena vartate, yugapat sarvātmanā vā?
T04bsa054_u:8888: tatra yadi sarveṣu karacaraṇādiṣu avayaveṣu kāyo 'vayavī, ekadeśena
T04bsa054_u:8892: yataḥ yairekadeśairavayaveṣu vartate, teṣvapi kimekadeśeṣu aparaiḥ ekadeśena vartate, sarvātmanā veti vikalpo na nivartate /
T04bsa054_u:8895: tasya avakāśābhāvādeva avayaveṣu na vṛttirityāha aṃśā ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:8896: aṃśā aṃśeṣu vartante sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ // Bca_9.81 //
T04bsa054_u:8897: aṃśā bhāgāḥ aṃśeṣu svasvabhāgeṣu vartante vyavatiṣṭhante,
T04bsa054_u:8900: svayaṃ punarasau kāyo 'vayavī kva nu nāma vyavasthitaḥ iti na vidmaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:8905: avayaveṣu anavakāśatvāt sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ iti prasaṅgo nādyāpi nivartate /
T04bsa054_u:8909: ādiśabdāccaraṇādiṣu sthitaḥ samavetaḥ kāyāvayavī cet yadi, tadā punarayaṃ doṣaḥ syādityāha- kāyā iti /
T04bsa054_u:8912: kiyantaḥ? yāvantaste karādayaḥ, te karacaraṇādayo 'vayavāyāvantaḥ yatsaṃkhyāparicchinnāḥ, tatsamavetā avayavino 'pi tāvanta eva bhaveyuḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8916: ayaṃ ca prasaṅgaḥ anekatra ekadeśena vṛttipakṣe 'pi yojayitavyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8921: naivāntarna bahiḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
T04bsa054_u:8923: adhunā punaravayavinaḥ pratiṣedhāt na bahiḥ na bāhyaḥ pratyakṣādigocaraḥ kāyaḥ, iti kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu vyavasthāpyate?
T04bsa054_u:8925: karādibhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nāsti kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // Bca_9.83 //
T04bsa054_u:8926: karādibhyo 'vayavebhyaḥ pṛthag bhinnaḥ upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ kāyo nāsti,
T04bsa054_u:8930: karādisvabhāvaḥ, nāpi tadādheyaḥ samaveto nāpyantargataḥ, na cāpi tadvayatiriktaḥ, sa kāyaḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate? kathaṃ nviti kathaṃcidapi kāyamanupalabhamānaḥ tatsattvamasaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati- kathaṃ nu kena prakāreṇa /
T04bsa054_u:8933: yadā caivaṃ vicāreṇa kāyo vyavasthāpayitumaśakyaḥ, tadā asanneva vyavahartavya ityupasaṃharannāha
T04bsa054_u:8937: kathaṃ tarhi karādiṣu kāyabuddhirityāha- mohāttu ityādi /
T04bsa054_u:8938: mohādavidyāvaśāt tu punaḥ kāyabuddhiḥ karādiṣu ekadravyarahiteṣu, na tu paramārthataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8941: tadupanibaddho 'yaṃ kāyādivyavahāro loke pravartate, na tu pāramārthika iti //
T04bsa054_u:8942: kathamanyatra sā na bhavati ityatrāha saṃniveśeti-
T04bsa054_u:8944: karacaraṇādisaṃniveśaḥ saṃsthānam, tadeva viśeṣo bheda itarasmāt, tena vibhramahetunā karādiṣveva, na sarvatra sā bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:8950: syādetat- kathaṃ punaretadavasitaṃ mohāt kāyabuddhiḥ, na tu punarvastutaḥ
T04bsa054_u:8954: yāvat yāvatkālāvadhiparicchinnā pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pṛthivyādiṣaḍdhātuṣaṭsparśāyatanāṣṭādaśamanopavicārātmakānāṃ karmāyattavṛttīnāṃ sāmagrī samavadhānam, tāvatkālāvadhireva kāyaḥ pumāniva
T04bsa054_u:8955: / yathā puruṣasvabhāvavirahito 'pi paramārthataḥ parikalpitarūpatayā puruṣa iva pratibhāsate vyavahriyate /
T04bsa054_u:8958: na pūrvaṃ kalalādyavasthāyāṃ na paścādvikalitatvād bhasmādyavasthāyāṃ nijasvabhāvābhāvāt /
T04bsa054_u:8960: evaṃ karādau sā yāvattāvatkāyo 'tra dṛśyate // Bca_9.85 //
T04bsa054_u:8961: yathā pratyayasāmagrīsadbhāve kāyaḥ pumāniva pratibhāsate, sadbhāvena
T04bsa054_u:8962: pratibhāsate, evaṃ tathā karādau yāvat sā pratyayasāmagrī, tāvat kāyo 'tra
T04bsa054_u:8963: karādau dṛśyate, kalpanāvaśāt pratibhāsate, na tu paramārthataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8964: tasmāt sāmagrīsākalye bhavati, tadabhāve ca na bhavati kāyabuddhiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:8966: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥtattatpratyayasāmagrīsadbhāve tattadvastusvabhāvamantareṇāpi abhūtaṃ tattvamādarśayantī bhrāntivaśādasau kalpanā upajāyate /
T04bsa054_u:8969: ato nāyaṃ kāyādivyavahāro vāstava iti vakṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:8974: anirdeśyaḥ svataḥ prāptaḥ kāya ityucyate katham //
T04bsa054_u:8985: tāvat kāṣṭhaṃ sthāṇusvabhāvaṃ pumāniva pratīyate, na tadabhāve /
T04bsa054_u:8986: evameva karādau yāvat sā pratyayasāmagrī, tāvat kāyo 'tra karādau dṛśyate, na paścāt /
T04bsa054_u:8988: nanu yadi nāma kāyo nāsti, karacaraṇādayaḥ punaravayavāḥ pratyakśopalabdhatvāt pratiṣeddhumaśakyāḥ ityāśaṅkaya karādayo 'pi
T04bsa054_u:8992: yathaiva vicāryamāṇaḥ kāyo nāsti, evaṃ karacaraṇādayo 'pi na santi /
T04bsa054_u:9004: parvaṇāmaṅgulibhāgānāṃ samūhatvāt saṃghātatvāt kataro bhavediti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9005: parvaṇāmapi pratyekamavastutvamityata āha- parvāpi na vastu /
T04bsa054_u:9006: kasmāt? svāṃśabhedataḥ, svasya ātmanaḥ aṃśānāmavayavānāṃ bhedato 'pi
T04bsa054_u:9010: aṃśāḥ parvabhāgāḥ api aṇubhedena paramāṇuśo vibhāgena bhidyamānatvāt kalpitā eva /
T04bsa054_u:9015: dikṣu vā vibhāgāḥ nānādigavasthitā nānārūpāṃśāḥ paramāṇoḥ, tato bhedena na tasya svabhāvo 'vatiṣṭhate //
T04bsa054_u:9019: paramāṇormadhyavartino rūpam, tat kimekameva, aparāparaṃ vā? yadi ekameveti pakṣaḥ, tadā sarvaparamāṇūnāṃ parivāryāvasthitānāmekadeśatāprasaṅgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9020: yataḥ pūrvādidigavasthitaparamāṇusamānadeśatāmantareṇa aparadigādyavasthitaparamāṇunā na prāgdeśāvasthitaparamāṇvabhimukharūpābhimukhaṃ syāt, anyathā rūpabhedaprasaṅgāt /
T04bsa054_u:9022: tasyāpi pūrvadigavasthitasya paramāṇoraparaparamāṇunā sarvātmanā saṃbandhena tatsvarūpāntarbhāvāt paramāṇumātraṃ dravyaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9023: tathā ca sati pracayarūpā bhūdharādayo na syuḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9024: ato bhavanādīnāṃ pracayamicchatā dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ samabhyupeyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9025: tadā ca ṣaḍbhiraparāpararūpeṇa yugapat saṃbandhāt ṣaḍbhāgo madhyaparamāṇuḥ syāt,
T04bsa054_u:9033: te 'pi punaraṇīyāṃso bhāgāḥ tathaiva nirūpyamāṇāḥ nirātmatayā nabhaḥsvabhāvatāṃ pratipadyante ityāha digvibhāgo 'pītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9035: digvibhāgo 'pi digbhedena paramāṇorvibhāgo 'pi pūrvavat ṣaḍaṃśatayā bhidyamānaḥ kataro bhavet? na kiṃcidvastu syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9039: tena kāraṇena nāstyaṇuḥ, na vidyate paramāṇuriti /
T04bsa054_u:9040: evaṃ karādayo 'pi vicārato niḥsvabhāvā draṣṭavyā iti /
T04bsa054_u:9041: tataḥ kāyo 'pi na paramārthataḥ kaścidasti, ekānekasvabhāvaviyogasya pratipādanāt /
T04bsa054_u:9042: itthaṃ na keśādayaḥ, na cātmā, nāpi cittam, na ca kāyaḥ ahaṃkārasya viṣayo vastutaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9043: tasmādavidyāsamutthāpitātmatayā ātmādisattvamantareṇāpi pravartamāno 'yamahamiti pratyayo nirviṣaya eva samutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:9050: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattva evaṃ kāyasmṛtimupasthāpayati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ pādapādāṅulijaṅghorutrikodaranābhīpṛṣṭhavaṃśahṛdayapārśvapārśukāhastakalācībāhvaṅgagrīvāhanulalāṭaśiraḥkapālamātrasamūhaḥ karmabhavakārakopacitaḥ nānākleśopakleśasaṃkalpavikalpaśatasahasrāṇāmāvāsaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9054: tat ko 'tra kāyaḥ? tasya pratyavekṣamāṇasya evaṃ bhavati- ākāśasamo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9057: tasya kāyaparijñānahetorna bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati, na visarati, na pratisaratīti //
T04bsa054_u:9059: ayaṃ kāyo na pūrvāntādāgato nāparānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ, asvāmiko 'mamo 'parigrahaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9060: āgantukairvyavahārairvyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti kuṇapa iti āyatanamiti
T04bsa054_u:9061: asārako 'yaṃ kāyaḥ mātāpitṛśukraśoṇitasaṃbhūtaḥ aśucipūtidurgandhisvabhāvaḥ (Bcp 237) rāgadoṣamohaviṣādataskarākulaḥ nityaṃ śatanapatanabhedanavikiraṇaviṃdhvaṃsanadharmā
T04bsa054_u:9063: evaṃ yadā vicāryamāṇo vastutaḥ śūnyasvabhāvatayā ākāśasaṃkāśaḥ sarvathā
T04bsa054_u:9064: kāyaḥ, tadā mithyaiva vastutattvamāropya rāgādikamutpādayantaḥ saṃsāramupabṛṃhayanti bālāḥ
T04bsa054_u:9065: evaṃ svapnopame rūpe ko rajyeta vicārakaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9067: ko rajyeta, ka āsajyeta? asya ca upalakṣaṇatvāt ko dviṣyāt, ko muhyet,
T04bsa054_u:9069: tadyathā- saumanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rāgo jāyate /
T04bsa054_u:9070: daurmanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā dveṣo jāyate /
T04bsa054_u:9071: upekṣāsthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā moho jāyate iti /
T04bsa054_u:9072: yadetanmanopratikūleṣu rūpeṣvanunītaṃ carati, tenāsya rāga utpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:9073: pratikūleṣu rūpeṣu pratihataṃ carati, tenāsya dveṣa utpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:9074: naivānukūleṣu na pratikūleṣu saṃmūḍhaṃ carati, tenāsya moha utpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:9076: tatra yaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ, iti hi atyantayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato 'pi nopalabhyate, aparāntato 'pi
T04bsa054_u:9081: iti hi māyopamānīndriyāṇi svapnopamān viṣayān paśyati, tasya kathaṃ rāgādikamutpadyate? ata evāha- vicāraka iti /
T04bsa054_u:9083: evametadyathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyan ko rajyeta dveṣṭi muhyati vā?
T04bsa054_u:9085: kāyābhāve ca strāyādikalpanayāpi rāgo na yukta ityāha kāyaścetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9086: kāyaścaivaṃ yadā nāsti tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ // Bca_9.88 //
T04bsa054_u:9089: kāyo yadā evamuditanayena nāsti, niḥsvabhāvaḥ, tadā kāyābhāvāt kā strī kāminī yasyāḥ
T04bsa054_u:9090: kamanīyatayā puruṣe rāgo bhavet? kaśca pumān kāmukaḥ yasya rañjanīyatayā striyāṃ rāgo bhavet? strī hi svātmani strīti saṃkalpya bahirdhā puruṣe puruṣa iti rāgaṃ janayati /
T04bsa054_u:9091: evaṃ puruṣo 'pi svātmani puruṣa iti saṃkalpya bahirdhā striyāṃ strīti rāgaṃ janayati /
T04bsa054_u:9092: kāyābhāve tu striyāṃ strīti na saṃvidyate, puruṣe puruṣo na saṃvidyate /
T04bsa054_u:9094: na tat strī na puruṣa iti /
T04bsa054_u:9095: tasmādasati kāye stryādikalpanākṛto 'pi na yujyate rāgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9096: tatkasya hetoḥ? manyanāpagatā hi sarvadharmā iti /
T04bsa054_u:9103: ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣa iti khalu punaretad yuktam /
T04bsa054_u:9104: kiṃ caitat pratītya kam? ṣaḍime mahārāja dhātavaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9116: aṣṭādaśa? iha puruṣaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarati
T04bsa054_u:9121: pṛthvīdhātuḥ? yat kiṃcidasmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatamupāttam /
T04bsa054_u:9122: tat punaḥ katamat? tadyathā- keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ityādi /
T04bsa054_u:9123: katamaśca mahārāja bāhyaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ? yat kiṃcid bāhyaṃ
T04bsa054_u:9126: tatra mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
T04bsa054_u:9130: sā adhyātmamahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati /
T04bsa054_u:9131: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogamākāṅkṣate
T04bsa054_u:9135: tatra mahārāja yaśca saṃkalpyate, yaśca saṃkalpayitā,
T04bsa054_u:9143: yacca svabhāvato na saṃvidyate, tat kathaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ janayiṣyati? iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ
T04bsa054_u:9145: bhavati mahāraja samayaḥ, yadayaṃ kāyaḥ śmaśānaparyavasāno bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:9146: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ saṃnirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati, na
T04bsa054_u:9147: dakṣiṇām, na paścimām, nottarām, nordhvam, nādhaḥ, nānuvidiśaṃ gacchati /
T04bsa054_u:9150: tatra mahārāja pṛthivīdhātorutpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ, vyayo 'pi śūnyaḥ, utpanno 'pi
T04bsa054_u:9152: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate, anyatra vyavahārāt /
T04bsa054_u:9153: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9154: evaṃ mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā draṣṭavyamiti
T04bsa054_u:9156: tat kasya hetoḥ? manyanāpagatā hi sarvadharmāḥ // iti //
T04bsa054_u:9157: evaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya vedanāsmṛtyupasthānamupadarśayituṃ vedanāṃ vicārayannāha
T04bsa054_u:9159: yadyasti duḥkhaṃ tattvena prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na vādhate /
T04bsa054_u:9160: śokādyārtāya mṛṣṭādi sukhaṃ cetkiṃ na rocate // Bca_9.89 //
T04bsa054_u:9161: trividhā hi vedanāsukhā vedanā, duḥkhā vedanā, aduḥkhāsukhā ceti /
T04bsa054_u:9168: saṃtoṣayuktān kiṃ na duḥkhayati? sukhamapi yadyasti tattvena, tadā śokādyārtāya /
T04bsa054_u:9172: sukhaṃ cedyadi, kiṃ na rocate? na hi vastu satsvabhāvaṃ kadācidapi nivartitumutsahate /
T04bsa054_u:9174: yaduktaṃ prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na bādhate iti, tatra parasya samādhānamāha
T04bsa054_u:9178: kiṃ tarhi samudbhūtavartinā sukhena tiraskṛtatvāt vidyamānamapi nānubhūyate,
T04bsa054_u:9180: sadapi yadi tadduḥkhaṃ nānubhūyate na vedyate ityucyate, tadā na yuktametadityāha
T04bsa054_u:9182: vedanātvaṃ kathaṃ tasya yasya nānubhavātmatā // Bca_9.90 //
T04bsa054_u:9183: vedanātvaṃ vedanāsvabhāvatvaṃ kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa tasyāvyaktasya sukhasya yasya nānubhavātmatā nānubhūyamānasvabhāvatā /
T04bsa054_u:9188: athāpi syāt- na sarvathā nānubhūyate, kiṃ tu sūkṣmatayā anubhūtamapi ananubhūtakalpamityatrāha
T04bsa054_u:9189: asti sūkṣmatayā duḥkhaṃ sthaulyaṃ tasya hṛtaṃ nanu /
T04bsa054_u:9191: asti vidyate sūkṣmatayā anupalakśyamāṇatayā duḥkham, tarhi balīyasā sukhena kiṃ kṛtamasya? sthaulyameva hṛtaṃ nanu, prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ pravṛttena balavatā sukhena sthaulyaṃ prābalyamasya duḥkhasya hatamabhibhūtam /
T04bsa054_u:9194: na hi sūkṣmatā nāma duḥkhasya sātānubhavakāle kācidupalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:9196: atha tuṣṭimātrā aparā tasmādeva udbhūtavṛtteḥ sukhāt, aparā tuṣṭimātrā dvitīyā sukhamātrā alpīyasī sukhakaṇikā syāt, duḥkhasya sūkṣmatā bhavet, ced yadi abhipretam, nanu sāpyasya sūkṣmatā sāpi tuṣṭimātrā aparā, asya sukhasyaiva sūkṣmatā, na tu duḥkhasya, tuṣṭeḥ sukhajātitvāt iti duḥkhasya sūkṣmatā avedyasvabhāvā sukhānubhavakāle nāstyeveti niścitam //
T04bsa054_u:9197: syādetat- na duḥkhaṃ kālpanikatayā kādācitkam, kiṃ tarhi kāraṇavaikalyāt
T04bsa054_u:9201: duḥkhena viruddhasya sukhasya yaḥ pratyayo hetuḥ sparśaḥ, tasyotpattau ābhimukhye sati /
T04bsa054_u:9206: tasyotpattau satyāṃ prahṛṣṭāvasthāyāṃ hetuvaikalyāt duḥkhasyānudayo duḥkhasyānutpattiśceducyate,
T04bsa054_u:9210: kalpanayā abhiniveśaḥ, kalpanayā kṛto yo 'bhiniveśaḥ, hiravadhāraṇe /
T04bsa054_u:9211: sa eva vedanā sukhā duḥkhā taditarā vā /
T04bsa054_u:9213: tathāhi nijasvabhāvarahitamapi yat sukhasādhanatvena parikalpitam, tadabhiniveśātsukhaṃ veditamutpadyate,
T04bsa054_u:9215: kathamanyathā yadeva anyasya duḥkhasādhanam, tadeva aparasya kasyacit sukhasādhanaṃ syāt? tasyaivaikasya yasya śabdaśravaṇādapi duḥkhamāsīt, punaḥ kālāntareṇa tasya darśanāt prītirupajāyate tasmāt kālpanikameva sukhādikaṃ tatsādhanaṃ vā, na vāstavam /
T04bsa054_u:9217: ahirmayūrasya sukhāya jāyate viṣaṃ viṣābhyāsavato rasāyanam /
T04bsa054_u:9218: bhavanti cānandaviśeṣahetavo mukhaṃ tudantaḥ karabhasya kaṇṭakāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9220: vedanā abhiniveśasvabhāvatvādeva ca vicāreṇa nivartayituṃ śakyate ityāha ata evetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9223: yata eva abhiniveśasvabhāvā vedanā, ata eva vicāro 'yaṃ
T04bsa054_u:9224: vimarśo 'yaṃ pratipakṣo virodhī, nirākṛtikāraṇatvāt asyābhiniveśasya sukhādirūpasya bhāvyate vicintyate /
T04bsa054_u:9231: tasmin saṃbhūtaṃ jātaṃ dhyānaṃ viviktaṃ kāmaiḥ, viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhamityādi /
T04bsa054_u:9236: hiryasmāt kalpanānirmitaprītisukhāhārasaṃdhāritaśarīrā yoginaḥ, tasmāt kalpanābhiniveśo vedaneti pratipāditam //
T04bsa054_u:9237: sāṃprataṃ hetvanabhisaṃbhavādeva na vedanā vastusatī yuktetyāha
T04bsa054_u:9245: sa trikasaṃnipātajaḥ sparśa eva na ghaṭate, kutastatpratyayā vedanā bhaviṣyatīti /
T04bsa054_u:9246: tathāhiindriyārthayoḥ sāntarayorvā syānnirantarayorvā? tatra indriyārthāvakṣaviṣayau sāntarau
T04bsa054_u:9247: yadi, tadā saṃsargaḥ saṃnipāto melanaṃ kutaḥ kasmāt etayorindriyārthayoḥ?
T04bsa054_u:9250: vyavadhāne sati sa kathaṃ bhavet iti bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9251: atha dvitīyaḥ prakāraḥ, so 'pi na yujyate ityāha
T04bsa054_u:9255: / evaṃ hi tayoḥ sarvātmanā nairantaryaṃ bhavet yadi aṇīyasāpi nāṃśena
T04bsa054_u:9258: evaṃ ca kasya kenāstu saṃgatiḥ? ekatve sati bhedābhāvāt kiṃ kena saṃgataṃ syāt? na hi ātmanaiva ātmanaḥ saṃgatiryuktāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9260: na ca tatra aṃśāṃśivyavahāro yuktaḥ, sthūlarūpāṇāmeva tatsaṃbhavāt /
T04bsa054_u:9261: tatra ca saṃsargadūṣaṇe na kiṃciddūṣyate ityāha nāṇorityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9268: iti kathaṃ niraṃśasya saṃgatirastu? athāpi syāt- mā bhūdaṇoraṇau praveśaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:9269: saṃgatimātraṃ kevalamastu, tāvatā siddhaṃ naḥ sādhyamityāha apraveśa iti-
T04bsa054_u:9270: apraveśe na miśratvamamiśratve na saṃgatiḥ // Bca_9.95 //
T04bsa054_u:9271: sarvātmanā hi saṃparkaḥ saṃgatiraṇoḥ, anyathā sāṃśatvaprasaṅgāt /
T04bsa054_u:9272: tathā ca tatsvarūpaṃ svātmanā vyāpnuvata eva tena saṃgatiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9274: tacca miśratvaṃ tatra praveśamantareṇa na bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:9275: itthamapraveśe praveśābhāve sati na miśratvaṃ nāsaṃbhinnarūpatvam /
T04bsa054_u:9276: amiśratve miśratvābhāve ca na saṃgatiḥ nāsaṅgaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9277: niraṃśasya sarvathaiva saṃsargo na yujyate ityāha niraṃśasya cetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9281: saṃsargo mīlanaṃ kathaṃ nāmopapadyate? nāmeti saṃbhāvayānām /
T04bsa054_u:9282: kathaṃ saṃsargaḥ saṃbhāvyate? sarvālpasyāpi avaśyamekenāṃśena bhavitavyam /
T04bsa054_u:9283: yasya punaraṃśa eva nāsti, tasya amūrtasya aṃśābhāve asattvameva prāptamiti bhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9284: na caitad bhavato 'pi pramāṇapratītaṃ kvacidastītyāha saṃsarga ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9285: saṃsarge ca niraṃśatvaṃ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśaya // Bca_9.96 //
T04bsa054_u:9297: yasya tu mūrtireva nāsti, tasya kathaṃ saṃsargaḥ
T04bsa054_u:9298: syāt? iti trayāṇāmapi saṃsargamavadhūya saṃprati samūha eva vastusan nāsti iti pratipādayannāha
T04bsa054_u:9302: avastutvāt vasturahitatvāt aśvaviuṣāṇavat saṃsargo naiva yujyate iti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ
T04bsa054_u:9304: kathaṃ punaravastukatvam? yathā pūrvaṃ vicāritam, yathā prāṅ nirūpitam, evamaṅgulipuñjatvādityādinā
T04bsa054_u:9307: tasmādevaṃ pratipāditakrameṇa sparśanābhāve trikasaṃparkābhāve vedanāsaṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ, vedanāyāḥ sukhādirūpāyāḥ saṃbhava utpādaḥ kutaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:9311: kimarthamayamāyāsaḥ sukhaduḥkhasādhanaprāptiparihārāya yo 'yamāyāsaḥ kriyate sa kimarthaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:9316: vedanāyā vicāreṇa niḥsvabhāvatvād bādhā avicārataḥ ātmādeḥ pūrvanirastatvādvedakābhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9319: vedakābhāvādbhavet, kuta upaghātahetorabhāvācca bhavet? naiva paramārthataḥ kasyacit kutaścit syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9321: saṃprati vedanābhāvāt tatpratyayā tṛṣṇāpi kāraṇavirahāt paramārthato notpādamarhatītyupadarśayitumāha yadā netyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9322: yadā na vedakaḥ kaścidvedanā ca na vidyate /
T04bsa054_u:9323: tadāvasthāmimāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase // Bca_9.99 //
T04bsa054_u:9328: tadā avasthāmimāṃ evaṃvidhāṃ svajanmavikalāṃ dṛṣṭvā upalabhya tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase,
T04bsa054_u:9329: tadduḥkhaduḥkhitāpi satī kiṃ na viśīryase, yadadyāpi tadviyogavidhurā tvamātmānaṃ na muñcasi
T04bsa054_u:9330: syādetat- yadi vedako na syāt, vedanā ca nāsti, kenāyaṃ tarhi sukhasādhanatvādinā bhāveṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ pravartate ityatrāha dṛśyate
T04bsa054_u:9336: evaṃ tarhi cittameva vedakaṃ vastusadastīti cedāha svapnamāyopamātmanā /
T04bsa054_u:9341: sahajātatvāt, cittena sahotpannatvāt cittena saha janma yasya tasya
T04bsa054_u:9343: na tu paramārthato darśanamasti yenaivaṃ dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9344: vedanā tena nekṣyate, yena dṛṣṭasukhasādhanādivyavahāro 'pyanyata eva, tena kāraṇena vedanā nekṣyate, na dṛśyate vastutaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9345: athāpi syāt- na sahajaṃ dṛśyate, api tu jñānaṃ viṣayākāratayā tata utpadyamānamuttarakālaṃ tasya grāhakamucyate, ityetadapahastayitumāha
T04bsa054_u:9348: avaśyaṃ sahajātasya vedanam, anyathā pūrvaṃ prāgbhāvi paścāduttarakālaṃ jātena utpannena jñānena smaryate nānubhūyate smṛtirūpeṇa viṣayīkriyate,
T04bsa054_u:9357: svātmānaṃ nānubhavati svātmānaṃ svaṃ svarūpaṃ nānubhavati, na vedayate, svasaṃvedanasya pūrvaṃ nirastatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:9358: anyena tarhi sā jñānenānubhūyate vedanā? āha-
T04bsa054_u:9363: na cāsti vedakaḥ kaścidvedanāto na tattvataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9364: na ca naivāsti vedakaḥ kaścit, yo vedanāṃ vedayate, cittamanyadvā /
T04bsa054_u:9365: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt vedanā anubhava iti vedanālakṣaṇaśūnyatvādvedanā na tattvataḥ na paramārthataḥ, anyatrābhiniveśāt tatsvarūpapratipādakasya kasyacidabhāvāt /
T04bsa054_u:9368: api tu khalu punarabhiniveśo vedanā, parigraho vedanā, upādānaṃ vedanā,
T04bsa054_u:9369: upalambho vedanā, viparyāso vedanā, vikalpo vedanetyādi //
T04bsa054_u:9372: vedako vedanā vedyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
T04bsa054_u:9374: yathā bodhistathā hyeṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
T04bsa054_u:9376: tasmādvedakavedanāsvabhāvaśūnyaṃ pratītyasamutpannamātraṃ nirvyāpāramasvāmikaṃ māyāprapañcavadupalambhagocaratāmupagatamidaṃ kalevaramavabhāsate, iti na kasyacit sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā svakīyaṃ bhavatītyāha nirātmaka ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9377: nirātmake kalāpe 'smin ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā // Bca_9.102 //
T04bsa054_u:9381: evamindrajālavat paśyan saṃjātavismayo brūte- ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā /
T04bsa054_u:9382: evamuktakrameṇa kasyacidvedayiturabhāvāt vedanāyāśca, kaḥ paramārthato 'nayā vedanayā bādhyate pīḍayate? vicārato naiva kaścit /
T04bsa054_u:9386: nendriyeṣu na rūpādau nāntarāle manaḥ sthitam /
T04bsa054_u:9388: tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ tāvanmanovijñānaṃ nirūpayati- tathā kva punaridaṃ
T04bsa054_u:9389: manovijñānaṃ svayamupasthitam? tatra na tāvadindriyeṣu cakṣurādiṣu manaḥ sthitaṃ sthitimupagatam
T04bsa054_u:9395: nāpyantarna madhye kāyasya cittaṃ nāpi bahiḥ na bāhyeṣu śarīrāvayaveṣu cittaṃ labhyate /
T04bsa054_u:9396: anyatrāpi na labhyate, uktebhyaḥ sthānebhyaḥ anyatrāpi kkaciddeśāntare yatra tatra vā na labhyate, na prāpyate vicārataḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9397: tathā kkacit kathaṃcidbhavati, tataḥ kathaṃ tasya niṣedha ityatrāha yanna
T04bsa054_u:9399: yanna kāye na cānyatra na miśraṃ na pṛthak kvacit /
