T04bsa054_u:9400: tanna kiṃcidataḥ sattvāḥ prakṛtyā parinirvṛtāḥ // Bca_9.104 //
T04bsa054_u:9402: na cānyatra, naiva kāyādanyatra bāhye vastuni /
T04bsa054_u:9407: nāpi pṛthak svātantryeṇa ca kvacidavasthitaṃ yaccittam, tat paramārthato na (Bcp 245) kiṃcit na vastusat /
T04bsa054_u:9410: ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt sattvāḥ prāṇinaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvena parinirvṛtāḥ parimuktasvabhāvāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9412: svayameva tu abhūtaparikalpavaśādasatyapi satyamāropya kleśavāsanopahatacittasaṃtatayaḥ saṃsāracārakāvarodhaniṣiddhasvātantryavṛttayo 'parimuktā ityucyante na tu
T04bsa054_u:9414: iti mano vicārya cakṣurādivijñānaṃ vicārayannāha jñeyādityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9416: jñeyena saha cejjñānaṃ kimālambyāsya saṃbhavaḥ // Bca_9.105 //
T04bsa054_u:9417: tathā hi na kvacit sadā sadrūpamavasthitaṃ jñānam, kiṃ tu cakṣurādisāmagrīṃ pratītya utpadyamānaṃ rūpādijñeyagrāhakamityucyate, iti parasyāśayamāśaṅkaya vikalpayati- tat punarjñeyāt pūrvaṃ vā syāt,
T04bsa054_u:9420: tatrāha- jñeyāt grāhyaviṣayāt pūrvaṃ prāgeva, anutpanne eva jñeye yadi
T04bsa054_u:9421: jñānamutpannamabhidhīyate, tadā kimālambya asya saṃbhavaḥ? pūrvaṃ jñeyamālambanamantareṇa kimālambya kimāśritya asya saṃbhava utpādaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:9422: dvitīyapakṣamāśrityāha- jñeyena grāhyaviṣayeṇa saha samānakālaṃ cedyadi jñānam, kimālambya asya saṃbhavaḥ? samānakālasya jñeyasya akāraṇatayā
T04bsa054_u:9426: atha jñeyādbhavet paścāt tadā jñānaṃ kuto bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:9430: jñeye bhavet utpadyeta jñānam, tadā jñānaṃ kuto bhavet, jñānakāle jñeyasya nivṛttatvāt, kuta ālambanāt jñānaṃ bhavet, kimāśritya utpadyeta?
T04bsa054_u:9434: sa evaṃ cittaṃ parigaveṣate- katarat taccittaṃ rajyati vā duṣyati vā
T04bsa054_u:9435: muhyati vā? kimatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ vā? iti /
T04bsa054_u:9439: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇopalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:9441: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhairna dṛṣṭam, na paśyanti, na drakṣyanti /
T04bsa054_u:9443: sarvabuddhairna dṛṣṭam], na paśyanti, na drakṣyanti, kīdṛśastasya pracāro draṣṭavyaḥ? anyatra vitathapatitayā saṃjñayā dharmāḥ pravartante /
T04bsa054_u:9444: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśamabhūtakalpanatayā vividhāmupapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T04bsa054_u:9447: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
T04bsa054_u:9452: yāvat cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
T04bsa054_u:9457: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tannaivāsti na nasti ityādi //
T04bsa054_u:9458: evaṃ cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādayitumuktameva kramaṃ yojayannāha evaṃ cetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9461: evameva yathoditanyāyena sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvabhāvānāmutpattirutpādo nāvasīyate na pratīyate
T04bsa054_u:9462: teṣāmapi svahetutaḥ pūrvaṃ samānakālaṃ paścādvā utpattau idameva dūṣaṇaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vācyam utpādābhāvānnirodho 'pi na yujyate /
T04bsa054_u:9464: ata eva ca anutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatayā niṣprapañcatvāt sarvadharmā vimokśābhimukhā dharmadhātuniryātā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprajñaptikā avyavahārā anabhilāpyā anabhilapanīyā ityucyante /
T04bsa054_u:9468: dharme dharmānupaśyī viharan bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
T04bsa054_u:9469: yato na buddhadharmāḥ, yato na bodhiḥ, yato na mārgaḥ, yato na niḥsaraṇam,
T04bsa054_u:9471: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate- niṣkleśā ete dharmā naite sakleśāḥ
T04bsa054_u:9474: nāsti kleśānāṃ saṃnicayo rāśībhāvaḥ, na rāgabhāvaḥ, na
T04bsa054_u:9483: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
T04bsa054_u:9489: evaṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānaṃ darśayatā sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhāḥ prakāśitāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9491: tataḥ satyadvayavyavasthāpanaṃ na ghaṭate iti parihartuṃ codyamutthāpayannāha
T04bsa054_u:9495: yadi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmā anutpannāniruddhasvabhāvāḥ, evaṃ sati saṃvṛtirnāsti, vyavahāro na syāt, paramārthasatyamevaikaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9496: tataḥ saṃvṛterabhāvāt satyadvayaṃ saṃvṛtisatyaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ ceti yaduktam-
T04bsa054_u:9498: iti, tadetat satyadvayaṃ kutaḥ? naiva syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9501: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma nāsti, tathā marīcikādiṣu jalakalpanayeva saṃvṛtisvabhāvayā kalpanayā buddhyā vyavasthāpyate, tataḥ satyadvayamupapadyate ityāśaṅkayannāha atha seti-
T04bsa054_u:9512: sāṃvṛtamucyate, yo 'pi tarhi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālakṣaṇaṃ paramārthasatyamadhigamya anupalambhayogena sarvaprapañcavirahāt
T04bsa054_u:9513: parinirvṛtimupayātaḥ, so 'pi sattvaḥ parinirvṛto vinirmuktaḥ kuto bhavet?
T04bsa054_u:9517: buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirucyate iti vacanāt nirvṛtirapi saṃvṛtiḥ syāt //
T04bsa054_u:9520: parasya nirvṛtasattvādanyasya sattvasya cittaṃ tasyāsau vikalpaḥ, yo 'yaṃ
T04bsa054_u:9527: svasaṃvṛtyā nijasaṃvṛtyā svakalpanayā sa iti parinirvṛto nāsti, na vidyate /
T04bsa054_u:9528: parinirvṛta eva saḥ iti svayamasya sarvavikalpoparamāt /
T04bsa054_u:9529: anyatrāpi tarhi kathamanyasaṃvṛtiḥ syādityatrāha sa paścādityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9530: sa paścānniyataḥ so 'sti na cennāstyeva saṃvṛtiḥ // Bca_9.108 //
T04bsa054_u:9531: asmin sati idaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate iti idaṃpratyayatāmātrameva saṃvṛtiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9532: iti dharmebhyo dharma utpadyamānaḥ paścādbhāvī bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:9533: tataḥ sa paścānniyato dharmaḥ, so 'sti yadi, tadā astyeva saṃvṛtiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9543: tasmāt sarvakalpanāvirahādanyasaṃvṛtyālambito 'pi svayaṃ parinirvṛta evāsau paramārthataḥ
T04bsa054_u:9544: ata eva sarvadharmāḥ sarvakalpanāśūnyatvādanutpannāniruddhasvabhāvatvācca prakṛtiparinirvṛtā ādiśāntā ityucyante /
T04bsa054_u:9545: tathāpi tathāvidhebhya eva tathāvidhā anye dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
T04bsa054_u:9547: tena ca rūpeṇa parikalpavaśāt punarālambyamānāḥ sāṃvṛtāḥ, vāstavarūpābhāvācca anutpannāniruddhā ityucyante kharaviṣāṇavat /
T04bsa054_u:9549: śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9557: yatha muñca pratītya balvajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
T04bsa054_u:9558: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikaśa nāsti vartanā //
T04bsa054_u:9561: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:9562: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato eva saṃskāra anuchedaśāśvatāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9563: araṇiṃ yatha cottarāraṇiṃ hastavyāyāma trayebhi saṃgati /
T04bsa054_u:9564: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtārthu laghu nirudhyate //
T04bsa054_u:9565: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kutayaṃ āgatu kutra yāti vā /
T04bsa054_u:9566: vidiśo diśi sarvi mārgato nāgati nāsya gatiśca labhyate //
T04bsa054_u:9567: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayā /
T04bsa054_u:9568: sāmagri tu sattvasucanā sa ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate //
T04bsa054_u:9577: svapnavat saṃsṛtiḥ proktā tvayā tattvavidāṃ vara //
T04bsa054_u:9579: tasmāt paramārthata utpādanirodhābhāve 'pi na saṃvṛtisatyavirodha iti
T04bsa054_u:9581: nanu yadi paramārthato 'nutpannāniruddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, tadā na jñānaṃ na ca jñeyaṃ vastutaḥ saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:9582: tat kimiha kena vicāryate iti vicāro 'pi
T04bsa054_u:9592: yathāprasiddhaṃ lokavyavahārato niścitamāśritya gṛhītvā vicāro vimarśaḥ sarva ucyate abhidhīyate
T04bsa054_u:9593: sarva iti na kaścideva vicāro 'pi saṃvṛtimāśritya
T04bsa054_u:9594: pratanyate, na tu paramārthasatyam, tasya sarvavyavahārātikrāntatvādityarthaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9599: vicāritena tu parīkṣitena punaryadā vicāreṇa vicāryate nirūpyate, tadā anavasthā apratiṣṭhānaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9602: 'sau vicārasya vicāraṇārthaṃ vicāra upādīyate, tasyāpi vicārasya vicāraṇāddhetoḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9603: vicārye tarhi vicāryamāṇe kathamiyamanavasthā na syādityatrāha vicārite
T04bsa054_u:9607: vicārye tu parīkṣye punarvastuni vicārite nirṇīte sati vicārasya nirṇayasya punaruttarakālaṃ kartavyasya āśrayo nāsti, yamāśritya punarvicārānusaraṇenānavasthānaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9609: ata eva nirāśrayatvānnodeti, āśrayābhāvānna punarvicāraḥ pravartate /
T04bsa054_u:9610: sarvasamāropaniṣedhaṃ vidhāya vastutattvaparijñānāt kṛtakṛtyatvāt pravṛttinivṛttyabhāvāt (Bcp 250) na kkacit sajyate, nāpi virajyate /
T04bsa054_u:9612: sarvavyavahāranivṛtteḥ sarvatra nirvyāpāratayā praśāntatvāt tadeva nirvāṇamabhidhīyate //
T04bsa054_u:9613: kalpitaviṣaye 'vaśyameva sarvatra vicāraḥ satyo na tu paramārthata ityāha yasya tvityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9615: yasya punaḥ paramārthasadbhāvavādinaḥ etaddūyaṃ vicāro vicāryaṃ ceti etadubhayamapi satyaṃ paramārthasat, sa eva bhāvasvabhāvavādī
T04bsa054_u:9616: atyantaduḥsthitaḥ atyantamatiśayena duḥkhena sthito duḥsthitaḥ duṣkaraṇīyatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:9618: yadi jñānavaśādartho jñānāstitve tu kā gatiḥ // Bca_9.112 //
T04bsa054_u:9619: yadi jñānavaśāt jñānasya pramāṇasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt arthaḥ prameyaṃ vyavasthāpyate, tadā bhavatu nāma pramāṇāt prameyavyavasthā, ko nāma nivārayati? kevalamidamiha nirūpaṇīyam-jñānāstitve tu kā gatiḥ? jñānasya pramāṇasya punarastitvaṃ kuto niścitamiti vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:9620: svasaṃvedanasyābhāvāt pramāṇāntarānveṣaṇe anavasthānaṃ syāditi kā gatirāśrayaṇīyā?
T04bsa054_u:9621: syādetat- syādeva anavasthānam, yadi jñānastitve pramāṇaṃ mṛgyate /
T04bsa054_u:9622: yāvatā prameyādeva pramāṇavyavasthā, tat kuto 'navasthānaṃ syādityāśaṅkayannāha
T04bsa054_u:9624: atha jñeyavaśājjñānaṃ jñeyāstitve tu kā gatiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9626: atha jñeyasya prameyasya vaśāt jñānaṃ vyavasthāpyate, tarhi jñeyāstitve tu kā gatiḥ? yadi jñeyavaśāt jñānaṃ
T04bsa054_u:9627: vyavasthāpyate, tadā svayameva jñeyaṃ jñānāstitve vyavasthānibandhanaṃ syāt, tacca kutaḥ pramāṇāt siddhamiti pṛcchati- jñeyāstitve punaḥ kā
T04bsa054_u:9629: prameyasiddhaye jñānāntarānusaraṇe tadapi jñānāntaraṃ kutaḥ siddhamiti vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:9630: tasmādeva jñeyāditi cet, jñeyaṃ kutaḥ siddham?
T04bsa054_u:9632: syādetat- bhavedetat yadi jñānasya jñeyasya vā siddhaye jñānāntarāpekṣā
T04bsa054_u:9636: atha punarevamabhidhīyate- anyonyasya jñānasya jñeyasya parasparasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt jñānajñeyayorapi sattvamastitvaṃ niścīyate jñānavaśājjñeyasya jñeyavaśācca jñānasyeti yāvat /
T04bsa054_u:9638: dvayorapi jñānajñeyayorabhāvaḥ syāt, ekasyāpi sattvasiddhirna bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:9641: pitā cenna vinā putrātkutaḥ putrasya saṃbhavaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9644: pitā janakaḥ yadi putraṃ vinā putramantareṇa na syāt,
T04bsa054_u:9645: putrajananasāpekṣatvādasya vyapadeśasya, tarhi kutaḥ putrasya saṃbhavaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:9646: kutaḥ kasmāt piturabhāvāt putrasya janyasya saṃbhavaḥ janma astu? kimiti
T04bsa054_u:9649: yataḥ putrasya abhāve asattve pitā nāsti na bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:9653: yāvacca pitā na bhavati, tāvat putrasya tasmāt saṃbhavo nāsti /
T04bsa054_u:9654: ataḥ itaretarāśrayaṇādekābhāvādanyatarābhāvaḥ syāditi dvayorapyanayorabhāva iti samudāyārthaḥ
T04bsa054_u:9657: yathātra pitāputrodāharaṇe, tathā asattvaṃ tathaiva abhāvaḥ tayordvayorjñānajñeyayoḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9659: jñānaparicchedyatayā ca jñeyamiti yāvat jñānaṃ na sidhyati, yāvat parijñānaṃ na sidhyati, tāvat paricchedyatayā ca jñeyaṃ na sidhyati /
T04bsa054_u:9661: syādetat- na brūmaḥ- anyonyavaśāt siddhiranayoḥ api tu jñeyakāryaṃ jñānam,
T04bsa054_u:9665: jñeyājjñānena jātena tatsattā kiṃ na gamyate // Bca_9.115 //
T04bsa054_u:9667: bījaṃ tenaiva bījājjātena aṅkureṇa sūcyate gamyate yathā, tathā atra jñeyāt prameyāt jñānena jātena utpannena tatsattā tasya jñeyasya sattā sadbhāvaḥ kiṃ na gamyate, kiṃ na pratipadyate? atrāpi bījāṅkuravat kāryakāraṇabhāvasya
T04bsa054_u:9671: jñānāstitvaṃ kuto jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ yattena gamyate // Bca_9.116 //
T04bsa054_u:9672: aṅkurāt kāryāt bījamastīti yadgamyate, tannāyamasyaiva kevalasya prabhāvaḥ, kiṃ tarhi anyato jñānādaṅkuravyatiriktāt tadastīti gamyate /
T04bsa054_u:9673: tathā hi- na yogyatāmātreṇa kāryaṃ kāraṇasya gamakam, bījasyaiva aṅkurajananamapratipannasyāpi gamakatvaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9674: nāpi svarūpapratītimātreṇa apratipannakāryakāraṇabhāvasyāpi tatpratipattiprasaṅgāt, api tu avinābhāvitvena niścitam /
T04bsa054_u:9675: ataḥ prākpratipannakāryakāraṇabhāvasya punaḥ paścāt kkacid bījāvinābhāvinamaṅkuramupalabdhavataḥ
T04bsa054_u:9678: jñānāstitvaṃ jñānasya sadbhāvaḥ kuto jñātaṃ kasmāt pratītam?
T04bsa054_u:9679: svasaṃvedanābhāvādanavasthānabhayena jñānāntarānanusaraṇācca, jñeyaṃ yattena gamyate, yad yasmāt jñeyaṃ tena jñānena jñeyakāryeṇa gamyate avasīyate /
T04bsa054_u:9680: na hi svayamaniścitaṃ liṅgaṃ (Bcp 252) sādhyasya gamakamupapadyate /
T04bsa054_u:9682: tasmādvāstavapakṣe jñānajñeyāsiddhervicāraḥ kartumaśakyaḥ, kālpanikapakṣe tu yathāprasiddhavyavahāramāśritya śakyate iti niścitam //
T04bsa054_u:9683: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9684: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana //
T04bsa054_u:9686: ityasyārthasya samarthanārthaṃ nāpyahetuta iti turīyakoṭiprasādhanāya tāvat svabhāvavādimatamapākartumāha loka ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9688: tathā hi te svaparasvabhāvasarvahetunirapekṣameva bhāvagrāmavaicitryamutpadyate iti varṇayanti
T04bsa054_u:9690: na ca cetano 'pi kaścidanyaḥ karmaṇā tādṛśanirmāṇapravīṇa upalabhyate, nāpi cādriyate, tatkarmaṇo 'paryavasānāt
T04bsa054_u:9692: tasmāt kiṃcitkāraṇamantareṇaiva sarvamidaṃ jagadvaicitryamutpadyate iti teṣāṃ matam, taduktam-
T04bsa054_u:9704: sarvamanekaprakāraṃ hetuṃ jagadvaicitryakāraṇam, udīkṣate tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi kāryamupajanayantaṃ paśyati /
T04bsa054_u:9705: yat kāryaṃ yasya sadbhāve bhavati, tadabhāve ca na bhavatīti pratīyate, sa tasya heturiti
T04bsa054_u:9710: padmasya rājīvasya nālamādi yeṣāṃ padmadalakesarādīnāṃ te tathoktāḥ, teṣāṃ bhedo nānātvam
T04bsa054_u:9712: hetubhedena hetoḥ kāraṇasya bhedena viśeṣeṇa jāyate utpadyate, nānyathā /
T04bsa054_u:9714: ataḥ yad yasyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ kurvat pratīyate, tat tasyaiva kāryaṃ
T04bsa054_u:9716: yasmāt pratiniyatakāraṇādeva pratiniyataviśeṣotpattiḥ, tadbhedena tadbhedāditi na ahetumatī
T04bsa054_u:9718: nanu bhavedeṣa viśeṣaḥ yadi hetoreva svayamasau viśeṣaḥ siddhaḥ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9719: kiṃ tu tasyaiva kutaḥ sa bhavatīti vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:9724: kiṃkṛtaḥ kena kṛtaḥ kuto yātaḥ hetubhedaścet, hetorbhedo viśeṣaśceducyate /
T04bsa054_u:9725: pūrvahetuprabhedataḥ pūrvasya prāktanasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ prabhedataḥ prabhedādviśeṣāt
T04bsa054_u:9726: tasyāpi tatpūrvasya hetoḥ kuto viśeṣa iti cet,
T04bsa054_u:9727: punastatrāpi pūrvahetuviśeṣāditi vaktavyam, iti uttarottarasya viśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ pūrvapūrvasya viśeṣādityuttaraṃ vācyam /
T04bsa054_u:9728: na caivamanavasthānamaniṣṭaṃ kiṃcidāpādayati- anavarāgrasya saṃsārasya pūrvakoṭirna prajñāyate ityabhyupagamāt /
T04bsa054_u:9729: ata eva phalāviparyayo 'pi na svato bhavatītyāha kasmāccedityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9732: pūrvahetuprabhāvataḥ pūrvasya tajjanakasya hetoḥ sāmarthyāt svahetunā sa tādṛśastatsvabhāvo 'jani yena sahakāriviśeṣopahitakāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaparaṃparāpariṇatimadhigacchan asati pratibandhavaikalyayoḥ saṃbhave tathāvidhameva phalamutpādayati /
T04bsa054_u:9739: hetuvyāpāreṇa tat prasādhayataḥ svayameva punaḥ sahetukatvābhyupagamāt vandhyā me māteti bruvataḥ iva pratijñāyāḥ svavacanena bādhanaṃ syāt ityubhayataḥpāśā rajjuriti saṃkaṭaprāpto batāyaṃ tapasvī /
T04bsa054_u:9741: na heturastīti vadan sahetukaṃ nanu pratijñāṃ svayameva śātayet /
T04bsa054_u:9742: athāpi hetupraṇayālaso bhavet pratijñayā kevalayāsya kiṃ bhavet //
T04bsa054_u:9745: evaṃ svabhāvavādinaṃ nirākṛtya caturthaprakāraprasādhanārthameva īśvarakāraṇatāṃ jagataḥ pratyākhyātuṃ tadupakṣepaṃ kurvannāha īśvara
T04bsa054_u:9747: īśvaro jagato hetuḥ īśvarakāraṇavādino hi svabhāvavādimataniṣedhamākarṇya viśeṣamabhidhātumardhamavasitaṃ bhārasyeti manyamānāḥ prāhuḥ- sāhāyyameva anuṣṭhitamevaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9750: kevalamacetanāḥ punaramī jalapaṅkādayo vaicitryāsāmarthyā iti yuktamanenoktam /
T04bsa054_u:9751: tatra astyeva sa bhagavān viśvavaicitryanirmāṇapravīṇaḥ jagadekasūtradhāraḥ sakalajagadādibhūtaḥ nityātmatayā sarvadānupahataśaktiprabhāvaḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāditattvavedī samastārvācīnadarśanāgocaramāhātmya īśvaraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9752: tena hetunā sahetukaṃ sakalamidaṃ sacarācaraṃ jagaditi kaḥ sacetanaḥ anyathā vaktumutsahate? iti naiyāyikādiveśmakathāmabhidhāya pratyācaṣṭe- īśvaro jagato hetuḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9754: sa eva jagato viśvasya hetuḥ sṛṣṭisthitipralayakāraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:9756: anyathā punaracetanopādānatvāt kathamamī girisaridavanisāgarādaya utpattibhājo bhaveyuḥ? cetanāva dadhiṣṭhānāt punarime samutpattumutsahante,
T04bsa054_u:9761: na syānmerurayaṃ na ceyamavanī naivāyamambhonidhiḥ sūryācandramasau niveśasubhagau naitau jagaccakṣuṣī /
T04bsa054_u:9762: īśāno na kulālavadyadi bhavediśvasya nirmāṇakṛt sattvādīśvarakartṛkaṃ jagadidaṃ vaktīti kaścitkila
T04bsa054_u:9766: vacanaracanāprapañcamālayā? naitaducyamānamapi svasamayābhiniveśināṃ jaḍadhiyāṃ prītikaraṃ pramāṇaśūnyaṃ viduṣāṃ saṃtoṣamutpādayati /
T04bsa054_u:9768: yadyasau kāruṇikaḥ, kimarthaṃ punarimān narakādiduḥkhapīḍitān prāṇinaḥ
T04bsa054_u:9769: karoti? tathā ca sati kāruṇikatvaṃ tasya śraddhāsamadhigamyameva syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9772: tat karma kāruṇikaḥ kimiti kārayati yenāniṣṭaṃ phalamupabhujyate, tatrāpi tasya vyāpārāt, sarvotpattimatāṃ nimittakāraṇatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:9773: api ca kiṃ tasminnavyāpriyamāṇe tat karmaphalamupabhujyate na vā? yadi prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadā
T04bsa054_u:9778: atha dvitīyaḥ, tadā kṛpālurasau tatropekṣāṃ kimiti nādhivāsayati, yad yatnena sāhāyyameva tatropakalpayati /
T04bsa054_u:9786: evaṃ hi tadicchāyattavṛttitayā tasyāparipākāt tena svamaiśvaryamupadarśitaṃ tatra bhavet
T04bsa054_u:9788: mahad bata anena svamaiśvaryamitthaṃ dyotitamanyatra syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9789: tat parakarmaṇāpi samākṛṣṭo nāma nātmani vaśitvamadhigacchati, īśvarataḥ karmaṇa eva mahat sāmarthyamevaṃ prakāśitaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9790: tadvaraṃ karmaiva paryupāsyaṃ yatsāmarthyena samākṛṣyamāṇo maheśvaro 'pi sthātumasamarthaḥ
T04bsa054_u:9792: namaḥ satkarmabhyo vidhirapi na yebhyaḥ prabhavati //
T04bsa054_u:9794: atha na kāruṇikaḥ, tadāsau vītarāgaḥ sarāgo vā? yadi ādyo vikalpaḥ, tadā yadi nāma dayāvirahāt sukhaṃ nopanayati, duḥkhaṃ tu janasya
T04bsa054_u:9798: kathamakāraṇameva janaṃ duḥkhayati? krīḍārthaṃ duḥkhayatīti cet, krīḍārthaṃ vītarāgasya pravṛttiriti cet, niścitamasau na vītarāgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9799: rāgādimatāmapi tāvajjitendriyāṇāṃ na krīḍārthaṃ dṛśyate pravṛttiḥ, kiṃ punarvītarāgāṇāṃ tathā bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:9800: na rakṣaḥpiśācādimantareṇa anyasya paraduḥkhena krīḍā saṃbhāvyate //
T04bsa054_u:9801: atha avītarāga iti pakṣaḥ, tadā kathamayamitarajanasādhāraṇaḥ sannīśvaro
T04bsa054_u:9808: yadi svasthātmā, tadā kimiti janamakāṇḍameva duḥkhayati? na hi svasthātmā
T04bsa054_u:9810: atha vimārgagāminameva kṛtāparādhaṃ pīḍayatīti cet, vimārgagāminamapi ayameva kārayati /
T04bsa054_u:9811: tathābhūtamapi kārayitvā punaḥ pīḍayatīti sa laukikeśvarāṇāmapi jaghanyatayā vṛttimatiśete
T04bsa054_u:9814: atha asvasthātmā, tadā asādhu tadārādhane svargāpavargārthināṃ prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9816: tathā hi svargādilipsayā tadārādhanāya pravartante prekṣāvantaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9817: tacca apariniścitasvabhāvatayā tato na saṃbhāvyate, viparyayo 'pi vā tadārādhanaphalasya saṃbhāvyate
T04bsa054_u:9819: kathamanyathā tadārādhane pravartante? tadaparonmattakairvā kimaparāddhaṃ yataste na paryupāsyante? teṣāṃ prabhāvātiśayavikalatvāditi cet, na vai prakṛte 'pi kaṃcit prabhāvātiśayamutpaśyāmaḥ unmattakaḥ sakalajagadatiśāyiśaktiriti ko 'nya unmattakādvaktumarhati?
T04bsa054_u:9820: tadayamabhivicāryamāṇo na kvacidavasānaṃ labhate iti alaṃ durmativiṣyanditeṣu ādareṇeti /
T04bsa054_u:9823: sukhasya duḥkhasya na ko 'pi dātā paro dadātīti kubuddhireṣā /
T04bsa054_u:9826: tasmādakartṛkameva idaṃ jagadaśeṣamiti na paridṛṣṭakāraṇādanyaḥ svatantraścetano vā tasya kartā kaścidasti /
T04bsa054_u:9829: īśvarakāraṇavādinaṃ pṛcchati- vada brūhi ko 'yamīśvaro bhavato 'bhimataḥ?
T04bsa054_u:9830: tāvacchabdenedamabhidhatte- yeṣāṃ kṣityādīnāmanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi kāryamupalabhyate, tatra katamadīśvaraṃ bhavānācaṣṭe? na ca anupalabdhānvayavyatirekavyāpārasya kāraṇatā prakalpayituṃ yuktā,
T04bsa054_u:9833: na cānyasya kṣitibījādivyatiriktasya anvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ kurvat dṛśyate kāryam /
T04bsa054_u:9834: tat kathaṃ tasya kāryopayogitvaṃ vyavasthāpyate? yaduktam-
T04bsa054_u:9838: atha pṛthivyādīni bhūtānyeva īśvaro bhavatviti parābhiprāyamāśaṅkayāha bhūtāni cedityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9839: bhūtāni cedbhavatvevaṃ nāmamātre 'pi kiṃ śramaḥ // Bca_9.119 //
T04bsa054_u:9840: yadi bhūtāni pṛthivyādīni īśvara ucyate, tadā abhyupagamyate eva /
T04bsa054_u:9843: kevalaṃ nāmamātre 'pi kiṃ śramaḥ? nāmaiva kevalamarthabhedaśūnyaṃ nāmamātrakam /
T04bsa054_u:9845: nāmamātre eva kimiha mahāsamārambheṇa tatprasādhanāya śramaḥ āyāsaḥ kriyate? mayā kṣityādaya ucyante, tvayā punastānyeva bhūtāni
T04bsa054_u:9846: īśvaraḥ iti nārthataḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ? na cātra vipratipattāvarthaśūnyāyāṃ
T04bsa054_u:9848: atha astyeva arthaviśeṣaḥ, tadā naiṣāmīśvaratvaṃ yuktamityāha api
T04bsa054_u:9850: api tvaneke 'nityāśca niśceṣṭā na ca devatāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9851: laṅghayāścāśucayaścaiva kṣmādayo na sa īśvaraḥ // Bca_9.120 //
T04bsa054_u:9863: kṣmādayaḥ kṣmā pṛthivī ādiryeṣāmaptejovāyūnāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9864: na sa īśvaraḥ, sa īśvaraḥ tādṛkkhabhāvo na bhavati, tatṣaṭprakāraviparītatvāt //
T04bsa054_u:9865: yadi kṣmādayo neśvaraḥ, ākāśaṃ tarhi bhaviṣyatītyāha nākāśamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9872: pūrvameva vistareṇa ātmanaḥ pratiṣiddhatvāt niḥsvabhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadasau
T04bsa054_u:9873: / athāpi syāt- avitarkyamāhātmyatvādasya nārvāgdarśanairidamitthamiti tatsvarūpaṃ vivecayituṃ śakyamityāha acintyasyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9875: yadi asau cintātikrāntamāhātmyaḥ, tadā acintyasya ca
T04bsa054_u:9876: cintāpathamatikrāntasya īśvarasya kartṛtvaṃ yugapatkāraṇatvamapi acintyamatarkyaṃ kimucyate, kimabhidhīyate? kartṛtvamapyasya acintyatvānna vaktumucitamityarthaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9877: syādetat- atidurlakṣyasvabhāvatayā cintayitumaśakyo 'sau, kāryaṃ tu tasya
T04bsa054_u:9878: sarvajanapratītisādhāraṇatvāt cintyameva, iti bruvāṇaṃ pratyāha tena
T04bsa054_u:9880: tena kiṃ straṣṭumiṣṭaṃ ca bhavatu nāma tasya kāryaṃ cintyam, tathāpi tena kiṃ straṣṭumiṣṭuṃ ca /
T04bsa054_u:9881: tena īśvareṇa acintyamāhātmyena kiṃ kāryaṃ straṣṭuṃ nirmātumiṣṭamabhipretaṃ ca, iti parasyottaramāśaṅkayannāha-
T04bsa054_u:9882: ātmā cet atra pūrvapadasyākāreṇa cchandonurodhāt saṃdhirna kṛtaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9883: ātmā tena straṣṭumiṣṭaṃ cenmatam, etat pratiṣedhayati-
T04bsa054_u:9885: nanu bhoḥ, asāvātmā dhruvo nityo 'bhimato bhavatām /
T04bsa054_u:9886: tat kathamasau kriyate? anyathā nitya eva sa na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9888: anyatrāpi na tasya sṛṣṭivyāpāra upalakśyate ityāha kṣmādītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:9889: kṣmādisvabhāva īśaśca jñānaṃ jñeyādanādi ca // Bca_9.122 //
T04bsa054_u:9890: karmaṇaḥ sukhaduḥkhe ca ādiśabdena aptejovāyvākāśakāladiṅmanāṃsi gṛhyante /
T04bsa054_u:9892: / so 'pi na tena kriyate, pṛthivyādīnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ nityatvābhyupagamāt /
T04bsa054_u:9896: īśvaro 'pi dhruvaḥ iti ātmānamasau na karoti /
T04bsa054_u:9899: āsaṃsāraṃ jñeyāmālambya pravartanāt, tadapi na tena kriyate /
T04bsa054_u:9900: tatkarmaṇaḥ sukhaduḥkhe ca, karmaṇaḥ śubhāśubhāt yathāsaṃbhavaṃ sukhaduḥkhe ca bhavataḥ iṣṭāniṣṭavipākaje, tatrāpi na tasya vyāpāraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9903: brūhi kimidānīṃ teneśvareṇa nirmitaṃ racitam, iti na kvacit tasya sāmarthyamupalabhyate /
T04bsa054_u:9904: tat kathamasya jagatkartṛtvamucyate? adhunā sarvatra sādhāraṇaṃ dūṣaṇamāha hetorityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9905: hetorādirna cedasti phalasyādiḥ kuto bhavet // Bca_9.123 //
T04bsa054_u:9906: tathāhi asau nityo vā jagato hetuḥ syādanityo vā? nitya eva tadvādibhirasau parikalpitaḥ
T04bsa054_u:9907: tatra nityatve sati hetoḥ kāraṇasya ādirnāsti, yadi, tadā phalasyādiḥ kuto bhavet? naiva syādityarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9908: nityamupasthite samarthasvabhāve hetau kāryamapi tajjanyamajastrameva jāyeta /
T04bsa054_u:9911: kasmātsadā na kurute kasmāt kāraṇāt sadā sarvakālaṃ na kurute? na sarvaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti kathaṃ kasyacit kāryasya kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:9913: anyathāvatāryate- yadi ca neśvaro jagataḥ kartā syāt, kathamidaṃ pralayānantaramāditaḥ sargabhāg bhavet, ityatrāha hetorityādi- anavarāgro hi jātisaṃsāraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9914: tataśca hetoḥ kleśakarmādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ pūrvakoṭiḥ na
T04bsa054_u:9916: prathamārambhaḥ kuto bhavet? naiva vidyate ityarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9917: anādau saṃsāre hi sattvānāṃ karmādhipatyena sthitisaṃvartavivartānāṃ pravartanāt /
T04bsa054_u:9921: hetorīśvarasya ādirna cedasti, pralayakāle 'pi tasyānupahatatayā māhātmyasyābhyupagamāt
T04bsa054_u:9922: tatkṛtasya sargādilakṣaṇasya ādiḥ kuto bhavet? nityatayā tatkāraṇasya sadā
T04bsa054_u:9924: ato nityasamarthe tasmin sargāderādireva na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9927: yadi asau kartā syāt, tadā nityatvāt-
T04bsa054_u:9929: tathāhi yadi kadācit sargaṃ karoti, tadā tatkāraṇasvabhāvatayā sadā tameva kuryāt /
T04bsa054_u:9935: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma asau sadā samarthasvabhāvaḥ, tathāpi kadācit sahakārivaikalyānna
T04bsa054_u:9943: na hi nityatayā anādheyātiśayasya kācidapekṣā nāma /
T04bsa054_u:9945: vyatireke vā viśeṣādeva kāryotpattiḥ, tasya akārakatvaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9952: tathāpi te nityā vā syuranityā vā? ye tāvannityāḥ paramāṇvādayaḥ, teṣāṃ na sadbhāvavaikalyaṃ saṃbhavati, nāpi tadāyattasaṃnidhīnāṃ saṃnidhānavaikalyam /
T04bsa054_u:9953: anityānāmapi tadāyattodayasaṃnidhīnāṃ kuto vaikalyaṃ nāma, yena sahakārivaikalyānna karotītyucyate? tato nāyamatra parihāraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9956: tena īśvareṇa akṛtaḥ, yaḥ utpattimāṃstena akṛtaḥ, sa nāstyeva, na vidyate anyo 'paro jagati
T04bsa054_u:9957: tena kāraṇena tadāyattavṛttīnāṃ sahakāriṇāṃ sadāsaṃnihitatvādasau nityaḥ kartā kimapekṣatām? kimapekṣamāṇaḥ kadācit kāryaṃ na kuryāt? itthaṃ na kācidapi tasyāpekśāstīti sadā kāryaṃ kurvīta
T04bsa054_u:9958: athāpi syāt- samavāyikāraṇam, asamavāyikāraṇam, nimittakāraṇaṃ ceti kāraṇatritayāt kāryamutpadyate
T04bsa054_u:9959: tadasya nimittakāraṇatvāt sāmagrīmapekṣya kāryaṃ kurvato noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ iti parāśayamāśaṅkayāha apekṣata ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:9960: apekṣate cetsāmagrīṃ yadi nāma asau sadā sarvakāryāṇi kartuṃ samarthaḥ, tathāpi apekṣate sāmagrīm /
T04bsa054_u:9961: na hi sāmagrīmantareṇa satyapi samarthe kartari kāryamutpadyate
T04bsa054_u:9962: / yathā kila paṭotpādanasamarthe 'pi kvaciddhetau turītantuvemādikamantareṇa na paṭa utpadyate, tathā prakṛte 'pi cedyadi,
T04bsa054_u:9965: yadi sāmagrīsadbhāve karoti, tadabhāve ca na karotītyabhyupagabhyate, tadā punarīśvaro heturna syāt /
T04bsa054_u:9967: tasyā bhāvābhāvayoḥ kāryasya bhāvābhāvadarśanāt, na tu punarīśvarabhāvābhāvayoriti /
T04bsa054_u:9969: svarūpaṃ cāsya prāgapi samarthaṃ tadeveti kathaṃ kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:9970: yadapyuktam- kuvindādivat kadācit karotīti, tadapi na yuktam /
T04bsa054_u:9973: anyathāpi teṣāmapi pūrvaṃ tatsāmarthyasadbhāve tatkriyāprasaṅgo na nivartate iti sādhyavikalo (Bcp 260) dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:9976: 'pi sa eva kāraṇam, sa ca sarvadā saṃnihitasvabhāva iti kathaṃ kadācit
T04bsa054_u:9985: kutaḥ? tadabhāvataḥ, tasyāḥ sāmagryā abhāvataḥ avidyamānatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:9986: na ca avidyamānasvabhāve vandhyāsuta iva kiṃcit kartuṃ śakyate nīrūpatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:9991: tathāpi kiṃ sāmagrībalākṛṣṭaḥ svayamanicchanneva karoti, āhosvidicchan iti vikalpau /
T04bsa054_u:9996: cenmatam, parāyattaḥ prasajyate, parāyattaḥ paratantraḥ prasajyate
T04bsa054_u:9999: na ca pāratantryamanubhavataḥ īśvaratvaṃ yuktam, atiprasaṅgāt /
T04bsa054_u:10002: icchannapīcchāyattaḥ syāt atha icchan karotīti pakṣaḥ svīkriyate, tadāpi icchāyattaḥ syāt
T04bsa054_u:10006: evaṃ kurvataḥ kāryamabhinirvartayataḥ sataḥ tasya kuta īśatā, kutaḥ
T04bsa054_u:10007: eśvaryam? etena yaduktaṃ kenacit- buddhimattvādīśvarasya naiṣa doṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10008: buddhiśūnyo hi svasattāmātrajanyamakrameṇaiva kāryaṃ kuryāt, buddhimāṃstu kartumīśāno 'pyanicchanna karoti, iti kastasyopālambha iti, tadapi nirastam /
T04bsa054_u:10009: tathā hi tā api icchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa eva tasyopālambhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10011: yadi tā na sahakāriṇyaḥ, kiṃ tāsāṃ viyoge
T04bsa054_u:10012: 'pi na karoti atha asahakārivaikalye 'pi kāryākaraṇe sarvadā tadāyattaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:10013: sahakāriṇyaścet, tathā tadbhāve 'pi sarvakāryaṃ kiṃ na karoti? sahakāriṇāṃ sākalye śaktatvāt
T04bsa054_u:10014: kevalasya aśaktasya na kārakatvamiti cet, tat kimayaṃ pararūpeṇa kārakaḥ? tathā cedakāraka eva /
T04bsa054_u:10019: samartho 'pyeṣa prakṛtyā sahakāriṇāmasaṃnidhau nava kāraka iti cet, mātāpi satī prakṛtyā bandhyā ityetadapi tarhi devānāṃ priyeṇa vaktavyamityāstāṃ tāvat /
T04bsa054_u:10021: tathā ca sati anyasādhāraṇasvabhāvasya kathamīśatvamiti neśvarakāryaṃ jagadvaicitryamiti siddham
T04bsa054_u:10022: yadi na buddhimatkartṛkaṃ jagat, tarhi nityaparamāṇupuñjamayaṃ dvayaṇukādikrameṇotthaṃ kṣititaruparvatādikaṃ bhavatvityāha ye 'pītyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10026: apyaṇubhedena" [9.87]ityādinā paramāṇuvicārasamaye tatpratiṣedhānnivāritā nirākṛtāḥ ato nityaparamāṇumayamapi nedaṃ jagat //
T04bsa054_u:10027: evamīśvarakāraṇatāṃ ślokārdhena antarāle eva nityaparamāṇusvabhāvatāṃ ca jagato nirasya tasyaiva turyaprakārasya samarthanāya pradhānapariṇāmarūpatāṃ nirākartuṃ sāṃkhyamatamudbhāvayannāha sāṃkhyā
T04bsa054_u:10029: sāṃkhyāḥ pradhānamicchanti nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam // Bca_9.127 //
T04bsa054_u:10030: sāṃkhyāḥ kāpilāḥ pradhānaṃ prakṛtirityaparanāmadheyam icchanti manyante nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam
T04bsa054_u:10031: tacca nityamavinaśvarasvabhāvaṃ lokasya sarvasya carācarasya jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ pariṇāmarūpeṇa hetumicchanti //
T04bsa054_u:10035: sattvaṃ rajastamaśceti ete trayo guṇā aviṣamaṃ sthitāḥ sāmyāvasthāṃ prāptāḥ pradhānamiti kathyante, pradhānamityucyante /
T04bsa054_u:10039: tathāhi teṣāṃ prakriyāyadā puruṣasya viṣayopabhogākāramautsukyamupajāyate, tadā prakṛtiḥ parijñātapuruṣautsukyā puruṣeṇa yujyate /
T04bsa054_u:10048: ṣoḍaśakaḥ, ṣoḍaśaka iti ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca ca tanmātrāṇi /
T04bsa054_u:10051: 262) śrotraṃ tvakū cakṣū rasanaṃ ghrāṇaṃ ceti /
T04bsa054_u:10055: pañcabhyaḥ śabdādibhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni bhavanti pañca bhūtāni ca ākāśavāyutejojalapṛthivyākhyāni
T04bsa054_u:10057: mahadahaṃkārau śabdādayaśca pañca kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca
T04bsa054_u:10058: / ekādaśendriyāṇi ākāśādayaśca pañca kāryameva na kāraṇam /
T04bsa054_u:10062: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10072: evaṃ kila pradhānāt kāryarūpeṇa jagadvivartaḥ pravartate iti kāpilāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10073: tadevaṃ tat sarvamākāśe viracitacitramiva pratibhāsate iti manyamānaḥ siddhāntavādī dūṣayitumāha
T04bsa054_u:10075: ekasya sataḥ pradhānasya trisvabhāvatvaṃ sattvarajastamobhedena tryātmakatvamayuktamasaṃgatam
T04bsa054_u:10076: tena kāraṇena nāsti tat, na vidyate tat
T04bsa054_u:10080: mā bhūnnāma tadekasvabhāvaṃ triguṇātmakam, guṇāstāvat svarūpataḥ santītyāha
T04bsa054_u:10082: evaṃ guṇā na vidyante pratyekaṃ te 'pi hi tridhā // Bca_9.129 //
T04bsa054_u:10083: evameva pradhānavat guṇāḥ sattvarajastamorūpā na vidyante /
T04bsa054_u:10087: tathā hi sarvaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ bruvatāṃ pratyekaṃ guṇā api svarūpeṇa triguṇātmakāḥ prāpnuvanti
T04bsa054_u:10088: tathā tadguṇā api triguṇātmakatayā naikasvabhāvā vidyante //
T04bsa054_u:10089: yadā caivaṃ vicārayato guṇā na santi, tadā tadvivartarūpāḥ śabdādayo 'pi
T04bsa054_u:10104: yaśca sattvādīnāṃ sukhādirūpatāmupapādayituṃ tatpariṇāmasya rūpādino vyaktasya sukhādyanvayo heturuktaḥ, so 'pi
T04bsa054_u:10109: vastrādau acitsvabhāve paṭādau sukhāderapi cidātmakasya tādātmyenāsaṃbhavaḥ abhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10111: te ca guṇā na hi santi /
T04bsa054_u:10113: athāpi syāt- na sukhādyātmakatayā parādayaḥ sukhādisvabhāvā ucyante, api tu sukhādestadutpatterityāśaṅkayannāha
T04bsa054_u:10115: tasya sukhāderheturūpāḥ kāraṇasvabhāvā bhāvā bāhyāḥ paṭādayaścenmatam,
T04bsa054_u:10117: nāmī paṭādayaḥ avayavirūpāḥ, nāpi paramāṇusvarūpā nāpi triguṇātmakāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10120: tat ke ime bhāvāḥ sukhādiheturūpā bhaviṣyanti? api ca /
T04bsa054_u:10121: vyaktasya sukhādisvabhāvatve paṭādaya eva sukhādijanyāḥ syurityāha sukhādyevetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10122: sukhādyeva ca te hetuḥ paṭasyāpi sukhādyeva ca /
T04bsa054_u:10136: sukhādyasat, paṭādikāryatvāt sukhādyapi na syāditi tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt sukhādestatkāryatvam
T04bsa054_u:10137: sattvādiguṇātmakatayā yadapi sukhādīnāṃ nityatvamiṣṭam, tadapi na samyagityāha sukhādikānāṃ
T04bsa054_u:10144: yadi ca sukhādīnāṃ nityatvaṃ syāt, tadā nityamupalabhyerannityāha satyāmityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10145: satyāmeva sukhavyaktau saṃvittiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate /
T04bsa054_u:10146: yadi satyamavasthitarūpāḥ sukhādayaḥ, tathā sarvadeti sadā tatsaṃvedanaṃ
T04bsa054_u:10149: ekadā bhūtāyāṃ sukhavyaktau sukhasya nityatve sati /
T04bsa054_u:10151: gṛhyate, sukhasya saṃvedanaṃ sarvadā kiṃ na syāt? na ca sarvadā
T04bsa054_u:10153: tasmāt kadācidanupalabhyamānaṃ tat tadā nāstīti niścitamiti kathaṃ nityatvam? syādetat- sarvadā vyaktirūpatāyāṃ syādeṣa
T04bsa054_u:10155: yadā punastadeva śaktirūpatayā layagataṃ bhavati, tadā na doṣa
T04bsa054_u:10157: tadeva sūkṣmatāṃ yāti sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca tatkatham // Bca_9.133 //
T04bsa054_u:10158: tadeva vyaktāvavasthitiṃ kṛtvā bhāvasamāśrayāt, paścādanupalambhakāle sūkṣmatāṃ yāti, divā nakṣatrāṇīva anupalabdhasvabhāvatāṃ samāśrayate,
T04bsa054_u:10160: kutaḥ? yad yasmāt sthūlaṃ vyaktasvabhāvaṃ sat, sūkṣmaṃ tat katham? avyaktasvabhāvaṃ tat sukhādi katham? nitya tayā nānāsvabhāvatā
T04bsa054_u:10165: sthaulyamāvirbhāvarūpatāṃ tyaktvā parityajya bhavet sūkṣmaṃ tirohitarūpaṃ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:10166: evamabhyupagame sati anitye sthaulyasūkṣmate utpādavināśālīḍhatvādadhruve sthaulyasūkṣmate syātām /
T04bsa054_u:10167: bhavatāṃ nāma anitye, kā kṣatirityāha sarvasyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10170: tadvat sthaulyasūkṣmatāvat kiṃ nānityatvamiṣyate? kimiti niranvayavināśaḥ na
T04bsa054_u:10171: svīkriyate? ayamabhiprāyaḥ- sthaulyasūkṣmatayorapi niranvayavināśāsadutpādamantareṇa nāvirbhāvatirobhāvau yuktau /
T04bsa054_u:10172: anyathā kathaṃcit kenacidrūpeṇa avasthānāt pūrvavat punarupalabdheḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10175: yathā ca tayoretau bhavataḥ, tathā anyeṣāmapi viśeṣābhāvāt
T04bsa054_u:10178: yadi sthaulyasūkṣmatayorvināśotpattī iṣyete, tadā sukhādīnāmanityatāprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
T04bsa054_u:10179: tathā hi tat sthaulyaṃ sukhādbhinnamabhinnaṃ vā syāt /
T04bsa054_u:10180: tatra yadi bhinnam, tadā tasmin nivṛtte
T04bsa054_u:10185: na ca satyapi saṃbandhe akāraṇasya nivṛttau anyasya nivṛttiryujyate, gonivṛttāviva tatsvāminaḥ
T04bsa054_u:10186: nāpi sukhasya tat kāraṇam, paṭādereva sukhotpatteḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10191: na sthaulyaṃ cetsukhādanyat yadi sthaulyaṃ sukhādanyat bhinnaṃ na bhavati, tadā syāt sukhameva tat /
T04bsa054_u:10194: tatsvabhāvatayā sthaulyasya nivṛttau sukhasya vinivṛtteḥ sukhasya anityatā vinaśvaratā sphuṭaṃ niścitam //
T04bsa054_u:10195: syādetat- yadi sarvathā vināśaḥ syāt, tadā sukhasya punarutpattirna syāt /
T04bsa054_u:10198: yat sarvathā kāraṇātmani avidyamānaṃ tannotpadyate, yathā gaganāmbhoruham /
T04bsa054_u:10199: tathā ca anyadapi yadi syāt, tadā notpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:10203: iti cenmatam, evaṃ yadi saṃmatam, tadā naitadvaktavyamityāha vyaktasyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10206: anabhilāṣiṇo 'pi te tava sadutpattivādinaḥ sthitā āpannā /
T04bsa054_u:10207: anyathā prāgapi tasya sadbhāve paścādvat pūrvamapi tadupalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10208: yathā vyaktasyāsata utpattiḥ, tathā yadi anyasyāpi
T04bsa054_u:10211: satkāryavādinaḥ kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ kāryasadbhāvāt idamapi dūṣaṇamaparamāśaṅkayate ityāha annāda
T04bsa054_u:10212: annādo 'medhyabhakṣaḥ syāt annamattītyannādaḥ annabhakṣakaḥ amedhyabhakṣaḥ syāt aśucibhoktā bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:10216: tathāhi- kāryamamedhyamannasya, tacca annāvasthāyāmeva satkāryavādino vidyate, iti annabhakṣaṇāt tadbhakṣaṇamāśaṅkayate bhavataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10217: kiṃ ca idamapi satkāryavādinaḥ prasaṅgāntaramāsañjayannāha paṭārgheṇetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10220: karpāsabīje kāraṇe bhaviṣyataḥ paṭasya kāryasya sadbhāvāt paṭasyārgheṇa mūlyena karpāsabījaṃ krītvā gṛhītvā nivasyatāṃ paridhīyatām //
T04bsa054_u:10221: athāpi syāt- yadi nāma paramārthataḥ kāraṇe kāryamasti, tathāpi nāyaṃ saṃvṛtyavidyātimiropahatalocanaḥ sāṃvyavahāriko lokaḥ
T04bsa054_u:10224: mohāccennekṣate lokaḥ mohādajñānāt sadapi vastutattvaṃ nekṣate na paśyati lokaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10229: yadi nāma na loko 'paśyaṃstathā vyavahāraṃ karoti, tattvajñasya tu yujyate
T04bsa054_u:10231: yataḥ tattvajñasyāpi kāraṇe kāryamastīti paramārthavedino 'pi sāṃkhyasya sā sthitiḥ, saiva sarvasāṃvyavahārikajanasādhāraṇī vyavasthitiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10232: te 'pi dṛśyante annabhakṣaṇādiṣu pravartamānāḥ karpāsabījaṃ paṭārthinaḥ pariharantaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10235: lokasya sāṃvyavahārikajanasyāpi tajjñānamasti, yena kāryaṃ kāraṇe 'stīti
T04bsa054_u:10237: tathāhi- kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāraṇe astīti niścayaḥ ubhayorapi tattvajñasya lokasya ca sādhāraṇaḥ
T04bsa054_u:10238: ato lokaḥ kasmāddhetorna paśyati? tatra lokasyādarśanakāraṇaṃ vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:10240: lokāpramāṇatāyāṃ cet lokasya sāṃvyavahārikajanasya apramāṇatāyāṃ tajjñānasyāprāmāṇye-
T04bsa054_u:10252: yadi pramāṇamapi paramārthataḥ pramāṇaṃ na bhavatīti bhavatāṃ pakṣaḥ, nanu tatpramitaṃ mṛṣā, pramāṇasyāprāmāṇye tatpramitaṃ tena pramāṇena paricchinnaṃ mṛṣā alīkaṃ prāpnoti /
T04bsa054_u:10255: yadi pramāṇasyāprāmāṇye tatpramitaṃ mṛṣā, tadā yeyaṃ bhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyatā sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tasmāt
T04bsa054_u:10257: sarvapramāṇopadarśitasya mṛṣārthatvāt sāpi sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā tadvicārakapramāṇopadarśitaiva iti samāno nyāyaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10261: kalpanākalpitaṃ samāropitaṃ bhāvamaspṛṣṭvā kalpanābuddhayā agṛhītvā tadabhāvo na gṛhyate nālambyate
T04bsa054_u:10262: tathāhi ghaṭamāropitarūpeṇa parikalpya tatsaṃbandhitayā ghaṭābhāvaṃ pratipadyate lokaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10263: ghaṭasya vicāreṇa lokaprasiddhenaiva yadā na kiṃcit svarūpamavatiṣṭhate, tadā tadabhāvaḥ tadviparyayarūpaḥ sutarāṃ na kaścit /
T04bsa054_u:10265: tasmādbhāvo mṛṣā yo hi tasyābhāvaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛṣā // Bca_9.140 //
T04bsa054_u:10266: yasmāt kalpitabhāvavivekena abhāvo gṛhyate, tasmādbhāvo mṛṣā asatsvabhāvo
T04bsa054_u:10267: yaḥ, tasyābhāvaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛṣā, tasya niḥsvabhāvasya bhāvasya abhāvo virahaḥ sphuṭaṃ niścitaṃ mṛṣā asatyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10269: evaṃ ca bhāvābhāvayoḥ parikalpitarūpatve sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvataiva avatiṣṭhate //
T04bsa054_u:10270: punaridameva upasaṃhāravyājena vispaṣṭayannāha tasmāt svapne ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10271: tasmātsvapne sute naṣṭe sa nāstīti vikalpanā /
T04bsa054_u:10272: yasmādbhāvābhāvau kalpanopasthāpitatvānmṛṣārthau, tasmāt svapne middhākrāntacittāvasthāyāmutpannavinaṣṭe sute putre sati sa putro nāstīti vikalpanā tadabhāvavikalpaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10274: tadbhāvakalpanotpādaṃ vibadhnāti tasya sutasya bhāvaḥ tasyāstitvaṃ tasya kalpanā sattvasamāropaḥ tasyotpādaḥ unmajjanaṃ taṃ ni[vi?]badhnāti /
T04bsa054_u:10275: niṣedhayati- tathaiva tarhi seti cenna mṛṣā ca sā // Bca_9.141 //
T04bsa054_u:10276: sā kalpanā tadbhāvakalpanāṃ vibadhnāti api mṛṣā /
T04bsa054_u:10278: athavā satyābhimate eva sute svapne naṣṭe sarvametadyojanīyam /
T04bsa054_u:10282: atha ca kalpanayā vyavahāragocaramupagatau pratibhātaḥ, na ca sā kalpanā asatyārthaviṣayatayā apramāṇam, tadviṣayasya paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt,
T04bsa054_u:10284: iti tasyā aprāmāṇye 'pi na sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatā vighaṭate /
T04bsa054_u:10291: evamahetubhūtasvabhāveśvarapradhānakartṛtvaṃ jagato nirākṛtya nāpyahetutaḥ ityasyārthaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha tasmādevamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10294: yataḥ svabhāvādisaṃbhūtaṃ na kiṃcit kāryamupapadyate, tasmādevaṃ vicāreṇa samanantaranirūpaṇena nāsti kiṃcidahetutaḥ, svabhāvāderahetuto
T04bsa054_u:10299: nanu yadi nāma svabhāveśvarapradhānāderahetuto na kiṃcidasti,
T04bsa054_u:10301: tat kathaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā setsyatīti parāśayamāśaṅkaya na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyām iti koṭitrayaṃ samarthayannāha na ca vyastetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10302: na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣu vyavasthitam // Bca_9.142 //
T04bsa054_u:10310: tatra na tāvat svataḥ svabhāvādbhāvā utpadyante /
T04bsa054_u:10311: utpādāt pūrvaṃ tasya svabhāvasyāvidyamānatvāt kuta utpadyantām? utpanne ca tasmin satyapi svarūpe tasyāpi niṣpannatvāt kimutpadyantām? api ca /
T04bsa054_u:10312: svata eva janmani jātasyaiva punarjanma syāt /
T04bsa054_u:10315: jātasya punarjanmani bījadīnāmeva āsaṃsāraṃ pravṛtteḥ nāṅkurādayaḥ kadācidutpattumavasaraṃ labheran /
T04bsa054_u:10316: na ca etadabhyupagacchato 'pi lokata eva bādhāmanubhavat siddhipathamupayāti, bījāderaṅkurādyutpattidarśanāt
T04bsa054_u:10318: svasvabhāvajanyatve ca kasyacidutpattireva na syāt, itaretarāśrayatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:10319: tathā hi yāvat svabhāvo na bhavati, tāvadutpattirna syāt, yāvacca utpattirna bhavati, tāvat svabhāvo na syāt /
T04bsa054_u:10322: parato hi janmani iṣyamāṇe śālibījādapi kodravāṅkurasyotpattiprasaṅgaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10324: paratvamaviśiṣṭam, sarvasya vā janma sarvato bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:10326: atha yadi nāma paratvamaviśiṣṭam, tathāpi kāryakāraṇayoranyonyajanyajanakabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt na sarvasyotpattiriti cet, na /
T04bsa054_u:10327: anutpanne hi kārye kasmin punarasya śaktiriti vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:10331: tasya ca ekakṣaṇānavasthānāt keyaṃ saṃtatirnāma? pūrvāparakṣaṇapravāhasya ca kalpanāsamāropitatvāt nāsti saṃtatirvāstavī /
T04bsa054_u:10333: iti na kiṃcit kenacidekasaṃtatipatitaṃ sadṛśaṃ vā janyajanakabhāvaniyataṃ vā asti, janyajanakabhāvasyaiva cātra cintyatvāt,
T04bsa054_u:10334: kathaṃ tenaiva parihāraḥ? tasmāt parato 'pi na kasyacit saṃbhavaḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10338: na hi ekenāndhenādṛṣṭamārgo bahubhirapi draṣṭuṃ śakyate /
T04bsa054_u:10339: pratyekaṃ vā sikatāstailadānāsamarthā militā api tatsamarthā bhavanti /
T04bsa054_u:10341: iti svaparobhayajanitamahetujanitaṃ vā tattvato na kiṃcidasti /
T04bsa054_u:10346: tatra kathaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati? ihoktaṃ bhagavatā- ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ
T04bsa054_u:10348: yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvam- ityādi pūrvavat yāvat-
T04bsa054_u:10351: pratītyasamutpāda iti kasmāducyate? sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyaya ityucyate
T04bsa054_u:10353: / atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
T04bsa054_u:10356: / tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ? yadidaṃ
T04bsa054_u:10357: bījādaṅkuraḥ, aṅkurāt patram, patrāt kāṇḍam, kāṇḍānnālam, nālādgaṇḍaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10358: gaṇḍādgarbham, garbhācchūkaḥ, śūkāt puṣpam, puṣpāt phalamiti /
T04bsa054_u:10359: asati bīje 'ṅkuro na bhavati, yāvadasati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
T04bsa054_u:10364: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
T04bsa054_u:10365: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ
T04bsa054_u:10366: phalamabhinirvartayāmīti, phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartitamiti /
T04bsa054_u:10368: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10370: kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt
T04bsa054_u:10371: katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtusamavāyāt bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10379: yadā bāhyaśca pṛthivīdhāturavikalo bhavati, evamaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātavaśca avikalā bhavanti, tadā sarveṣāṃ (Bcp 270) samavāyāt bīje nirudhyamāne
T04bsa054_u:10381: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T04bsa054_u:10382: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
T04bsa054_u:10383: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
T04bsa054_u:10384: atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:10385: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10390: pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto
T04bsa054_u:10393: iti? yasmādanyo 'ṅkuro 'nyadvījam, na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10396: kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate,
T04bsa054_u:10397: nāpyaniruddhādbījāt, api ca, bījaṃ ca nirudhyate, tasminneva samaye 'ṅkura
T04bsa054_u:10400: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśo bījādaṅkura iti /
T04bsa054_u:10405: kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśaṃ phalamabhinirvartayatīti /
T04bsa054_u:10407: evaṃ bāhyaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairdraṣṭavyaḥ // iti /
T04bsa054_u:10414: pratītyasamutpādo 'pi yathāvadevaṃ saṃgacchate iti traikālyavādimatamāśaṅkayāha anyata ityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10415: anyato nāpi cāyātaṃ na tiṣṭhati na gacchati /
T04bsa054_u:10420: / tathāhi- yadi anāgatādadhvano vartamānamāgacchet, vartamānādvā atitam,
T04bsa054_u:10421: tadā saṃskṛtamapi nityaṃ syāt, sarvadā vidyamānatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:10423: sa ca dharmo na ca nityaḥ iti kathametat setsyati?
T04bsa054_u:10424: atha pūrvāparakālayoḥ kāritraśūnyatayā dharmasya adhvasu viśeṣaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10425: tathā hi yadā asaṃprāptakāritraḥ kṛtyaṃ na karoti, tadā anāgato 'bhidhīyate,
T04bsa054_u:10426: yadā karoti tadā pratyutpannaḥ, yadā tu kṛtyānnivṛttaḥ tadā atīta iti
T04bsa054_u:10429: tenaivātmanā tasyaiva (Bcp 271) tadāpi sadbhāvāt kāritramapi kathaṃ na syāditi vaktavyam /
T04bsa054_u:10432: kāritraṃ vā kathamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca ucyate? kiṃ tadaparakāritrasadbhāvāt svayameva
T04bsa054_u:10436: yathā vartamānaṃ dravyato 'sti, tathā atītamanāgataṃ cāsti, tadā naivam /
T04bsa054_u:10437: svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamanutpannavinaṣṭasvabhāvatā? kimasya pūrvaṃ nāsīt yasyābhāvādajāta ityucyate? kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvādvinaṣṭa
T04bsa054_u:10440: tasmādabhūtatvādabhavanadharmato na saṃgacchate kathaṃcidapi adhvatrayayogaḥ, tattvābhyupagamato nātītādisadbhāvaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10442: svabhāvaḥ sarvadā nāsti bhāvo nityaśca neṣyate /
T04bsa054_u:10445: yadapyucyate- astyatītaṃ karma, astyanāgataṃ phalam, iti
T04bsa054_u:10446: sūtravacanādastyatītādibhāvaḥ, tadapi hetuphalāpavāde tadduṣṭipratiṣedhārthamuktaṃ bhagavatā- astyatītam, astyanāgatam, iti /
T04bsa054_u:10447: atītaṃ tu yadabhūtapūrvamutpadya vinaṣṭam, anāgataṃ yat sati hetau bhaviṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:10448: evaṃ hi hetvādyastītyucyate, astiśabdasya nipātatvāt kālatrayavṛttitvam /
T04bsa054_u:10451: cakṣurbhikṣava utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati, nirudhyamānaṃ na kvacit
T04bsa054_u:10453: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ cakṣurabhūtvā bhavati, bhūtvā ca prativigacchatīti //
T04bsa054_u:10454: yadi ca anāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syāt, noktaṃ syādabhūtvā bhavatīti /
T04bsa054_u:10456: yadi caivam, na kutaścidāgamanam, kvacid gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate, pratibhāsamānasya ca pratyutpannasya na rūpaṃ kiṃcidvicāreṇāvatiṣṭhate, tadā-
T04bsa054_u:10457: māyātaḥ ko viśeṣo 'sya yanmūḍhaiḥ satyataḥ kṛtam // Bca_9.143 //
T04bsa054_u:10458: māyātaḥ aindrajālikanirmitahastyādirūpāyā api niḥsvabhāvatayā viśeṣo naiva kaścit asya hetupratyayopajanitasya vasturūpasya paridṛśyamānasya //
T04bsa054_u:10459: kathaṃ na viśeṣaḥ? punaridameva vyaktīkurvannāha māyayetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10461: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām // Bca_9.144 //
T04bsa054_u:10464: tayā nirmitam, yacca vasturūpaṃ māyāhetunā māyāsvabhāvena yadviracitamiti yāvat /
T04bsa054_u:10468: tanmāyānimirtaṃ hetunirmitaṃ vā vasturūpaṃ (Bcp 272) kutaḥ kasmāt? kutra yāti ca, vinaṣṭaṃ sat kva
T04bsa054_u:10469: punaretad gacchati? ityevaṃ nirūpyatāṃ sūkṣmekṣikayā vicāryatām, yadi tasya kutaścidāgacchati kvacid gacchati vā upalabhyate //
T04bsa054_u:10471: yadi hetupratyayasāmarthyopajanitaṃ vasturūpam, tadā kathamiva alīkaṃ syāt? ata eva alīkamityāha
T04bsa054_u:10473: pratibimbasame tasmin kṛtrime satyatā katham // Bca_9.145 //
T04bsa054_u:10474: yad vasturūpamanyasya hetupratyayasya saṃnidhānena dṛṣṭamupalabdham, na
T04bsa054_u:10475: tadabhāvataḥ, tasya anyasya abhāvataḥ na dṛṣṭam, tatparādhīnavṛttitvāt /
T04bsa054_u:10479: evaṃbhūte vasturūpe kṛtrime parāyattavṛttitayā asvābhāvike satyatā amṛṣārthatā
T04bsa054_u:10483: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye /
T04bsa054_u:10484: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10488: na ca hetupratyayānāṃ sāmarthyaṃ kvacidapi paramārthataḥ saṃbhavati //
T04bsa054_u:10490: avidyamāno vā, ubhayasvabhāvo vā? tatra na vidyamānaḥ kriyate ityāha vidyamānasyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10492: vidyamānasya kāraṇavyāpārāt prāgeva satsvabhāvasya hetunā kāraṇena kiṃ
T04bsa054_u:10499: tarhi hetunā kiṃ prayojanam? tadāpi na hetunā kimapi prayojanamasti,
T04bsa054_u:10501: syādetat- yadi nāma vidyamānasya niṣpannatvāt kartavyābhāvāt na hetunā kimapi prayojanam, avidyamānasya tu kiṃ na bhavatītyāha nābhāvasyetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10503: na abhāvasya avidyamānasvabhāvasya vikāro 'sti, anyathātvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvatā asti, nīrūpatayā tasyāpi kartavyābhāvāt /
T04bsa054_u:10506: mā bhavatu vikāraḥ, bhāvasvabhāvatā kevalamasyāstu cedatrāha tadavastha iti-
T04bsa054_u:10507: tadavastha kathaṃ bhāvaḥ tadavastho 'parityaktābhāvasvabhāvaḥ naiva bhāvaḥ syāt, nābhāva eva
T04bsa054_u:10511: yadi na prāgabhāvo bhāvasvabhāvo bhavati, ko vā tarhi abhāvādanyaḥ aparaḥ bhāvatām, abhāvasvabhāvatāṃ parityajya bhāvarūpatāṃ gataḥ? nānyaḥ kaścit pratīyate, kāraṇasya kāryasvabhāvatāyāḥ pūrvameva pratiṣiddhatvāt //
T04bsa054_u:10512: syādetat- nānyaḥ kaścidbhāvo bhavati, kiṃ tarhi prāgabhāvasya
T04bsa054_u:10513: bhāvavirodhinaḥ sadbhāvāttadā bhāvo na bhavati, paścāt punastasminnapagate bhavatyevetyāha-
T04bsa054_u:10515: nābhāvakāle abhāvasattāsamaye na bhāvaścet, yadi bhāvo na bhavati, kadā bhāvo bhaviṣyati? abhāvakāle bhāvasyānutpattiścet, na kadācidbhāvasyonmajjanaṃ syāt, abhāvena virodhinā sadā kroḍīkṛtatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:10516: tenaivotpadyamānena bhāvena abhāvasya vināśo bhaviṣyatīti cedāha-
T04bsa054_u:10518: yāvadasau bhāvo na jāyate, tāvadabhāvasya vināśo nāstyeva /
T04bsa054_u:10520: tasmāt na ajātena anutpannena bhāvena so 'bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvarūpaḥ apagamiṣyati nivartayiṣyate
T04bsa054_u:10521: athāpi syāt- mā apagacchatu nāma abhāvaḥ, tasminnanapagate eva bhāva
T04bsa054_u:10523: utpanne ca bhāve bhāvābhāvayoḥ parasparaparihārāt paścādabhāvaḥ svayameva apagamiṣyatītyāha na cetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10525: bhavatyeva kramaḥ, yadi pūrvaṃ bhāva eva bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:10528: na caiva anapagate anivṛtte abhāve bhāvasyāvasaraḥ avakāśaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10533: kāryamutpādayadeva tadabhāvamapi nirvartayatīti cet, utpādayatyeva kāryam,
T04bsa054_u:10536: na ca kāraṇena tadabhāvasya virodhaḥ, kāraṇakāle 'pi tatprāgabhāvasya bhāvāt sattāvasthānāt
T04bsa054_u:10537: tasmādbhāvātmani abhāvātmani vā kārye na kāraṇasya vyāpāro yujyate /
T04bsa054_u:10538: ubhayānubhayapakṣe ca pratyekapakṣaniṣedhādeva kāraṇavyāpārasya niṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavatīti draṣṭavyam
T04bsa054_u:10544: na sannutpadyate bhāvo nāpyasan sadasanna ca /
T04bsa054_u:10545: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ jāyate katham //
T04bsa054_u:10547: evaṃ tāvadbhāvasyotpattiḥ paramārthato na kathaṃcidapi saṃgacchate /
T04bsa054_u:10548: nāpi kathaṃcidutpannasya satsvabhāvasya nivṛttiryujyate ityāha bhāvaścetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10551: yathā abhāvo bhāvatāṃ naiti, tathā bhāvaśca abhāvatāṃ
T04bsa054_u:10554: bhāvasya sataḥ yadā abhāvasvabhāvatā bhavati, tadā ca ekasyaiva vastunaḥ dvayoḥ svabhāvayoḥ
T04bsa054_u:10556: na ca bhāvatāṃ parityajya abhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti vaktumucitam /
T04bsa054_u:10561: itthaṃ bhāvasyotpādavināśayoḥ paramārthato 'bhāvaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha evamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10562: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti sarvadā /
T04bsa054_u:10565: yasmānna nirodho 'sti, na vināśo 'sti, [na ca bhāvo 'sti,] na vastusattvamasti /
T04bsa054_u:10568: "utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasamatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā
T04bsa054_u:10577: idaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsamānādhikaraṇaṃ jagadviścaṃ sattvabhājanalokasaṃjñitaṃ sacarācaraṃ vā /
T04bsa054_u:10582: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate āha- yadi evaṃ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
T04bsa054_u:10587: āha- yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca ityasya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ? āha-
T04bsa054_u:10589: tatra tathāgato mahākārūṇiko lokasya trāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśāduktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
T04bsa054_u:10590: na cātra kasyaciddharmasya utpādo na nirodhaḥ
T04bsa054_u:10594: prakṛtiparinirvṛtāḥ, iti jagato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tadantargatānāṃ narakādigatīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvataivetyupadarśayannāha
T04bsa054_u:10596: svapnena upamā tulyaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ tathoktāḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10599: yathā svapne deśāntarādigamanāgamanaṃ sukhaduḥkhādyanubhavanaṃ ca, tathā anadhigataparamārthatattvasya narakādiṣu veditavyam, na tu tattvataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10602: sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā vicāre vimarśe sati yasmāt kadalīsamāḥ kadalīvanniḥsārāḥ gatayaḥ, tasmādityarthaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10606: yataśca anutpannāniruddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, ata āha nirvṛtetyādi-
T04bsa054_u:10607: nirvṛtānirvṛtānāṃ na viśeṣo nāsti vastutaḥ // Bca_9.151 //
T04bsa054_u:10610: teṣāmubhayeṣāmapi viśeṣo bhedo nāsti, na saṃbhavati /
T04bsa054_u:10611: kutaḥ? vastutaḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā prakṛtiparinirvṛtatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:10612: saṃvṛtyā punarasti eva viśeṣaḥ, ityanekadhā pratipāditam /
T04bsa054_u:10615: ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca samatā tena te matā //
T04bsa054_u:10617: iti paramārthatattvāparijñānānmithyābhiniveśādāropitajagajjālamupakalpya ātmanaiva ātmānamākulayati bālajanaḥ ityupadarśayannāha evamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10618: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet /
T04bsa054_u:10619: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati // Bca_9.152 //
T04bsa054_u:10620: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /
T04bsa054_u:10621: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ // Bca_9.153 //
T04bsa054_u:10622: vicāre jīvalokaḥ kaḥ ko nāmātra mariṣyati /
T04bsa054_u:10623: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt // Bca_9.154 //
T04bsa054_u:10624: evaṃ pratipāditanyāyena śūnyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdham, kiṃ kutaścit prāptaṃ yallābheṣu prahṛṣyanti? kiṃ hṛtam, kimapahṛtaṃ kena kasyacit bhavet, yallābhāpahāreṇa prakupyanti? (Bcp 276) satkṛtaḥ pūjitaḥ,
T04bsa054_u:10625: paribhūtaḥ apakṛto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati? vastusvabhāvābhāve na kaścit
T04bsa054_u:10627: kutaḥ sukhahetorabhāvāt sukhaṃ vā, kuto duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhahetorabhāvāt?
T04bsa054_u:10630: kiṃ priyaṃ vā kiṃ vallabhaṃ vā? priyarūpatāyāḥ kalpitatvāt /
T04bsa054_u:10631: kimapriyaṃ kimanabhilaṣaṇīyam? apriyamapi na paramārthataḥ kiṃcit vidyate,
T04bsa054_u:10632: iti kimarthaṃ priyāpriyasaṃyogaviyogārthaṃ prayatnaḥ kriyate? kā tṛṣṇā yayā lābhādyarthaṃ tṛṣyati janaḥ? kutra sā tṛṣṇā, kva punarāsaṅgasthāne vastuni tṛṣṇā? mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ, anviṣyamāṇā svarūpataḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10633: tadviṣayasyābhāvāt nirviṣayatayā tasyā apyabhāvaḥ, yadvaśāt tattat karma
T04bsa054_u:10635: vicāre paramārthasvarūpanirūpaṇe sati jīvalokaḥ sattvalokaḥ kaḥ? naiva kaścit /
T04bsa054_u:10636: tadabhāvāt ko nāmātra mariṣyati? jīvalokasya vicāreṇa asatsvabhāvatvāt ko nāmātra jīvaloke mariṣyati, uparatajīvitendriyo
T04bsa054_u:10637: bhaviṣyati? ko bhaviṣyati, ka utpatsyate? ko bhūtaḥ pūrvamutpannaḥ?
T04bsa054_u:10639: ko bandhuḥ, kaḥ svajanaḥ? kasya kaḥ suhṛt, kiṃ mitraṃ kasya? atreti sarvatra yojanīyam
T04bsa054_u:10646: parigṛhṇantu avidyamānameva tu svarūpamāropya madvidhā iti granthakāraḥ ātmānameva nidarśanaṃ karoti /
T04bsa054_u:10650: kaiḥ? kalahotsavahetubhiḥ kalahahetubhiḥ vivādahetubhiḥ, utsavahetubhirānandahetubhiḥ yathāyogam
T04bsa054_u:10651: tasmādanadhigataparamārthatattvāḥ sāṃvṛtameva vasturūpaṃ satyatayābhiniviṣṭāḥ sarvametanmanyante, na tu paramārthavedinaḥ iti /
T04bsa054_u:10654: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam /
T04bsa054_u:10658: 'nabhilāpyaḥ anājñeyo 'vijñeyaḥ adeśitaḥ aprakāśitaḥ, yāvat akriyaḥ akaraṇaḥ, yāvat na lābho nālābho na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ na
T04bsa054_u:10660: tatra jinena janasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya /
T04bsa054_u:10663: saṃvṛti prajñapayī narasiṃhaḥ ṣaṅgatayo bhaṇi sattvagaṇānām /
T04bsa054_u:10664: narakagatīśca tathaiva ca pretān āsurakāya narāṃśca marūṃśca //
T04bsa054_u:10674: mithaśchedanabhedanaiḥ, mithaḥ parasparaṃ chedanāni karacaraṇaśironāsikākarṇaprabhṛtīnām, bhedanāni bāhujaṅghoruvakṣaḥpārśvodarādīnām /
T04bsa054_u:10679: santaḥ? pāpairātmasukhecchavaḥ, pāpairakuśalaiḥ karmabhiḥ, ātmanaḥ svasya sukhecchavaḥ sukhābhilaṣaṇaśīlāḥ //
T04bsa054_u:10684: / kiṃbhūteṣu? dīrghatīvravyatheṣu ca, dīrghā cirakālabhāvinī, tīvrā
T04bsa054_u:10685: atiduḥsahavedanīyavipākatvāt, vyathā yeṣvapāyeṣu te tathoktāḥ, teṣu ca /

T04bsa054_u:10696: vyāmohavijṛmbhitametādṛśaṃ sarvajanasādhāraṇaṃ yathāvidhaṃ pratipāditaṃ paridṛśyamānaṃ vā
T04bsa054_u:10705: anantā anavadhikālavipākatayā aparyantā vā duḥkhānāmativipulatayā mahāyānamanadhigamya nistarītumaśakyatvāt,
T04bsa054_u:10706: / tathāpi kathaṃcit mahatā vīryeṇa kuśalapakṣopacayāt bhūyasā kālena sugatiṃ prāpya kṣapayituṃ śakyante ityata āha tatraivamityādi-
T04bsa054_u:10711: tatra tathārūpe samāveśe evaṃ paridṛśyamānarūpā alpabalatā /
T04bsa054_u:10718: ārogyasya ārogyāya vārogopaśamāya vyāpāraiḥ viśeṣeṇa kaṭutiktabhaiṣajyakaṣāyapānādibhiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10719: kuśalopārjanamantareṇa vṛthā caiva āyurvahatyāśu iti vakṣyamāṇena saṃbandhaḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10721: kṣut bubhukṣā, klamo glāniḥ, śramo mārgakhedādi, taiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10723: upadravaiḥ, nidrayā svapnena, upadravairhāsyotprāsaviheṭhanādikṛtaiḥ sarīsṛpavyālamṛgadaṃśamaśakādikṛtaiḥ badhabandhanatāḍanādilakṣaṇaiḥ /
T04bsa054_u:10724: tathā bālasaṃsargairniṣphalaiḥ, tathā bālānāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ saṃsargaiḥ saṃparkaiḥ /

T04bsa054_u:10727: vṛthaiva niṣphalameva kuśalapakṣopacayarahitatvāt āyurvahati yāti āśu
T04bsa054_u:10729: evamapi vartamānānāṃ vivekastu sudurlabhaḥ, vivekastu heyopādeyajñānaṃ vyāsaṅgaparityāgo vā, sudurlabhaḥ, kathamapi atikṛcchreṇāpi na labhyate /
T04bsa054_u:10730: bhavatu nāma evam, tathāpi yadi kathaṃcit samādhānaṃ jāyate, tadā kalyāṇaṃ syāt, tadapi nāstītyāha tatrāpītyādi-
